anya-e0804n:14_15: Evaṃ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathāpayogaṃ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:15_0: Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti.
anya-e0804n:15_3: dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti, sameti,
anya-e0804n:15_5: abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto, samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo,
anya-e0804n:15_15: paṭimukhaṃ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna,
anya-e0804n:17_0: Idamettha na vattabbaṃ, dassanāyeva me ruto.
anya-e0804n:23_6: eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo.
anya-e0804n:23_7: Taṃ evarūpaṃ “maccurājā”ti vattabbaṃ bahuno janassa anatthakaraṃ kodhaṃ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.
anya-e0804n:24_1: “Etī”ti ettha hi āupasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya.
anya-e0804n:24_2: Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho bhavati,
anya-e0804n:24_3: ākārassa ca ikārena parena saddhiṃyeva ekārādeso.
anya-e0804n:24_7: Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati,
anya-e0804n:24_8: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n:24_9: Atha vā itīti rassavasena vuttaṃ padaṃ gamanaṃ bodheti,
anya-e0804n:24_10: etīti vuddhivasena vuttaṃ pana yathāpayogaṃ āgamanādīni.
anya-e0804n:24_19: tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n:25_0: I gatiyanti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṃ gatā yadā;
anya-e0804n:30_0: Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṃ yathā.
anya-e0804n:35_0: Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo,
anya-e0804n:36_0: Idāni yathārahaṃ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṃ itiito saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate –
anya-e0804n:36_1: tattha itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo.
anya-e0804n:36_2: Tathā hesa “ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī”tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
anya-e0804n:36_8: “Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiattho.
anya-e0804n:36_9: “Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye.
anya-e0804n:36_16: “Atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:36_17: Kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
anya-e0804n:36_20: natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu nidassane.
anya-e0804n:36_22: “Itāyaṃ kodharūpenā”ti ettha pana ākhyātavasena gamane itisaddo dissati.
anya-e0804n:36_25: viññūnaṃ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṃ kevalaṃ atthuddhāravasena āgatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:41_0: Gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito;
anya-e0804n:43_0: Idha pana samayasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ sanibbacanaṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari ayadhātuvisayeyeva vakkhāma
anya-e0804n:43_3: udetī”tiādīnañca ekārānantaratyantapadānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ padamālā yathārahaṃ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n:43_5: Yasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca tyantapadamālā jānitabbā,
anya-e0804n:43_6: tasmā bhūvādigaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṃ asabbasādhāraṇañca padamālānayaṃ brūma –
anya-e0804n:46_0: Iti etī”ti cetesaṃ, padānaṃ pana pantiyo;
anya-e0804n:59_0: Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.
anya-e0804n:62_0: Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima.
anya-e0804n:62_1: Aparipuṇṇo vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima.
anya-e0804n:62_3: Ettha ca imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni “veti, apeti,
anya-e0804n:62_12: Garū pana anu eti anvetīti vadanti. Taṃ –
anya-e0804n:65_0: Evaṃ taṃ anugacchāmi, putte ādāya pacchato”ti.
anya-e0804n:66_0: Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti “jessantaṃ anvetī”ti vacanato “anugacchāmī”ti vacanato ca.
anya-e0804n:66_1: Tathā hi etisaddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako,
anya-e0804n:66_4: tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo ñeyyo.
anya-e0804n:66_5: Etesañca itisaddavasena katachedānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ yuttibhāvañca “itāyaṃ kodharūpenā”ti pāḷiyeva sādheti,
anya-e0804n:66_7: anu isī”tiādinā “anvetī”tiādīnaṃ chede labbhamānanayena vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito.
anya-e0804n:67_1: sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha. Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ, issāmhe.
anya-e0804n:67_2: Asabbadhātukattepi suddhassarattā dhātussa ikārāgamo na labbhati.
anya-e0804n:68_0: Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṃsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṃ, issamhā. Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṃ,
anya-e0804n:68_2: Kālātipattibhāve ca asabbadhātukatte ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa akārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā ca akārāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n:69_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṃ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṃ “nanu te sutaṃ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne,
anya-e0804n:69_1: devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā”ti pāḷito nayaṃ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso
anya-e0804n:69_2: samānāni asamānatthāni vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṃ aññamaññaṃ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṃ rūpāni
anya-e0804n:71_0: Eti, enti. Esi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n:72_0: Etu, entu. Ehi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n:73_0: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṃ, vissāsaṃ eyya paṇḍito;
anya-e0804n:75_0: Yadā te pahiṇissāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya.
anya-e0804n:76_0: Eyya, eyyuṃ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṃ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṃ, eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n:79_0: Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṃ, essāmhe.
anya-e0804n:81_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṃ.
anya-e0804n:82_0: “Abhidosagato idāni ehī”ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:83_0: Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṃ, ehissāmhe.
anya-e0804n:84_0: Essā, essaṃsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṃ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṃ, essāmhase.
anya-e0804n:86_0: Udeti, udenti; Udesi, udetha; Udemi, udema.
anya-e0804n:87_0: Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
anya-e0804n:88_0: Udeyya, udeyyuṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Udissā, udissaṃsu. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:91_0: Ku sadde ke ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati,
anya-e0804n:92_0: Tatra kānananti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṃ karotīti kānanaṃ, vanaṃ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n:94_0: Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma”nti
anya-e0804n:95_1: Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:95_2: Manoharatāya avassaṃ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti kabbaṃ. Kāviyaṃ. Kāveyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:95_3: Aññatra pana kavīnaṃ idanti kabbanti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:95_10: Aññatra pana jātaṃ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:95_11: Tathā hi jātakasaddo desanāyampi vattati “itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhamma”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n:96_2: Nīcasaddo hi hīnavācako “nīce kule paccājāto”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n:96_8: kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṃ natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:96_10: takanaṃ” iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu dhātūsu yathārahaṃ labbhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:98_3: tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā “appābādhaṃ appātaṅka”nti imasmiṃ pāḷippadese iti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ “ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati,
anya-e0804n:98_4: yā ekadese uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti.
anya-e0804n:104_1: Idha bhassanaṃ nāma sunakhabhassanaṃ adhippetaṃ “sunakho bhassitvā”ti ettha viya,
anya-e0804n:105_0: Dhaka paṭighāte gatiyañca. Paṭighāto paṭihananaṃ. Dhakati.
anya-e0804n:106_0: Caka tittipaṭighātesu. Titti tappanaṃ, paṭighātaṃ paṭihananaṃva. Cakati.
anya-e0804n:107_1: Etā kuādikā akapariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:108_1: Ajjhayanaṃ uccāraṇaṃ sikkhanaṃ vā, ayati, adhīyati,
anya-e0804n:109_1: Ettha “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti pāḷi papubbassa udhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:112_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
anya-e0804n:113_1: Ayaṃ pana vakkasaddo sakkaṭabhāsaṃ patvā kakārarakārasaññogakkhariko bhavati,
anya-e0804n:113_4: Imassa pana vaṅkasaddassa “vaṅka koṭille”ti dhātubhāvo vutto,
anya-e0804n:113_9: Tatta vaṅkatīti kriyāpadaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva nāthatīti kriyāpadamiva.
anya-e0804n:113_10: Bhāvavācakassa pana vaṅkasaddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu punappunaṃ upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0804n:113_13: Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṅkaṃ aṭṭhavaṅkaṃ,
anya-e0804n:117_0: Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
anya-e0804n:119_0: Ettha siyā “nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṃ,
anya-e0804n:119_1: vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo guṇavācako visesanasado,
anya-e0804n:119_3: tena vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ baḷisanti attho viññāyatī”ti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n:119_4: vaṅkasadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena payojanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:119_10: dantiṃ anveti hatthinī”ti ettha nāgasaddassa dantīsaddassa ca aññamaññapariyā yavacanattepi dantinti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṃvaṇṇito,
anya-e0804n:119_11: tathā “baḷisaṃ vaṅka”nti imesampi aññamaññaṃ pariyāyavacanattepi vaṅkanti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo.
anya-e0804n:119_12: Evañhi sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti,
anya-e0804n:119_14: na pana “vaṅkaṃ baḷisa”nti saddānaṃ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo “buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:119_15: viharatī”tiādīsu “buddho bhagavā”ti imesaṃ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa anicchitabbattā.
anya-e0804n:119_16: Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.
anya-e0804n:122_0: “Buddhaṃ buddhaṃ nikhilavisayaṃ suddhiyā yāva suddhi”nti ca ādīsu pana anumato.
anya-e0804n:122_1: Ettha hi “etādiso”ti ca “appaṭipuggalo”ti ca “tathāgato”ti ca “balappatto”ti ca “sambuddho”ti ca “parinibbuto”ti
anya-e0804n:122_3: Tathā “buddhaṃ buddha”nti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ pacchimaṃ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:123_1: vaṅkaṃ maṃsena chādita”nti ettha vaṅkasaddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṃ,
anya-e0804n:123_6: Ettha ca “vaṅkapabbato”ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṃ niruttinayena majjhe animittaṃ takārāgamaṃ katvā “vaṅkatapabbato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:123_10: evaṃ tāpaccayavasena vaṅkatā ca sā pabbato cāti “vaṅkatapabbato”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:123_12: Atha vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti mantuatthe tapaccayo,
anya-e0804n:123_14: Evaṃ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato.
anya-e0804n:124_2: Curādigaṇaṃ pana patvā imissā “loketi, lokayati, oloketi,
anya-e0804n:124_4: Lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0804n:124_6: sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko.
anya-e0804n:124_11: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n:124_12: Lokiyati ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti satto loko.
anya-e0804n:124_13: Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso loko.
anya-e0804n:124_17: Atha vā lokoti tayo lokā kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti.
anya-e0804n:124_19: Bahiddhā pana kavīhi “loko tu bhuvane jane”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:125_5: tathā hi “siloko yasassi pajje”ti kavayo vadanti.
anya-e0804n:126_0: Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo ravo, ussāho vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
anya-e0804n:127_0: Reka saki saṅkāyaṃ. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṃ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
anya-e0804n:130_1: Lolabhāvo loliyaṃ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Kakati, kāko, kākī.
anya-e0804n:131_0: Kuka vaka ādāne. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako.
anya-e0804n:132_0: Vaka dittiyaṃ paṭighāte ca. Ditti sobhā, vakati.
anya-e0804n:133_0: Kaki vaki sakka tika ṭika seka gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati,
anya-e0804n:133_6: Ettha ṭīkāti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṃvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā.
anya-e0804n:133_7: Etā idhātuādikā sekapariyantā dhātuyo “attanobhāsā”ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n:134_1: Abyattasaddo avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati, hikkate.
anya-e0804n:134_5: bādhatī”tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.
anya-e0804n:137_1: Pakathanaṃ ācikkhanaṃ desanaṃ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti.
anya-e0804n:137_14: Keci pana “svākhāto”ti ca “svākkhyāto”ti ca “svākhyāto”ti ca padamicchanti.
anya-e0804n:137_15: Tattha pacchimāni sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttāni,
anya-e0804n:140_5: Atha vā khiyanti kilesā etthāti khayo,
anya-e0804n:148_3: Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ. Sukhito, dukkhito.
anya-e0804n:148_12: Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sukhadukkhasaddatthaṃ vadantehi garūhi
anya-e0804n:153_1: Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo curādigaṇeyeva vuttā.
anya-e0804n:153_3: Mayaṃ tu tesaṃ tabbacanaṃ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā,
anya-e0804n:154_0: Nanu ca bho “sukhati dukkhatī”ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:154_1: evaṃ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n:154_2: Na hi sabbathā sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti,
anya-e0804n:154_6: “Kappayavho patissatā”ti hi diṭṭhe “caravho bhuñjavho”tiādīnipi nayavasena diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0804n:155_1: Visuddhimaggādīsu hi “ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ gatassa vāyo kuppati,
anya-e0804n:155_2: gattāni dukkhantī”ti evaṃ bhūvādigaṇikaṃ akammakaṃ suddhakattuvācakaṃ “dukkhantī”ti kriyāpadaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:155_3: Tasmiṃ diṭṭhiyeva “sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi, sukhatha. Sukhāmi,
anya-e0804n:155_6: dukkhathā”tiādīnica diṭṭhāni nāma honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā,
anya-e0804n:155_14: Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito.
anya-e0804n:156_7: Keci panimaṃ “mokkha mocane”ti paṭhitvā curādigaṇe pakkhipanti.
anya-e0804n:156_16: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho”ti aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti,
anya-e0804n:156_23: Evaṃ imassa dhātuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito,
anya-e0804n:156_24: hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo vidito muca paca chidādayo viya.
anya-e0804n:158_0: Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
anya-e0804n:160_0: Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
anya-e0804n:164_2: Ettha nakkhattanti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:164_3: Porāṇā pana “nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī”ti kathayiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:169_2: “Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsagāho āsappanā
anya-e0804n:169_3: parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho” iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā.
anya-e0804n:172_0: Kakhi iccāyaṃ. Dhanaṃ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṃ. Abhikaṅkhitaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:173_0: Dakhi dhakhi ghoravāsite kaṅkhāyañca. Daṅkhati. Dhaṅkhati.
anya-e0804n:176_0: Jakkha bhakkhaṇe ca. Hasanānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ cakāro. Jakkhati.
anya-e0804n:177_2: Atisallekhatevāyaṃ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṃ, lekhako, likhitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:179_1: Varaṇaṃ saṃvaraṇaṃ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho.
anya-e0804n:181_0: Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
anya-e0804n:182_0: Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo”ti.
anya-e0804n:183_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca sālasaddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto,
anya-e0804n:183_2: atha kimatthaṃ sālasaddena yo koci rukkho vutto”ti?
anya-e0804n:183_4: atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṃ kasmiñci rukkhepi “sālo”ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā.
anya-e0804n:183_6: Yathāha “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:186_1: Yathāha “atha kho taṃ bhikkhave māluvabījaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sālamūle nipateyyā”ti.
anya-e0804n:191_2: sikkhitaṃ sippaṃ, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho, asekkho.
anya-e0804n:191_6: tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati “ahaṃ kho pana susikkhito anavayo sake ācariyake kumbhakārakamme”ti.
anya-e0804n:192_5: Ettha pana “bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito anagāro tapassī tapodhano” iccetāni pariyāyavacanāni.
anya-e0804n:193_0: Dakkha vuddhiyaṃ sīghatte ca. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho.
anya-e0804n:193_1: Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti dakkhiṇā,
anya-e0804n:193_3: Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho, cheko,
anya-e0804n:194_6: nanu ca bho sarabhaṅgajātake “gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:194_7: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”ti etasmiṃ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “ciradikkhitānanti cirapabbajitāna”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:194_9: Evaṃ sante kasmā idha “dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye vuttā”ti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:194_10: tattha pana dikkhitasaddassa pabbajite vattanato “cirapabbajitāna”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:194_13: Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena dikkhitasaddena vattuṃ yuttā.
anya-e0804n:194_14: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṃ “kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā”ti
anya-e0804n:194_15: imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe “tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārenti,
anya-e0804n:194_17: tena vuttaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā”ti evaṃ attho saṃvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n:197_5: samavisamaṃ abhibyattaṃ vadantaṃ viya hotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:197_7: madhuṃ cakkhatī”tiādīsu viya yasmā assādatthopi cakkhusaddo bhavati,
anya-e0804n:197_8: tasmā “cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotī”ti assādatthopi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:197_9: “Cakkhuṃ kho māgaṇḍiyaṃ rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita”nti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:197_10: Satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane eva cakkhusaddo pavattati paṅkajādisaddā viya padumādīsu.
anya-e0804n:203_0: Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo vaccakaraṇaṃ. Gavati. Ge sadde. Gāyati. Gītaṃ.
anya-e0804n:204_3: Tathā hi nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yo so majjhe assatarīrathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena.
anya-e0804n:204_5: amaccharī dānapatī virocatī”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ vadantehi “suvaggitenāti sundaragamanenā”ti.
anya-e0804n:204_6: Kiñci bhiyyo kriyāpadampi ca diṭṭhaṃ “dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare”ti.
anya-e0804n:205_0: Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca.
anya-e0804n:205_1: Cakāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati. Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī,
anya-e0804n:205_2: samaṅgitā, aṅgaṃ, aṅgaṇaṃ. Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṃ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṃ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṃ. Liṅgati. Liṅganaṃ.
anya-e0804n:205_5: Tattha aṅganti yesaṃ kesañci vatthūnaṃ avayavo,
anya-e0804n:205_8: Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgipuggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti “aṅgaṇānī”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:205_9: Katthaci malaṃ vā paṅko vā “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n:205_13: Añjati tattha ṭhitaṃ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:210_0: Laga saṅgeca. Ca kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṃ. Baḷise laggo.
anya-e0804n:212_0: Agga kuṭilagatiyaṃ. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:213_0: Aggi dhūmasikho joti, jātavedo sikhī gini;
anya-e0804n:223_3: Etissā pana divādigaṇaṃ pattāya “ghāyati ghāyitvā”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:225_0: Jaggha hasane. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
anya-e0804n:230_0: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.
anya-e0804n:232_0: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṃ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
anya-e0804n:239_0: Suca soke. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṃ, socanto, socantī, socantaṃ kulaṃ, socitvā.
anya-e0804n:240_0: Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:241_0: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
anya-e0804n:242_0: Luñca apanayane. Luñcati. Luñcako, luñcituṃ, luñcitvā.
anya-e0804n:244_0: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṃ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati.
anya-e0804n:245_0: Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ, corikā. Tassa kriyā theyyakaraṇaṃ. Gocati. Gaṇecati.
anya-e0804n:250_0: Taca saṃvaraṇe. Saṃvaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Tacati. Taco.
anya-e0804n:254_4: Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0804n:254_6: na evaṃ vacanasaṅkhāto saddo “abyattasaddo”ti vuccati viññātatthattā. “Vatti, vacati, vacanti.
anya-e0804n:254_13: Garū pana vakārassa ukārādesavasena “uttaṃ uccate uccante”tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n:254_16: Sāsanasmiñhi rakārāgamavisaye nipubbasseva vacassa vassa ukārādeso siddho “nirutti, niruttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:254_17: nerutta”nti. Vacanaṃ, vācā, vaco, vacī, vuttaṃ, pavuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:254_22: imāni nāmikapadāni. Vattuṃ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna,
anya-e0804n:255_5: vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0804n:255_10: vacantī”tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya.
anya-e0804n:256_0: Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṃ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṃ, vacimhe.
anya-e0804n:258_0: Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṃ, avaciṃsu. Avoco,
anya-e0804n:258_1: avocuttha. Avociṃ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṃ. Avocaṃ, avocimhe.
anya-e0804n:260_8: Aparānipi vacadhātussa bhavissantī sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti –
anya-e0804n:263_0: Imamhi kappe caritaṃ, pavakkhissaṃ suṇohi me”ti.
anya-e0804n:264_0: Gadratapañhepi “rājā tumhehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā gahapati patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī”ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati,
anya-e0804n:265_4: Idha pana vuttasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0804n:266_0: Cu cavane. Cavati. Kārite “cāvetī”ti rūpaṃ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṃ padumaṃ. Cavituṃ, cavitvā.
anya-e0804n:271_4: Tattha ucchāyo malaharaṇaṃ. Mañcati. Mañco, mañcanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:272_0: Paca byattikaraṇe. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:275_6: Ayañca divādigaṇe ruciatthaṃ gahetvā “ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ janeti.
anya-e0804n:275_8: Curādigaṇe pana ruciatthaṃ gahetvā “roceti rocayatī”ti rūpāni janeti.
anya-e0804n:275_9: Tena “kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesī”tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n:276_0: Paca saṃpāke. Pacati, pacanti. Saddasatthavidū pana “attanobhāsā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n:278_7: Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṃ maṇiṃ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti,
anya-e0804n:279_3: Yathā pana sāsane “paṇḍitoti pavuccatī”ti vacadhātussa kammani rūpaṃ pasiddhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:279_5: Evaṃ santepi garū “tayā paccate odano”ti tassa kammani rūpaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:279_6: Sāsane pana avisesato “paccate”ti vā “paccatī”ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko payogo icchitabbo “devadatto niraye paccati.
anya-e0804n:279_8: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya bhūvādigaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo esa,
anya-e0804n:279_9: tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho vattabbo”ti tanna,
anya-e0804n:279_10: “sayameva pīyate pānīya”nti ettha hi pānīyaṃ manussā pivanti,
anya-e0804n:279_13: Evaṃ parassa pānakriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṃ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṃ
anya-e0804n:279_14: viya hotīti “sayameva pīyate pānīya”nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n:280_0: “Sayameva kaṭo kariyate”ti etthāpi kaṭaṃ manussā karonti,
anya-e0804n:280_3: Evaṃ parassa karaṇakriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi so sukaraṇa kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya
anya-e0804n:280_4: hotīti “sayameva kaṭo kariyate”ti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n:281_0: Ettha yathā sayaṃsaddo pānīyaṃ pānīyeneva pīyate,
anya-e0804n:281_3: na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṃ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthavisesaṃ vadati,
anya-e0804n:281_5: kammaṃ paccatī”tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito sayaṃsaddo atthavisesaṃ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṃ payogānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:281_8: Pacadhātu saddasatthe divādigaṇa vutto natthīti ce?
anya-e0804n:281_12: tasmā mayaṃ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṃ pacadhātuṃ divādigaṇepi pakkhipissāma.
anya-e0804n:281_13: Tathā hi dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyādīhi abhisaṅkhatā divādigaṇikappayogā dissanti –-
anya-e0804n:283_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
anya-e0804n:285_1: Ettha pana tesaṃ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0804n:285_2: Ye curādigaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena bhūvādigaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa bhūdhātusseva bhūvādigaṇe
anya-e0804n:285_3: pavattassa sakamakassapi sato divādigaṇaṃ patvā akammakabhūtassa pacadhātussa sakammakattamicchanti.
anya-e0804n:285_4: Etañhi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā,
anya-e0804n:285_5: tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṃ saṃsayasamugghāṭatthaṃ ettha imaṃ nītiṃ paṭṭhapema –
anya-e0804n:288_9: Ettha ca sayaṃsaddaṃ ajjhāharitvā “sayameva odano paccatī”tiādinā vuttepi “puriso sayameva pāṇaṃ hanati.
anya-e0804n:288_10: Bhagavā sayameva ñeyyadhammaṃ abujjhī”ti payogesu parassa āṇattisambhūtahananakriyāpaṭisedhamiva paropadesasambhūtabujjhanakriyāpaṭisedhanamiva
anya-e0804n:288_11: ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo sayaṃsaddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo,
anya-e0804n:291_0: Kāmaguṇehi dibbati. Paccāmitte dibbati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:293_0: Payogato sakammā ca, akammā ca gamādayo.
anya-e0804n:294_0: Puriso maggaṃ gacchati. Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṃ gacchati. Dhammaṃ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
anya-e0804n:297_0: Pāsādaṃ passati, pāsādaṃ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:300_0: Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
anya-e0804n:306_0: Tattha yadi sāsane pacadhātussa kammani rūpaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n:306_1: “purisena kammaṃ kariyatī”ti payogo viya “purisena odano paciyatī”ti payogo icchitabbo.
anya-e0804n:306_2: Ye pana garū “tayā paccate odano”tiādīni icchanti,
anya-e0804n:306_6: Kārite “puriso purisena purisaṃ vā odanaṃ pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti,
anya-e0804n:306_13: gāvaṃ pāceti gocara”ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:307_0: Pacaṃ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṃ, pacitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:307_3: Ettha ca “imassa maṃsañca pātabba”nti payogo udāharaṇaṃ. “Pacati, pacanti.
anya-e0804n:312_0: Paraṃ na byākarissaṃ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
anya-e0804n:313_0: Chu chedane. Choti. Chotvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ. Acchocchuṃvata bho rukkhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:314_2: Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
anya-e0804n:316_0: Achi āyāme. Añcati. Dīghaṃ vā añchanto dīghaṃ añchāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0804n:318_0: Muccha mohamucchāsu. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
anya-e0804n:321_0: Uchi uñche. Uñcho pariyesanaṃ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.
anya-e0804n:323_0: Puccha pañhe pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā.
anya-e0804n:323_4: Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti.
anya-e0804n:325_0: Vacchu chedane. Vucchati. Vuttā, vuttavā, vuttasiro. Vakāragatassa akārassa uttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:326_0: Vuttasaddo kesoharaṇepi dissati “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu.
anya-e0804n:326_1: Ettha ca sirasaddena siroruhā vuttā yathā mañcasaddena mañcaṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n:328_0: Kesohāre ropite ca, kathite ca yathākkamanti.
anya-e0804n:329_1: vuttasaddo “no ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati.
anya-e0804n:333_1: vuttasaddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre jīvitavuttiyaṃ pamuttabhāve pāvacanavasena
anya-e0804n:335_0: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti
anya-e0804n:336_4: “Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve.
anya-e0804n:336_5: “Yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samīhita”ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite.
anya-e0804n:341_0: Pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane cāti lakkhaye;
anya-e0804n:345_6: Ettha jayāpesunti “jayatu bhava”nti āsīsavacanaṃ vadiṃsūti attho. Jayanaṃ, jitaṃ, jayo, vijitaṃ, jino, jetā, jeto,
anya-e0804n:345_8: māraṃ jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino,
anya-e0804n:345_9: anodhijino, jito. Vijito, jetuṃ, vijetuṃ, jitvā, vijitvā.
anya-e0804n:345_10: Imassa pana dhātussa kiyādigaṇaṃ pattassa “jināti jinitvā”tyādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:347_1: Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṃ, javo, javaṃ, javanto,
anya-e0804n:348_2: Sāsanānurūpena “kiṃ maṃ dhanena jīyethā”ti hi pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:352_0: Sakā raṭṭhā pabbājito, aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato;
anya-e0804n:354_0: Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṃ. Ettha dhajoti ketu. Dhañjananti gamanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:355_3: Imāni panassa pariyāyavacanāni “ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo”ti.
anya-e0804n:355_8: Tathā hi janakajātake ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṃ vuttā.
anya-e0804n:355_9: Apica ajeḷakanti ajato eḷakassa visuṃ vacanato eḷakasaddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo,
anya-e0804n:356_0: Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṃ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
anya-e0804n:358_0: Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṃ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho cakāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
anya-e0804n:360_0: Khaji gativekalle. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṃ, khañjituṃ, khañjitvā.
anya-e0804n:361_1: Ettha ca ejāti lābhādiṃ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā,
anya-e0804n:362_0: Buja vajiranibbese. Vajiranigghoseti keci vidū vadanti. Bojati.
anya-e0804n:363_0: Khija kuji guji abyattasadde. Khijati. Kuñjati. Guñjati.
anya-e0804n:364_0: Laja lāja tajja bhassane. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
anya-e0804n:366_0: Jaja jaji yuddhe. Yujjhanaṃ yuddhaṃ. Jajati. Jañjati.
anya-e0804n:368_0: Tuji balane ca. Balanaṃ balanakriyā. Hiṃsāpekkhako cakāro. Tuñjati.
anya-e0804n:369_0: Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati.
anya-e0804n:370_0: Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
anya-e0804n:372_0: Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
anya-e0804n:373_0: Hatthipoto hatthicchāpo, bhiṅko ca kalabho bhave.
anya-e0804n:374_0: Caja cāge. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṃ. Cajaṃ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
anya-e0804n:375_0: Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṃ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṃ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṃ. Sajitvā.
anya-e0804n:377_0: Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṃ tāpakaraṇaṃ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.
anya-e0804n:378_0: Eja bheja bhāja dittiyaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Ejati. Bhejati. Bhājati.
anya-e0804n:379_7: Atha vā tejoti tejanaṃ usmā uṇhattaṃ tāpo.
anya-e0804n:382_0: Rāja dittiyaṃ bhāja ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā.
anya-e0804n:384_0: Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0804n:385_0: Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade “me ahi mahī”ti chedo “puttā me atthi puttā matthī”ti viya.
anya-e0804n:385_1: “Mahi arāja mahārājā”ti ca chedo “yopi ayaṃ yopāya”nti viya.
anya-e0804n:385_2: Ettha arājasaddo “atikaramakarācariyā”ti ettha akarīti atthavācako akarasaddo viya ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:385_4: Ayaṃ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho “mahārāja me ahi arāja,
anya-e0804n:385_6: na etassa iti vatvā dve ahituṇḍikajanā kalahaṃ kariṃsū”ti.
anya-e0804n:386_2: Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṃ. Rajako. Rāgo. Virāgo.
anya-e0804n:386_4: Imassa ca divādigaṇaṃ pattassa “rajjati virajjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:387_0: Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
anya-e0804n:388_0: Satti āsatti mucchā ca, lubbhitattañca lubbhanā.
anya-e0804n:389_0: Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
anya-e0804n:390_0: Vanañca vanatho ceva, apekkhā bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0804n:391_0: Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;
anya-e0804n:394_4: Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṃ rañjetītipi rājā.
anya-e0804n:395_0: Rājā bhūpati devo ca, manujindo disampati;
anya-e0804n:406_0: Bhaja sevāyaṃ. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.
anya-e0804n:407_4: bhavo vā yattha labbhatī”ti gāthāyaṃ saṅgatasaddena samodhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:407_10: Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṃ. Yañño. Yāgo.
anya-e0804n:408_0: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ. Majjati. Bāhiraṃ parimajjati. Bhūmiṃ sammajjati. Majjanaṃ. Sammajjanī.
anya-e0804n:409_4: Ayaṃ pana pāḷi “tato tvaṃ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī”ti.
anya-e0804n:411_0: Bhaja pāke. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
anya-e0804n:412_0: Uju ajjave. Ajjavaṃ ujubhāvo. Ojati. Uju.
anya-e0804n:413_0: Saja vissaggaparissajjanabbhukkiraṇesu. Sajati. Lokyaṃ sajantaṃ udakaṃ.
anya-e0804n:415_11: Ettha ca vibhujatīti chindati. Bhogo. Bhogī. Ābhogo.
anya-e0804n:415_13: Ettha ca bhogoti bhujayati kuṭilaṃ kariyatīti bhogo,
anya-e0804n:416_3: Tassattho “idaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ tathāgatagandhahatthino mahāvajirañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇadantehi rañjitaṃ ārañjitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:416_5: Rañjitanti hi rañjati vijjhati etthāti ruñjitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:416_7: “Idaṃ nesaṃ padakkanta”ntiādimhi viya etassa saddassa siddhi veditabbā adhikaraṇatthasambhavato.
anya-e0804n:417_2: tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi. Vejati. Vego.
anya-e0804n:417_4: Saṃvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego, vātavego.
anya-e0804n:417_7: Divādigaṇaṃ pana pattassa “vijjati saṃvijjati ubbijjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n:418_0: Lajja lajjane. Lajjati. Lajjā. Lajjāti hirī. Yā “viriḷanā”tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:420_7: Tattha kujjati nikujjatīti imāni “carati vicaratī”ti padāni viya samānatthāni,
anya-e0804n:421_0: Mujja osīdane. Mujjati. Nimujjati. Nimuggo. Ummuggo.
anya-e0804n:426_5: Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo.
anya-e0804n:426_8: na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle
anya-e0804n:426_11: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharantīti.
anya-e0804n:426_12: Ayaṃ panattho “adhipubbassa i ajjhayane”ti dhātussa vasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:426_13: Evaṃ adhipubbassa idhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:427_0: Jhe dittiyaṃ. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha jhāyatīti jalati. Jhāyanajalanasaddā hi ekatthā.
anya-e0804n:429_0: Ujjha ussagge. Ussaggo chaḍḍanaṃ. Ujjhati. Ujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:432_0: Ñā avabodhane. “Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya,
anya-e0804n:432_1: ñeyyu”ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṃ gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṃ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā, saññāṇaṃ, paññā, paññāṇaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:433_4: Aññoti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño,
anya-e0804n:433_16: tasmā ñātītiādīni ākhyātikapadāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena.
anya-e0804n:433_17: Tathā hi aññātīti ettha āiti upasaggo,
anya-e0804n:433_18: so parassakkharassa saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṃ katvā niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0804n:435_0: Ettha ñattīti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho.
anya-e0804n:435_1: Ayañca ñattisaddo “vatti etāyāti vācā”ti ettha vattisaddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:435_2: Tathā ādatteti ettha vibhattibhūtassa tesaddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa tisaddassa saññogabhāvo ca dhātuantassarassa rassattañca.
anya-e0804n:435_3: Manuññanti manaṃ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:435_4: Ayamattho manasaddūpapadassa āpubbassimassa ñādhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:435_5: Paññattīti nānappakārato pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ñatti māraṇaṃ paññatti.
anya-e0804n:435_6: Atha vā dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:435_8: tathā sotūnaṃ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṃ paññattīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:445_0: Laṭa bālye ca. Pubbāpekkhāya cakāro. Laṭati. Lāṭo.
anya-e0804n:448_0: Khiṭa uttāsane. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
anya-e0804n:450_0: Jaṭa ghaṭa saṅghāte. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī.
anya-e0804n:451_0: Bhaṭa bhattiyaṃ. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṃ bhaṭako yathā.
anya-e0804n:452_0: Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṃ.
anya-e0804n:455_2: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā”tiādīsu yasmiṃ kismiñci bhājane.
anya-e0804n:456_0: Haṭa dittiyaṃ. Haṭati. Hāṭakaṃ, haṭakaṃ. Yaṃ jātarūpaṃ haṭakanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:461_0: Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṃ. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati.
anya-e0804n:462_0: Paṭo coḷo sāṭako ca, vāso vasanamaṃsukaṃ;
anya-e0804n:467_0: Ruṭi luṭi theyye. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
anya-e0804n:472_0: Ghaṭa cetāyaṃ. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. Ghaṭo vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n:473_0: Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
anya-e0804n:475_0: Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
anya-e0804n:478_0: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.
anya-e0804n:485_1: Gatinivatti uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n:485_8: Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e0804n:486_1: “Kiṃ panāyasmā devānamindo kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto”tiādīsu hi issariye dissati.
anya-e0804n:486_5: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttibhāvena,
anya-e0804n:492_0: Evaṃvidhaṃ tuṃpaccayantādivibhāgaṃ sabbattha yathārahaṃ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena na vadāma.
anya-e0804n:492_1: Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṃ sabbattha yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:493_3: thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṃ bhikkhūti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:497_1: Balakkāro nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṃ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṃ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
anya-e0804n:498_0: Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
anya-e0804n:500_0: Saṭha ketave ca. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati. Saṭho saṭhoti kerāṭiko vuccati.
anya-e0804n:502_0: Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Cakāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
anya-e0804n:504_0: Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṃ. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
anya-e0804n:505_0: Veṭha veṭhane. Veṭhati, nibbeṭhati. Veṭhanaṃ, nibbeṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:508_0: Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṃ. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:514_0: Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṃ gamanamatte ca. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno.
anya-e0804n:516_0: Ito bahiddhā pāsaṇḍā, diṭṭhīsu pasīdanti te;
anya-e0804n:517_0: Na tesaṃ dhammaṃ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
anya-e0804n:518_0: Ettha ca pāsaṇḍāti pāsaṃ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā,
anya-e0804n:518_2: Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṃ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.
anya-e0804n:519_0: Muḍi kaṇḍane. Muṇḍati. Kumāraṃ muṇḍiṃsu. Muṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:523_0: Huḍi piḍi saṅghāte. Huṇḍati. Piṇḍati. Piṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:526_0: Vaḍi maḍi veṭhane. Vaṇḍati. Maṇḍati. Maṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:529_0: Tuḍi toḷane. Tuṇḍati. Tuṇḍo. Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya.
anya-e0804n:531_0: Caḍi kope. Caṇḍati. Caṇḍo. Caṇḍālo, caṇḍikkaṃ.
anya-e0804n:534_2: Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṃ jānātīti “paṇḍā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:534_3: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n:534_4: Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n:541_0: Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.
anya-e0804n:544_0: Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde. Aṇati.
anya-e0804n:544_1: Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṃ. Vaṇati. Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo.
anya-e0804n:545_0: Brāhmaṇo sottiyo vippo, bhovādī brahmabandhu ca;
anya-e0804n:547_0: Raṇasaddo “saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā”tiādīsu kilesesu vattati.
anya-e0804n:547_1: Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:550_1: Raṇaṃ katvāti hi yuddhaṃ katvāti attho.
anya-e0804n:550_3: dhāviṃsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato”ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati.
anya-e0804n:550_4: Raṇaṃ karontāti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontāti attho.
anya-e0804n:550_5: Evaṃ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṃ antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:560_0: Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
anya-e0804n:567_0: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṃ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṃsabāhu.
anya-e0804n:570_0: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṃ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
anya-e0804n:572_2: Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:577_0: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti.
anya-e0804n:583_7: “Gotamo kassapo”ti hi ādinā pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti gottaṃ.
anya-e0804n:583_8: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
anya-e0804n:583_10: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:583_12: Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:584_0: Nakkhattanti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ,
anya-e0804n:584_2: Tathā hi assayujo bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī
anya-e0804n:584_3: uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṃ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṃ pubbāsaḷhaṃ uttarāsaḷhaṃ sāvaṇaṃ dhanasiṭṭhā
anya-e0804n:584_4: satabhisattaṃ pubbabhaddapadaṃ uttarabhaddapadaṃ revatī cāti sattavīsati nakkhattāni.
anya-e0804n:584_5: Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci sīghaṃ kiñci dandhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:584_8: etto ito cāti evaṃ visamagatiyā agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano
anya-e0804n:584_10: Evaṃ imāni nakkhanaṃ gamanaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti nakkhattānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:584_11: Porāṇā pana kharadhātuvasena “nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī”ti āvocuṃ,
anya-e0804n:584_12: “nakkhattaṃ joti rikkhaṃ taṃ” iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṃ nāmāni.
anya-e0804n:584_13: “Uḷu tārā tārakā”ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāmāni.
anya-e0804n:585_3: Īkārantavasena vuttattā asmā dhātuto saki saṅkāyanti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti.
anya-e0804n:587_3: tasmā bhavābhavaṃ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṃ anekavihitaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ atati satataṃ gacchati
anya-e0804n:587_6: attabhāvo”ti ca “sukhadukkhaṃ adati anubhavatīti attā”ti ca “attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano”ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0804n:587_7: yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
anya-e0804n:587_8: tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.
anya-e0804n:589_2: Idha anta saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate “antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariya”nti ettha dvattiṃsākārantogadhaṃ kuṇapantaṃ antaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n:589_4: Haritantaṃ vā”ti ettha antimamariyādanto anto nāma.
anya-e0804n:593_6: Etāni hi taṃdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti “āyatanānī”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:593_7: Ettha pana nītanudhātūnaṃ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo siyā,
anya-e0804n:594_0: Āyatanasaddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca.
anya-e0804n:594_1: Tathā hi “loke issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhāne āyatanasaddo vattati.
anya-e0804n:594_6: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇe vattatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:595_0: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n:597_3: kāḷo bako iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ titthiyasatthaṃ,
anya-e0804n:597_5: yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito “na seve lokāyatikaṃ,
anya-e0804n:597_7: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ, kintaṃ?
anya-e0804n:597_9: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
anya-e0804n:597_13: lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṃ paralokanibbānānaṃ paṭisedhakaṃ vitaṇḍasatthasippa”nti.
anya-e0804n:598_0: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṃ udīraṇaṃ. Yotati. Jotati.
anya-e0804n:599_4: Ettha ca jutīti āloko siri vā.
anya-e0804n:599_7: Vuttampi ceta sirimāvimāna vatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jotīti candimasūriyanakkhattatārakānaṃ sādhāraṇanāma”nti.
anya-e0804n:599_8: Atha vā “joti jotiparāyaṇo”ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā ca rūpasobhāyuttattā ca,
anya-e0804n:600_3: tathāpi idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati.
anya-e0804n:601_0: Setaṃ sitaṃ suci sukkaṃ, paṇḍaraṃ dhavalampi ca;
anya-e0804n:603_0: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṃvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:606_0: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṃ, ketako, saṅketo.
anya-e0804n:609_0: Catī hiṃsāgandhesu. Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.
anya-e0804n:612_3: “Chetvā vanaṃ vanathañcā”ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṃ nāma,
anya-e0804n:612_4: khuddakā pana tasmiṃ vane ṭhitattā vanatho nāma vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:613_0: Thu thutiyaṃ. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
anya-e0804n:614_0: Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
anya-e0804n:617_0: Thavanā ca pasaṃsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;
anya-e0804n:619_7: Thīyati saṅghātaṃ gacchati gabbho etissāti thī.
anya-e0804n:619_8: Ācariyā pana itthīsaddasseva evaṃ nibbacanaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0804n:620_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti thī iti no ruci;
anya-e0804n:621_0: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti itthīti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n:623_0: Ayaṃ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṃ bho suṇātha me.
anya-e0804n:626_0: Appānaṃ bahutā ñāye, gahite sati yujjati;
anya-e0804n:627_0: Tathā hi “dve duve, taṇhā, tasiṇā”ti nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:630_0: Icchatīti nare itthī, icchāpetīti vā pana;
anya-e0804n:633_0: Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
anya-e0804n:634_0: Kantā sīmaninī mātu-gāmo piyā ca kāminī.
anya-e0804n:637_0: Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;
anya-e0804n:639_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:639_4: Atho jaraṃ appattā yuvatītipi taruṇītipi māṇavikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:639_5: Jaraṃ pattā pana therītipi mahallikātipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:640_3: rājaputtī ca dārika”nti ca “acchā kaṇhājinaṃ kañña”nti ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī dārikāsaddena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n:640_9: niccaṃ nigaḷamaṇḍite”ti ca imāsaṃ pana pāḷīnaṃ vasena yā itthī dārikāsadena vattabbā,
anya-e0804n:640_13: Apicettha “rājakaññā rucā nāmā”ti ca “tato maddimpi nhāpesuṃ,
anya-e0804n:640_14: sivikaññā samāgatā”ti ca imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā,
anya-e0804n:641_1: yaṃ tumhehi “aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:641_3: jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko”ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso dārako hotu,
anya-e0804n:641_5: ramamānaṃ sake pure”ti pāḷiyaṃ pana puttadārehi saṃvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṃ “kumāro”ti vattuṃ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā?
anya-e0804n:641_7: Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṃ yaṃ veneyyajanānurūpaṃ desanaṃ desetuṃ icchati,
anya-e0804n:641_9: tasmā bhagavatā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ atthitaṃ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṃ desanā katā.
anya-e0804n:641_10: Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva vohariyati.
anya-e0804n:641_11: “Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti ettha pana sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo
anya-e0804n:641_12: tasmiṃ there adhimattavissāso hutvā komāravādena ovadanto kumārakoti avocāti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:641_13: Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṃ,
anya-e0804n:643_0: Kuthi puthi luthi hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu. Kunthati. Kuntho,
anya-e0804n:644_1: Nāthadhātu yācane upatāpe issariye āsīsane cāti catūsvatthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n:644_5: “sādhu bhikkhave bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā’tiādinā taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti attho,
anya-e0804n:644_6: paramena cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte vā guṇehi īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā ‘nātho’ti vuccatīti nāthatīti nātho”ti.
anya-e0804n:644_7: Saddasatthavidū pana tesu catūsu atthesu nātha nādha iti dhātudvayaṃ paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n:644_8: Attanobhāsattā pana tassa “nāthate nādhate”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:645_1: evaṃ sante yo koci yācako daliddo,
anya-e0804n:645_4: so na nāthati na yācatīti anātho siyā”ti? Na,
anya-e0804n:645_5: nāthasaddo hi yācanatthādīsu pavattamāno lokasaṅketavasena uttamapurisesu nirūḷho,
anya-e0804n:645_7: tena taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācatīti nāthasaddassattho vutto.
anya-e0804n:645_10: Natthi nātho etassāti vā anātho”ti dabbapaṭisedhavasena,
anya-e0804n:645_11: na pana “na nāthati na yācatīti anātho”ti dhātuatthapaṭisedhavasena.
anya-e0804n:645_12: Yo hi aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti, so nātho,
anya-e0804n:645_13: yo ca aññassa saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā na hoti,
anya-e0804n:645_14: nāpi attano añño saraṇaṃ gati patiṭṭhā hoti,
anya-e0804n:645_18: Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne “lokanātho tuvaṃ eko,
anya-e0804n:645_19: saraṇaṃ sabbapāṇina”nti ca “anāthānaṃ bhavaṃ nātho”ti ca –
anya-e0804n:648_1: Yasmā pana sāsane ca loke ca yācako “nātho”ti na vuccati,
anya-e0804n:648_8: Tasmā paññavatā sabbesu ṭhānesu dhātuatthamattena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvitvā yathānurūpaṃ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:652_6: aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato”ti ca “idhekacco katthī hoti vikatthī,
anya-e0804n:652_7: so katthati ‘ahamasmi sīlasampannoti vā vattasampannoti vā vikatthatī’ti” ca ādayo payogā.
anya-e0804n:654_0: Sutha kutha katha hiṃsāyaṃ. Sothati. Kothati. Kathati.
anya-e0804n:655_2: So duvidho mahājanena padasā paṭipajjitabbo pakatimaggo ca paṇḍitehinibbānatthikehi paṭipajjitabbo paṭipadāsaṅkhāto ariyamaggo cāti.
anya-e0804n:655_3: Tattha pakatimaggo uppannakiccākiccehi janehi pathiyati gacchiyatīti patho,
anya-e0804n:655_4: paṭipadā pana amatamahāpuraṃ gantukāmehi kulaputtehi saddhāpātheyyaṃ gahetvā pathiyati paṭipajjiyatīti patho.
anya-e0804n:655_5: Atha vā pātheti kārakaṃ puggalaṃ gameti nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti vā patho,
anya-e0804n:663_9: Imāni kāritapadāni hetukattupadānīti ca vuccanti taddīpakattā.
anya-e0804n:663_14: Ayañca dā dāneti dhātu sāsanānurūpasutivasena divādigaṇaṃ patvā supanakriyaṃ vadanto “dāyati niddāyati
anya-e0804n:663_16: Dānamavakhaṇḍanañca vadanto “diyati dānaṃ dātta”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati.
anya-e0804n:663_17: Suddhiṃvadanto “dāyati vedāyati vodāna”nti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayati,
anya-e0804n:663_18: imasmiṃ pana bhūvādigaṇe dānaṃ vadanto āpubbavasena gahaṇañca vadanto “dadāti deti ādadāti ādeti dānaṃ
anya-e0804n:663_20: Tathā kucchitagamanaṃ vadanto “dāti suddāti suddo suddī”ti sanāmapadāni suddhakattupadāni janayatīti ayaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:664_0: Idānissa nāmapadāni tumantādīni brūma. “Dānaṃ, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:664_2: dakkhiṇā” iccādīni, “dātuṃ, padātuṃ, dātave, padātave, datvā, datvāna, dadātuna, daditvā,
anya-e0804n:664_3: daditvāna, dadiya, dajjā, dadiyāna, ādātuṃ, ādāya,
anya-e0804n:665_1: dadanti etenāti atthe na deyyadhammo dānacetanā ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:665_5: “Dānaṃ dinna”ntiādīsu hi dinnasaddaṭṭhāne dattasaddo na dissati,
anya-e0804n:667_0: “Manasā dānaṃ mayā dinnaṃ”, iti dinnapadaṃ viya.
anya-e0804n:670_0: Tasmā “devadatto”tiādīsu “devena dinno”ti samāsaṃ katvā paṇṇattivacanattā dinnasaddassa dattādeso kātabbo sāsanānurūpena.
anya-e0804n:670_1: Upari hi “dinnassa datto kvaci paṇṇattiya”nti lakkhaṇaṃ passissatha.
anya-e0804n:681_0: Ediso pāḷiyaṃ natthi, nayo tasmā na so varo;
anya-e0804n:691_0: Koci pana saddasatthavidū garu evaṃ saddaracanamakāsi –
anya-e0804n:696_0: Ettha ca brahmadattanti idaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:696_2: Pāḷinayañhipatvā “brahmadattiya”nti vā “brahmadinna”nti vā “devadattiya”nti vā “devadinna”nti vā rūpena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:696_3: Tathā hi “bodhisatto ca maddī ca sammodamānā sakkadattiye assame vasiṃsū”ti pāḷinayānurūpo aṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati.
anya-e0804n:699_0: Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Atra pana paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇavasena yathārahaṃ padakkamo bhavati.
anya-e0804n:700_0: Dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma, dadāmase. Dadeyya, dade, dajjā.
anya-e0804n:704_0: Na hi sabbappakārena, pāḷiyo paṭibhanti no.
anya-e0804n:705_0: Tattha asmākaṃ khantiyā “dajjā dajja”ntiādīni yyakārasahiteyeva sattamiyā padarūpe sijjhanti.
anya-e0804n:705_1: “Dajjā sappuriso dāna”nti ettha hi “dajjā idaṃ “dadeyyā”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ
anya-e0804n:705_2: katvā tato tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ saṃyogañca tīsusaññogabyañjanesu dvinnaṃ sarūpānamekassa lopañca dyakārasaññogassa
anya-e0804n:705_3: ca jakāradvayaṃ katvā tato dīghavasenuccāritabbattā animittaṃ dīghabhāvaṃ katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n:705_12: Evaṃ duvidhesu sandhīsu “dajjā”ti ayaṃ vaṇṇasandhi eva.
anya-e0804n:707_0: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
anya-e0804n:709_2: Idaṃ pana datvāsaddena samānatthaṃ “dadiyya” iti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā
anya-e0804n:709_3: saññogesu sarūpalopañca tato dyakārasaññogassa jjakāradvayaṃ dīghattañca katvā nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n:710_1: Tathā hi “petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā”ti ca “dakkhiṇā dajjā”ti ca dve pāṭhā dissanti.
anya-e0804n:710_2: Tattha pacchimassa dajjāti dātabbāti attho kammani yapaccayavasena.
anya-e0804n:710_3: Idha pana dādhātuto yapaccayaṃ katvā dhātussa dvittañca pubbassa rassattañca tato yakāre pare saralopaṃ
anya-e0804n:710_4: saññogabhāvañca jjakāradvayañca itthiliṅgattā āpaccayādiñca katvā “dajjā”ti nipphajjati.
anya-e0804n:710_5: Evaṃ “dajjā dadeyyā”ti ca “dajjā dadiyya datvā”ti ca “dajjā dātabbā”ti ca etāni paccekaṃ pariyāyavacanāni bhavanti. “Dajjuṃ. Dajjāsi, dajjātha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjāvho,
anya-e0804n:710_6: dajja”nti etānipi “dadeyyuṃ dadeyyāsī”tiādinā padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā yyakāre pare saralopaṃ saññogesu
anya-e0804n:710_8: Etesu dajjāsīti yaṃ rūpaṃ tassāvayavassa ākārassa ekāraṃ katvā aparampi “dajjesī”ti rūpaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:711_0: Acinteyyānubhāvassa hi sammāsambuddhassa pāḷinayo acinteyyoyeva hoti,
anya-e0804n:711_4: Tathā hi “khattiyā titthiyā cetiyānī”tiādīsu yakāre pare saralopo bhavati,
anya-e0804n:711_8: Tathā “sākacchati taccha”nti etthāpi “saha kathayatī”tivā “saṃkathayatī”ti vā “tathya”nti ca padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sahasaddassa hakāralopaṃ,
anya-e0804n:711_9: saṃsadde ca niggahītalopaṃ katvā sakāragatassa sarassa dīghaṃ katvā yakāre pare saralopaṃ katvā tato
anya-e0804n:711_10: thyakārasaññogassa cchayugaṃ katvā visabhāgasaññoge eko ekassa sabhāgattamāpajjati.
anya-e0804n:711_16: sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti savikapāni payogāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n:711_17: “Najjā”tiādīsupi “nadiyā”tiādīni padarūpāni patiṭṭhapetvā vaṇṇasandhivasena yakāre pare lopavidhi labbhatiyeva.
anya-e0804n:711_19: upari ca etesaṃ sādhanatthaṃ “saralopo yamanarādīsū”tiādīni lakkhaṇāni bhavissanti. Tattha –
anya-e0804n:714_2: dajjāhaṃ dakarakkhino”ti ettha dajjanti padassa “dammī”ti vattamānāvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:714_4: Ācariyā hi “sattamīpayogo aya”nti jānantāpi “kadāci aññe parikappatthampi gaṇheyyu”nti āsaṅkāya evaṃ vivaraṇamakaṃsu.
anya-e0804n:714_6: na dajjaṃ dakarakkhino”ti ettha na dajjanti padassa “nāhaṃ dakarakkhassa dassāmī”ti bhavissantīvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:714_8: anāgataṃ pana paṭicca vattabbatthattā evaṃ vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0804n:714_9: “Neva dajjaṃ mahosadha”nti ettha pana “na tveva dadeyya”nti sattamīpayogavaseneva vivaraṇaṃ katanti.
anya-e0804n:715_2: kassapo iti maṃ vidū”tiādīsu vidūsaddena samaṃ. Dade, dadittha, dadaṃ, dadimha. Dadittha, dadire. Dadittho, dadivho.
anya-e0804n:716_0: Ettha ca daditthoti idaṃ “sañjagghittho mayā saha.
anya-e0804n:716_3: Iminā nayena sabbattha labbhamānavasena sadisatā upaparikkhitabbā. Dadaṃ, dadimhe.
anya-e0804n:717_6: Iti anakārapubbampi rūpaṃ gahetabbaṃ “yesaṃ no na dadamhase”ti dassanato.
anya-e0804n:718_1: adadittha. Adadiṃ, adadimhā. Adadā, adadū. Adadase,
anya-e0804n:720_0: “Adadisā, dadissā, adadissaṃsu, dadissaṃsu” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Kālātipattisahitarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:721_0: Aparānipi vattamānādisahitarūpāni bhavanti. Deti, denti. Desi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dammi, dema, damma.
anya-e0804n:721_3: Hiyuttanīnayo pana ajjatanīnayo ca koci koci pasiddho pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā,
anya-e0804n:722_0: Tathā ādadāti, ādadanti. Ādadāsi, ādadātha. Ādadāmi, ādadāma.
anya-e0804n:723_0: Dākucchite gamane. Dāti. Suddāti. Suddo, suddī.
anya-e0804n:723_2: parapothanādiluddācārakammunā dārukammādikhuddācārakammunā ca lahuṃ lahuṃ kucchitaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:723_3: Tathā hi su iti sīghatthe nipāto,
anya-e0804n:724_1: Ettha ca davati gacchati mūlakkhandhasākhāviṭapapattapallavapupphaphalehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātīti dumo.
anya-e0804n:726_2: Tathā hi “bālo abyatto nappaṭibalo anuyuñjiyamāno anuyogaṃ dātu”nti ettha dātunti padassa sodhetunti attho.
anya-e0804n:726_7: Tasmā “ācariyassa anuyogaṃ datvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgacchī”tiādīsupi anuyogaṃ datvāti anuyogaṃ sodhetvāti atthoyeva gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:726_8: Tathā hi pubbācariyehi “anuyogadāpanattha”nti etasmiṃ padese esoyevattho vibhāvito. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0804n:726_10: Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma,
anya-e0804n:726_18: Samantapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇa saṃvaṇṇanāyampi pubbācariyehi “dānaṃ datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodāpetvā”ti sodhanattho vutto.
anya-e0804n:726_19: Dullabhā ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ citte ṭhapetabbā.
anya-e0804n:727_2: Tattha dānanti duggatito dāyati rakkhatīti dānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:727_4: Uddānanti vuttassa atthassa vakkhamānassa vā vippakiṇṇabhāvena nassituṃ adatvā uddhaṃ dānaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ uddānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:729_2: “Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti visuṃ bhojanīyassa vacanato khādanaṃ nāma khajjassa vā khādanīyassa vā bhakkhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:729_6: “Cīvarāni nassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjantī”ti ettha viya khajjanti saddo kammattho.
anya-e0804n:730_0: Bada theriye. Thirabhāvo theriyaṃ, yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Badati. Badarī, badaraṃ. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0804n:733_0: Khada dhitihiṃsāsu ca. Theriyāpekkhāya cakāro. Khadati. Khadiro.
anya-e0804n:734_0: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Gadati. Āgadanaṃ, tatho āgado etassāti tathāgato. Suṭṭhu gadatīti sugado.
anya-e0804n:735_0: Rada vilekhane. Radati. Radano, rado, dāṭhārado. Atra radanoti danto.
anya-e0804n:736_3: Nada i iti dhātudvayavasena pana “nadantī gacchatīti nadī”tipi nibbacanaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:737_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ yā panesā “nada abyattasadde’ti dhātu tumhehi vuttā,
anya-e0804n:737_4: Yajjevaṃ “sīho nadatī”tiādīsu tiracchānagatādisaddabhāvena avibhāvitatthatāya nadasaddo abyattasaddo hotu,
anya-e0804n:737_5: “sīho viya ayaṃ puriso nadatī”tiādīsu pana manussabhāsāpi abyattasaddo siyāti?
anya-e0804n:737_6: Tanna viyattāpi samānā manussabhāsā sīho viyāti evaṃ samupekkhāvasena sīhapadatthassāpekkhanato nadasaddena niddisiyati,
anya-e0804n:737_9: “kathañca puggalo gajjitā ca vassitā ca hotī”ti pāḷiyaṃ gajjanaṃ vassanañca puggale alabbhamānampi valāhakassa
anya-e0804n:737_11: evameva nibbhayabhāvena sīhanādasadisiyā vācāya niccharaṇato sīho viya nadatīti avibhāvitatthavantena nadasaddena manussabhāsāpi niddisitabbā hoti.
anya-e0804n:738_3: evaṃ santepi bhagavatā aññenākārena sadisattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ambaphalūpamādayo vuttā,
anya-e0804n:738_4: evameva nadasaddo abyattasaddabhāvena tiracchānagatasaddādīsu eva vattabbopi atthantaravibhāvanatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:738_7: Tathā hi sabhāvato nadasaddenapi vassitasaddādīhipi manussabhāsā niddisitabbā na hotīti.
anya-e0804n:741_3: sakuṇānañca vassita”nti vassitasaddavasena payogassa vacanato tadanurūpaṃ niddisituṃ arahatīti mantvā vassitasaddasadisī niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0804n:741_4: Na hi “manusso vassatī”tiādinā visuṃ payogā dissanti,
anya-e0804n:741_8: sīhanādaṃ nadi kuso”tiādīsu viya yathārahaṃ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:747_1: Andusaddopanettha itthiliṅgo gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgappayogadassanato “seyyathāpi vāseṭṭha ayaṃ aciravatī
anya-e0804n:747_3: atha puriso āgaccheyya pāratthiko pāragavesī pāragāmī pāraṃ taritukāmo,
anya-e0804n:747_4: so orimatīre daḷhāya anduyā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanabandho”ti.
anya-e0804n:747_5: Tatra andūti yaṃ kiñci bandhanaṃ vā.
anya-e0804n:747_9: Apica andanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena andu viyātipi andu,
anya-e0804n:747_11: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ime kho vāseṭṭha pañca kāmaguṇā ariyassa vinaye andūtipi bandhanantipi vuccantī”ti.
anya-e0804n:747_15: “Avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirika”nti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n:747_17: Anvadi eva anvadevāti kitaviggaho sandhiviggaho ca veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:749_1: So hi indati paresu issariyaṃ pāpuṇātīti indoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:757_0: Evaṃ anekāni nāmāni. Ekopi hi attho anekasaddappavattinimittatāya anekanāmo. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n:758_0: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi,
anya-e0804n:758_2: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0804n:758_4: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0804n:758_6: Sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno āvāsaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0804n:758_8: Sakko mahāli devānamindo sahassaṃ atthānaṃ muhuttena cinteti,
anya-e0804n:758_10: Sakkassa mahāli devānamindassa sujā nāma asurakaññā pajāpati,
anya-e0804n:758_12: Sakko mahāli devānamindo devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti,
anya-e0804n:760_0: Tathā hi yena pavattinimittena tāvatiṃsādhipatimhi indasaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n:760_5: Yena sampayuttadhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvena uppannadhammasmiṃ cittasaddo pavatto,
anya-e0804n:760_7: Na hi vinā kenaci pavattinimittena saddo pavattatīti.
anya-e0804n:760_8: Ekopi attho sammutyattho ca paramattho ca anekasaddappavttinimittatāya anekanāmoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:761_4: Tathā hi “nāma”nti ca “liṅga”nti ca saddopi vuccati,
anya-e0804n:761_7: Asabhāvadhammabhūtaṃ nāmapaññattisaṅkhātaṃ atthesu saddappavattinimittampi vuccati “nāmagottaṃ na jīrati.
anya-e0804n:761_9: Iti nāmasaddenapi liṅgasaddenapi saddappavattinimittassa kathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:761_10: Saddappavattinimittañca nāma lokasaṅketasiddho taṃtaṃvacanatthaniyato sāmaññākāravisesoti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:761_11: So evaṃbhūtoyeva sāmaññākāraviseso nāma paññattīti pubbācariyā vadanti.
anya-e0804n:761_12: So hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe saddaṃ nāmeti tassa tassa atthassa nāmasaññaṃ karotīti nāmaṃ,
anya-e0804n:761_14: Saviññattivikārassa pana saddassa sammutiparamatthasaccānaṃ pakārehi ñāpanato paññattibhāve vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0804n:761_15: Saddasseva hi ekantena paññattibhāvo icchitabbo “niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā”ti ca “niruttipaṭisambhidā
anya-e0804n:761_17: Idha pana saddappavattinimittādhikārattā nāmavasena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n:761_18: Evaṃ anekavidhassa sāmaññākāravisesoti pubbācariyehi gahitassa nāmapaññattisaṅkhātassa saddappavattinimittassa
anya-e0804n:764_0: Evaṃ sabbābhidhānesupi iminā nayena yathārahaṃ attho vibhāvetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:765_0: Vidi avayave. Vindati. Yadi abhidhānamatthi, “vindo”ti dissati. Yathā kaṇḍati. Kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:766_0: Khidi avayaveti candaviduno vadanti. Tesaṃ mate “khindatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:767_0: Nidi kucchāyaṃ. Kucchāsaddo garahattho. Nindati. Nindā.
anya-e0804n:771_0: Avaṇṇo aguṇo nindā, garahā ayasopi ca;
anya-e0804n:772_0: Asiloko akitti ca, asilāghā ca atthuti.
anya-e0804n:774_0: Sirīva rūpiniṃ disvā, nanditaṃ āsi taṃ kulaṃ;
anya-e0804n:775_0: Tena nandāti me nāmaṃ, sundaraṃ pavaraṃ ahu.
anya-e0804n:776_0: Rammaṃ veḷuvanaṃ yena, na diṭṭhaṃ sugatālayaṃ;
anya-e0804n:777_0: Na tena nandanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, iti maññe mahesayaṃ.
anya-e0804n:780_0: Cadi hilādane dittiyañca. Hilādanaṃ sukhanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Candati. Candano, cando.
anya-e0804n:781_0: Ettha ca candanassapi anekāni nāmāni – candanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:781_6: Candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasamaṅgitāya sattānaṃ paliḷāhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ sukhaṃ uppādetīti candanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:781_8: sopi candayati hilādayati sītaguṇasampattiyā attano pabhāya sattānaṃ pariḷāhaṃ vūpasamento sukhaṃ uppādetīti candoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:781_9: Atha vā candati dibbati siriyā virocatīti cando.
anya-e0804n:782_0: Cando nakkhattarājā ca, indu somo nisākaro;
anya-e0804n:783_0: Candimā mā nisānātho, osadhī so nisāpati.
anya-e0804n:784_0: Uḷurājā sasaṅko ca, himaraṃsi sasīpi ca;
anya-e0804n:787_0: Sudhaṃ sudhi dhūpi yūpa-rasmi ceva khamākaro;
anya-e0804n:788_0: Nakkhatteso ca rajanī-karo subbhaṃsu eva ca.
anya-e0804n:790_0: Kadi kaladi avhāne rodane ca. Kandati, pakkandati. Pakkanduṃ, kandanto, kalandako.
anya-e0804n:793_0: Khanda gatisosanesu. Khandati. Khando. Khando nāma eko devo, yo “kumāro sattidharo”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:795_0: Sidi sītiye. Sītiyaṃ sītibhāvo. Sindati. Sosindo, sotatto.
anya-e0804n:796_0: Vanda abhivādanathutīsu. Vandati, abhivandati. Abhivandanā, vandanaṃ, vandako.
anya-e0804n:797_0: Ettha pana vandatīti padassa namassati thometi vāti attho.
anya-e0804n:797_1: Tathā hi suttantaṭīkākāro “vandeti vandāmi thomemi vā”ti āha.
anya-e0804n:800_0: Ettha pana mandoti aññāṇīpi bāladārakopi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:800_1: Tattha aññāṇī mandati aññāṇabhāvena appasaṃsitabbampi puggalaṃ thometīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_4: Mandati attano ca paresañca hitāhitaṃ acintento khādanīyabhojanīyādīhi attano kāyaṃ sañjātamedaṃ kurumāno supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_5: Mandati ayuttaṃ paresaṃ kriyaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena gacchati gaṇhātīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_6: Atha vā mandati punappunaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gabbhaṃ gacchatīti mando.
anya-e0804n:800_8: Bāladārako pana mandati yuttāyuttamajānanto uttānaseyyaṃparivattanaseyyaṃ vā supatīti mando.
anya-e0804n:804_0: Idaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyakā”ti
anya-e0804n:805_5: atha vā mandati appabhāvena gacchati pavattatīti nipphannapāṭipadikavasenapi gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:807_0: Hada karīsossagge. Karīsossaggo nāma karīsassa ossajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Hadati. Uhadati. Hadano.
anya-e0804n:808_0: Ettha ca “yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipī”ti ayaṃ pāḷi nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:808_5: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne “mutteti ohadeti cā”ti cariyāpiṭakapāḷippadeso nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:809_0: Uda mode kīḷāyañca. Udati. Udānaṃ. Udaggo.
anya-e0804n:810_4: Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃgahetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n:810_7: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n:810_10: evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0804n:810_11: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā vacīdvārena nikkhamanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso “udāna”nti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:811_0: Kuda khuda guda kīḷāyameva. Kodati. Khodati. Godati.
anya-e0804n:812_0: Sūda paggharaṇe. Sūdati. Suttaṃ. Sūdo. Rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n:813_0: Ettha ca suttanti sūdati dhenu viya khīraṃ atthe paggharāpetīti suttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:813_2: Sakammikadhātuttā pana “paggharāpetī”ti kāritavasena attho kathetuṃ labbhati.
anya-e0804n:813_3: Tathā hi “karotī”ti padassa “nipphādetī”ti attho kathetuṃ labbhati.
anya-e0804n:813_7: Sūdati “evañcevañca kate khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sugandhaṃ manāpaṃ surasañca bhavissatī”ti randhanakriyāya
anya-e0804n:817_1: Sneho nāma vasāsaṅkhāto sneho pītisnehoti duvidho.
anya-e0804n:818_0: Ettha ca medatīti medasahito bhavati ayaṃ purisoti attho.
anya-e0804n:818_1: Medo nāma thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho,
anya-e0804n:818_4: Tathā hi “te imaṃ kāyaṃ balaṃ gāhenti nāma brūhenti nāma medenti nāmā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:818_6: Imissā pana dhātuyā divādigaṇaṃ pattāya pītisinehatthe “mejjatī”ti suddhakatturūpaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:818_7: Curādigaṇaṃ pana pattāya “medeti medayatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:820_0: Sanda pasavane. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ avicchedappavatti. Sandati udakaṃ. Mahanto puññābhisando.
anya-e0804n:821_0: Ettha ca puññābhisandoti puññappavāho, puññanadītipi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0804n:822_0: Madda maddane. Maddabhi, pamaddati. Mārasenappamaddano. Kaṇṭakaṃ maddati.
anya-e0804n:827_11: Nisīdanaṃ, nisinnaṃ. Nisajjā. Gonisādo, upanisā. Sīdeti. Sīdayati. Sīdāpeti.
anya-e0804n:828_0: Tattha kusītoti vīriyenādhigantabbassa atthassa alābhato kucchitenākārena sīdatīti kusīto.
anya-e0804n:828_1: Atha vā sayampi kucchitenākārena sīdati aññepi sīdāpeti taṃ nissāya aññesaṃ sīdanassa sambhavatoti kusīto.
anya-e0804n:831_0: Kusītoti cettha dassa tattaṃ “sugato”ti ettha viya “satasmīti hotī”ti ettha viya ca.
anya-e0804n:831_12: Ettha pana “gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
anya-e0804n:831_13: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinnanti kukkuccaṃ upadahatītiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:831_22: Upanisāti upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti upanisā, kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:832_0: Bhāve napuṃsako ñeyyo, nisinnanti ravo pana;
anya-e0804n:836_0: Nida neda kucchāsannikarisesu. Kucchā garahā. Sannikarisaṃ vohāraviseso. Nidati. Nedati.
anya-e0804n:837_0: Bundi nisāne. Nisānaṃ tejanaṃ tikkhatā. Bundati. Bondi.
anya-e0804n:838_1: Tañhi bundāni tikkhāni pisuṇapharusavācādīni vā paññāvīriyādīni vā ettha santīti bondīti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:839_0: “Nāhaṃ puna na ca puna, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
anya-e0804n:842_0: Kāyo dehaṃ sarīrañca, vapu bimbañca viggahaṃ;
anya-e0804n:843_0: Bondi gattaṃ tanu ceva, attabhāvo tathūpadhi;
anya-e0804n:845_0: Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Vadati, vajjati. Vadeti, ovadati, ovadeti,
anya-e0804n:845_7: Tattha “vajjantu bhonto amma”nti pāḷidassanato vajjatīti padaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:845_12: ovadeti mahāmunī”ti ca dassanato vadeti ovadetīti ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:846_0: Ovādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti, vādāpayati. Vajjento, vajjayanto, imāni hetukattupadāni.
anya-e0804n:847_6: ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ” iccādīni bhavanti. “Vādo, ovādo, paṭivādo, pavādo,
anya-e0804n:848_0: “Vadituṃ, vaditvā, vivaditvā” iccevamādīni ca tumantādīni padāni.
anya-e0804n:849_1: Vaditabbaṃ vattabbanti vajjaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Vacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:849_3: samaṅginī sāmikena homīti ettha hi vacanaṃ “vajja”nti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:850_0: Vadanaṃ lapanaṃ tuṇḍaṃ, mukha massañca ānanaṃ;
anya-e0804n:853_0: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā, vadati, vadanti. Vadasi, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadate, vadante. Vadase, vadavhe. Vade, vadamhe.
anya-e0804n:854_0: Vadatu, vadantu. Vadāhi, vada, vadatha. Vadāmi, vadāma. Vadataṃ, vadantaṃ. Vadassu, vadavho. Vade, vadāmase.
anya-e0804n:855_0: Vajjati, vajjanti. Vajjasi, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjate, vajjante. Vajjase, vajjavhe. Vajje, vajjamhe.
anya-e0804n:856_0: Vajjatu, vajjantu. Vajjāhi, vajja, vajjatha. Vajjāmi, vajjāma. Vajjataṃ,
anya-e0804n:856_3: Imā dve padamālā vadadhātussa vajjādesavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:856_7: Ettha vajjantīti idaṃ suddhakattupadaṃ taddīpakattā. Kiṃ viya?
anya-e0804n:858_0: Nadantu bheī sannaddhā, vaggū vadantu dundubhī”ti
anya-e0804n:859_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vajjantīti vajjiṃsūti atītavacane vattamānavacanaṃ veditabba”nti suddhakattuvasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:859_2: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu vadadhātussa vajjādeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:860_0: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi diṇḍimā bahū;
anya-e0804n:862_1: Tañca kho vaṇṇasandhivisayattā vādayantīti kāritapadarūpena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:862_2: Tathā hi “vādayantī”ti padarūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā yakāre pare saralopo kato,
anya-e0804n:862_5: Tathā hi “devatā nabhe accherakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā antalikkhe etāni saṅkhapaṇavādīni
anya-e0804n:862_6: tūriyāni vādayantī”ti hetukattuvasena attho gahetabbo bhavati,
anya-e0804n:862_7: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu vadassa vajjādeso na bhavati.
anya-e0804n:863_4: “idameva sacca’nti vivādayantī”ti ca “evampi viggayha vivādayantī”ti ca evamādīsu vadantipadena samānatthaṃ “vādayantī”ti padañca sāsane diṭṭha”nti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n:863_6: Na hi saṅkhapaṇavādīnaṃ pāṭihāriyādidassanaṃ upapajjati dassanacittassa abhāvatoti. Saccaṃ, tathāpi –
anya-e0804n:866_1: Tasmā “vajjantīti vādayantī”ti vivaraṇaṃ suddhakattuvasena katanti? Tanna, heṭṭhā –
anya-e0804n:869_0: Iminnā gāthāya “vādentīti vādayanti devatā”ti sapāṭhasesassa atthavivaraṇassa hetukattuvasena katattā.
anya-e0804n:869_2: athopi diṇḍimā bahū’ti paccattavacanavasena vuttattā vajjantīti padaṃ kammavācakapada”nti ce? Tampi na,
anya-e0804n:870_1: Dvigaṇiko vadadhātu bhūvādigaṇiko ca curādigaṇiko ca.
anya-e0804n:870_2: So hi bhūvādigaṇe vattanto “vadati vajjatī”ti suddhakatturūpāni janetvā “vādeti, vādayati, vādāpeti,
anya-e0804n:870_10: vajjeyyuṃ” iccādi ca sabbaṃ neyyaṃ vajjādesavasena.
anya-e0804n:871_1: Pitā mātā ca te dajjunti padamiva.
anya-e0804n:871_2: Ettha ca “vajjuṃ vā te na vā vajjuṃ,
anya-e0804n:871_15: Pubbe viya idhāpi yakāre pare saralopo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:872_4: Tathā hi “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāva” iti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:872_5: Ettha pasaddo upasaggo dīghaṃ katvā vutto “pāvadati pāvacana”ntiādīsu viya,
anya-e0804n:872_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana atītavacanaṃ idanti jānantopi garu vattamānavacanavasena “pāvāti vadatī”ti vivaraṇamakāsi
anya-e0804n:873_0: Āyasmāpi ca sāriputto niddese “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti padaṃ nikkhipitvā ātumā vuccati attā,
anya-e0804n:873_2: “ahamasmi sīlasampanno”ti vā “vatasampanno”ti vāti vattamānavacanena atthaṃ niddisi.
anya-e0804n:873_3: Atha vā pāvāti idaṃ na kevalaṃ vadadhātuvaseneva nipphannaṃ,
anya-e0804n:873_5: Tathā hi idaṃ papubbassa usadde iti dhātussa payoge ukārassa okārādesaṃ katvā tato parokkhābhūte akāre
anya-e0804n:873_6: pare okārassa āvādesaṃ tato ca sandhikiccaṃ katvā sijjhati,
anya-e0804n:873_7: tasmā udhātussa vadadhātuyā samānatthattā tannipphannarūpassa ca vadadhātuyā nipphannarūpena samānarūpattā
anya-e0804n:874_0: Idāni vicchinnā padamālā ghaṭīyati. Vada, vaduṃ. Vade, vadittha, vadaṃ, vadimha. Vadittha, vadire. Vadittho, vadivho. Vadiṃ, vadimhe. Pāvada,
anya-e0804n:876_0: “Avadi, vadi, avaduṃ, vaduṃ, avadiṃsu, vadiṃsu. Avajji, vajji” iccādīni ajjatanīrūpāni.
anya-e0804n:878_4: Yā panettha vadadhātu viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ vuttā,
anya-e0804n:879_7: Vedoti vidati sukhumampi kāraṇaṃ ājānātīti vedo,
anya-e0804n:879_10: Vedoti vā vedaganthassapi nāmaṃ vidanti jānanti etena uccāritamattena tadādhāraṃ puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇo aya”nti,
anya-e0804n:879_11: vidanti vā etena brāhmaṇā attanā kattabbakiccanti vedo.
anya-e0804n:879_13: Āthabbaṇavedaṃ pana paṇītajjhāsayā na sikkhanti parūpaghātasahitattā.
anya-e0804n:884_1: So hi yathāsabhāvato kammañca phalañca kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidatīti “vidū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:885_2: rudati iccapi. Ruṇṇaṃ. Ruditaṃ. Rodanaṃ. Rodanto. Rodamāno. Rodantī. Rodamānā.
anya-e0804n:886_1: Mataṃ puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā rodati.
anya-e0804n:886_6: ahaṃ etaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ na parodāmi na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti evaṃ sakammikavasenattho veditabbo,
anya-e0804n:887_0: ‘Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
anya-e0804n:888_0: Jīvantaṃ amma passanti, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī’ti
anya-e0804n:889_2: “yathā sakammakā dhātusaddā atthavisesavasena akammakā honti ‘vibuddho puriso vibuddho kamalasaṇḍo’ti,
anya-e0804n:889_3: evaṃ atthavisesavasena akammakāpi sakammakā hontīti dassetuṃ ‘na paridevāmi na anutthunāmī’ti āha.
anya-e0804n:889_5: Ayañcettha payogoti iminā gāthāya anutthunanaṃ rudanaṃ adhippetanti dassetī”ti.
anya-e0804n:890_1: Dukkhassa gati patiṭṭhāti duggatīti ayaṃ attho “apāyaṃ duggatiṃvinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu yujjati,
anya-e0804n:890_2: idha pana idaṃ atthaṃ aggahetvā añño attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:890_4: Dukkhena kicchena gati gamanaṃ annapānādilābho duggatīti.
anya-e0804n:890_7: Tattha daliddatīti sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ paraṃ yācitvā eva dukkhena adhigacchati,
anya-e0804n:890_12: Ettha ca sabbameva “daliddatī”ti lokikappayogadassanato “daliddatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:890_13: Sāsane pana taṃ kriyāpadaṃ na āgataṃ,
anya-e0804n:890_16: Garū pana kaccāyanamatavasena dala duggatimhīti duggativācakadaladhātuto iddapaccayaṃ katvā “daliddo”ti nāmapadaṃ dassesuṃ.
anya-e0804n:891_0: Tuda byathane. Tudati, vitudati. Kammani “tujjati, vitujjamāno, vedanābhibhunno”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:896_0: Nuda peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ, nudati, panudati. Panudanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:897_0: Vidi lābhe. Vindati. Uṭṭhātā vindate dhanaṃ. Govindo.
anya-e0804n:898_0: Khadi parighāte. Parighātaṃ samantato hananaṃ. Khandati.
anya-e0804n:901_12: Sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti.
anya-e0804n:902_0: Vipubbo dhā karotyatthe, abhipubbo tu bhāsane;
anya-e0804n:904_0: Imasmā pana dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti,
anya-e0804n:904_10: Ettha hi akāro apiupasaggassa avayavo na hoti. Kinti ce?
anya-e0804n:904_14: Evaṃ dhādhātuto pubbassa api iccupasaggassa akāro kvaci niccaṃ lopaṃ pappoti,
anya-e0804n:904_17: Yatra hi nāma bhagavato pāvacane evarūpapopi nayo sandissati viññūnaṃ hadayavimhāpanakaro,
anya-e0804n:904_18: yo ekasmiṃyeva dhātumhi ekasmiṃyeva upasagge ekasmiṃyevatthe kvaci lopālopavasena vibhajituṃ labbhati.
anya-e0804n:904_19: Idāni mayaṃ sotūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthaṃ tadubhayampi ākāraṃ ekajjhaṃ karontā tadākāravatiṃ jinavarapāḷiṃ ānayāma –
anya-e0804n:905_0: “Gaṅgaṃ me pidahissanti, na taṃ sakkomi brāhmaṇa;
anya-e0804n:906_0: Apidhetuṃ mahāsindhuṃ, taṃ kathaṃ so bhavissati;
anya-e0804n:907_0: Na te sakkomi akkhātuṃ, atthaṃ dhammañca pucchito.
anya-e0804n:910_0: Dhu gatitheriyesu. Gati gamanaṃ, theriyaṃ thirabhāvo. Dhavati. Dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0804n:911_3: Atha vā dhuvanti idaṃ gatitheriyatthavasena nibbānasseva adhivacanaṃ bhavitumarahati.
anya-e0804n:911_4: Tañhi jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokādito muccitukāmehi dhavitabbaṃ gantabbanti dhuvaṃ,
anya-e0804n:911_5: uppādavayābhāvena vā niccasabhāvattā dhavati thiraṃ sassataṃ bhavatīti dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0804n:911_6: Yañhi sandhāya bhagavatā “dhuvañca vo bhikkhave desessāmi dhuvagāminiñca paṭipada”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:911_9: “Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti ettha pana ekaṃse nipātapadabhāvena vattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:914_0: Ettha ca dhenūti dhayati pivati ito khīraṃ potakoti dhenu, “godhenu,
anya-e0804n:914_2: migadhenū”ti dhenusaddo sāmaññavasena sapotikāsu tiracchānagatitthīsu vattati,
anya-e0804n:914_4: Tathā hi “satta dhenusate datvā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:915_9: Idha acinteyyabalattā upasaggānaṃ taṃyoge sidhudhātussa nānappakārā atthā sambhavanti,
anya-e0804n:916_2: maṅgalyaṃ pāpavināsanaṃ vuddhikāraṇaṃ vā. Sedhati. Siddho, pasiddho, pasiddhi.
anya-e0804n:917_3: Ayaṃ itthī imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ dahati.
anya-e0804n:917_4: Ime purisā imaṃ purisaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti.
anya-e0804n:918_0: Edha vuddhiyaṃ lābhe ca. Edhati. Edho, sukhedhito. Gambhīre gādhamedhati.
anya-e0804n:919_1: Vaḍḍhati etena pāvakoti edho. Indanaṃ, upādānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:920_0: Baddha saṃharise. Saṃhariso vinibaddhakriyā. Baddhati, vinibaddhati. Vinibaddhā.
anya-e0804n:921_0: Gādha patiṭṭhānissayagandhesu. Gādhati. Gādhaṃ kattā. Gambhīrato agādhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:922_0: Bādha viloḷane bādhati, vibādhati. Ābādho. Ābādhati cittaṃ viloḷetīti ābādho.
anya-e0804n:925_0: Tattha bandhananti bandhanti satte etenāti bandhanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:927_0: Vaddha vaddhane. Vaddhati. Vaddhi, vuddhi, vaddho, vuddho, jātivuddho, guṇavuddho, vayovuddho.
anya-e0804n:929_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e0804n:934_0: Medha hiṃsāyaṃ saṅgame ca. Medhati. Medhā, medhāvī.
anya-e0804n:934_1: Atra medhāti asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā.
anya-e0804n:934_2: Medhati vā siriyā sīlādīhi ca sappurisadhammehi saha gacchati na ekikā hutvā tiṭṭhatīti medhā,
anya-e0804n:939_0: Vuttaṃ. Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya ca samannāgato puggalo.
anya-e0804n:940_0: Sadhu madhu unde. Sadhati. Madhati. Madhu.
anya-e0804n:943_0: Dīdhi dittivedhanesu. Dīdhati. Dīdhiti. Ettha ca dīdhitīti rasmi. Anekāni hi rasmināmāni.
anya-e0804n:944_0: Rasmi ābhā pabhā raṃsi, ditti bhā ruci dīdhiti;
anya-e0804n:945_0: Marīci juti bhāṇva’su, mayūkho kiraṇo karo;
anya-e0804n:949_1: Vineyya hadaye daraṃ. Āneti. Ānayati. Netā. Vinetā. Nāyako. Neyyo. Veneyyo. Venayiko.
anya-e0804n:949_4: kinnu tāta udikkhati. Nīyanto. Nettaṃ. Netti.
anya-e0804n:949_7: Nette ujuṃ gate sati. Nayo. Vinayo. Āyatanaṃ. Netuṃ. Vinetuṃ. Netvā.
anya-e0804n:950_0: Tattha nettanti samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ attabhāvaṃ netīti nettaṃ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n:950_1: Nettīti nenti etāya satteti netti, rajju.
anya-e0804n:950_4: Tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ niyyanti,
anya-e0804n:950_9: Atha vā tattha tattha netabboti nayo,
anya-e0804n:951_0: Tathā hi chabbidho nayo tathattanayo pattinayo desanānayo antadvayavivajjananayo acinteyyanayo adhippāyanayoti.
anya-e0804n:951_4: Etthādimhi tividho nayo kammasādhanena nīyatīti “nayo”ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:951_5: pacchimo pana tividho nayo karaṇasādhanena nīyati etena tathattādinayattayamiti “nayo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:951_6: Imasmiṃ atthe papañciyamāne ganthavitthāro siyāti vitthāro na dassito.
anya-e0804n:952_0: Aparopi catubbidho nayo ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṃdhammatānayoti.
anya-e0804n:953_3: Āyatananti anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati,
anya-e0804n:954_2: gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyaanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n:955_3: Aññepi pana payogā yata patiyataneti ettha pakāsitā.
anya-e0804n:958_0: Thana pana dhana sadde. Thanati. Panati. Dhanati.
anya-e0804n:960_0: Ettha ca yobbanibhāve ṭhitattā rūpavilāsena kanati dippati virocatīti kaññā.
