anya-e0804n:960_1: Atha vā kaniyati kāmiyabhi abhipatthiyati purisehītipi kaññā,
anya-e0804n:961_0: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanakaṃ hemaṃ, kañcanaṃ haṭakampi ca;
anya-e0804n:964_0: Vana sana sambhattiyaṃ. Vanati. Vanaṃ. Sanati.
anya-e0804n:965_1: Taṃ sambhajanti mayūrakokilādayo sattāti vanaṃ, araññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:969_0: Ettha ca “kasmā te eko bhujo janati,
anya-e0804n:969_1: eko te na janatī bhujo”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:970_0: Khanu avadāraṇe khanati. Sukhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ. Khato āvāṭo.
anya-e0804n:971_0: Tattha sukhanti suṭṭhu dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:971_7: dukkaraṃ khamassāti dukkha”nti nibbacanānipi vividhā hi saddānaṃ byuppatti pavatti nimittañca.
anya-e0804n:974_1: Ettha pana hiṃsāvacanena pharusāya vācāya pīḷanañca daṇḍādīhi paharaṇañca gahitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:974_3: Tathā hi “rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā”ti.
anya-e0804n:974_4: Pāṭhassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentehi “haneyyunti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñcā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:974_5: Ettha ca chedanaṃ nāma hatthapādādichedanaṃ vā sīsacchedavasena māraṇaṃ vā.
anya-e0804n:975_1: “Hanti hatthehi pādehī”ti ettha pana hantīti paharatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:975_9: Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu vadho paharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:975_13: Satte ghātetī”ti ca ādīsu vadho māraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:976_10: iccādīni kammapadāni. Hantā. Hato. Vadhako. Vadhū. Āghāto. Upaghāto. Ghātako. Paṭigho. Saṅgho. Byaggho.
anya-e0804n:977_0: Tattha upāhananti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upahananti upagacchanti tato ca āhananti āgacchanti etenāti upāhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:977_4: Tathā hi “tena hi vadhu yadā utunī ahosi,
anya-e0804n:977_6: atha me āroceyyāsī”ti ettha vadhūti suṇisā vuccati.
anya-e0804n:977_7: Sā pana “ayaṃ no puttassa bhariyā”ti sassusasurehi adhigantabbā jānitabbāti vadhūti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:977_8: Gatyatthānaṃ katthaci buddhiyatthakathanato ayamattho labbhateva. “Suṇhā, suṇisā,
anya-e0804n:977_12: suṭṭhu vā kilese hanti tena tena maggāsinā māretītipi saṅgho,
anya-e0804n:977_14: Vividhe satte āhanati bhuso ghātetīti byaggho.
anya-e0804n:977_19: ayaṃ pana hanadhātu divādigaṇe “paṭihaññatī”ti akammakaṃ kattupadaṃ janeti.
anya-e0804n:977_20: Tathā hi “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī”tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti.
anya-e0804n:978_7: Tattha yasmā sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati,
anya-e0804n:978_8: pacchā bāhiravāto sukhumaṃ rajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyati,
anya-e0804n:978_11: Etesu dvīsu nayesu vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ assāso,
anya-e0804n:978_13: Suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso.
anya-e0804n:978_15: Ayameva ca nayo “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
anya-e0804n:978_16: cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti,
anya-e0804n:978_17: “passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā
anya-e0804n:978_18: ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sametīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:979_3: Dhātuattho hi yebhuyyena bhāvavasena kathiyati ṭhapetvā vakkarukkhataceti evamādippabhedaṃ.
anya-e0804n:979_4: Yathā bhāvatthe vattamānena yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa yyakāraṃ katvā thenanaṃ theyyanti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:979_5: evamidha yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa ññakāraṃ katvā dhananaṃ dhaññanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:979_7: tasmiṃ dhaññe. Dhanti, dhanati. Dhanitaṃ. Dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:979_9: tasmā “dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ puttaṃ vijāyī”tiādīsu dhaññasaddena siripaññāva gahetabbā puññassa visuṃ vacanato.
anya-e0804n:981_0: Ye te dakkhanti vadanaṃ, dhaññā te narapuṅgava.
anya-e0804n:983_0: Ye pāde paṇamissanti, tepi dhaññā guṇandhara.
anya-e0804n:986_2: Idamettha nibbacanaṃ “dhaññaṃ siripuññapaññāsampadā etesaṃ atthīti dhaññā”ti.
anya-e0804n:986_3: “Dhaññaṃ maṅgalasammata”nti ettha tu “uttamaratanaṃ ida”nti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddhāyitabbanti dhaññaṃ,
anya-e0804n:986_5: “Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpa”nti ca ādīsu “natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhana”nti vacanato dhanāyitabbanti dhaññaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
anya-e0804n:986_9: niddhano”ti ca natthi dhanaṃ etassāti atthena daliddapuggalo vuccati.
anya-e0804n:986_10: “Nidhanaṃ yātī”tiettha tu kampanatthavācakassa dhūdhātussa vasena vināso nidhananti vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n:988_5: “Sabbo taṃ jano ocināyatū”ti idamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:993_0: Pā pāne. Pānaṃ pivanaṃ. “Pāti, pānti. Pātu, pāntu” iccādi yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:994_0: Khippaṃ gīvaṃ pasārehi, na te dassāmi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0804n:995_0: Ayañhite mayā rūḷho, saro pāssati lohitanti.
anya-e0804n:996_0: Atra hi pāssatīti pivissati. “Pāssati, pāssanti. Pāssasi, pāssatha. Pāssāmi,
anya-e0804n:996_2: apassaṃsu” iccādinā ca nayena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n:996_3: Ko hi samattho sabbāni buddhavacanasāgare vicitrāni vippakiṇṇarūpantararatanāni uddharitvā dassetuṃ,
anya-e0804n:996_4: tasmā sabbāsupi dhātūsu saṅkhepena gahaṇūpāyamattameva dassitaṃ. Pivati, pivanti. Pivaṃ, pivanto, pivamāno,
anya-e0804n:996_12: Aññesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena saddarūpāni evameva yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:997_0: Pā rakkhaṇe. Pāti. Nipāti. Pitā, gopo.
anya-e0804n:999_1: So hi vippeti pūreti visiṭṭhena veduccāraṇādinā attano brāhmaṇakammena lokassa ajjhāsayaṃ attano ca hadaye vedānīti vippoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:999_2: “Jāto vippakule aha”nti ettha hi brāhmaṇo “vippo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1000_1: Ettha puttoti attano kulaṃ pavati sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n:1011_2: Evaṃ atrajāti itthivācakassa itthiliṅgassa dassanato sutasaddādīsupi itthiliṅganayo labbhamānālabbhamānavasena upaparikkhitabbo.
anya-e0804n:1011_6: “Puriso pumā” iccādīnaṃ pana yugaḷabhāvena itthivācakāni itthiliṅgāni na dissanti.
anya-e0804n:1011_7: Puññanti ettha pana attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1011_8: Kiyādigaṇaṃ pana patvā punātīti puññanti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1017_0: Pe gatiyaṃ. Peti, penti. Pesi, petha.
anya-e0804n:1017_1: Idha bhikkhave ekacco assakhaḷuṅko pehīti vutto viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchato paṭisakkati,
anya-e0804n:1018_1: Ettha apāyoti natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo.
anya-e0804n:1019_3: tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako,
anya-e0804n:1022_0: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
anya-e0804n:1030_0: Kapu sāmatthiye. Idaṃ amhākaṃ kappati. Netaṃ amhesu kappati.
anya-e0804n:1031_0: Kapa karuṇāyaṃ. Kapati. Kapaṇo, kāpaññaṃ. Tattha kapatīti karuṇāyati, kāpaññanti kapaṇabhāvo.
anya-e0804n:1032_0: Sapa akkose. Sapati. Sapatho, abhisapatho, abhisapito, sapanako.
anya-e0804n:1034_0: Supa sayane. Supati. Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhare. Sutto puriso, supanaṃ, suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1035_0: Khipa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ pisanaṃ. Khepati. Khepako.
anya-e0804n:1036_0: Khipa abyattasadde. Khipati. Khipitasaddo. Yadā ca dhammaṃ desento, khipi lokagganāyako.
anya-e0804n:1038_0: Opa niṭṭhubhane. Niṭṭhubhanaṃ kheḷapātanaṃ. Opati. Osadhaṃ saṅkharitvā mukhe kheḷaṃ opi.
anya-e0804n:1039_0: Lipi upalepe. Lepati. Littaṃ paramena tejasā.
anya-e0804n:1042_1: Nidampanaṃ nāma sassarukkhādīsu vīhisīsaṃ vā varakasīsaṃ vā acchinditvā khuddakasākhaṃ vā abhañjitvā
anya-e0804n:1042_2: yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva vā paṇṇamattasseva vā gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1043_0: Tapa dittiyaṃ. Ditti virocanaṃ. Divā tapatiādicco.
anya-e0804n:1044_0: Tapa ubbege. Ubbego utrāso bhīrutā. Tapati, uttapati. Ottappaṃ, ottappiyaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1045_5: Bhāve tāpanaṃ, tāpo, paritāpo, santāpo. Dhūpanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1048_1: Akammako cāyaṃ sakammako ca. Pupphati. Pupphaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1048_8: Mañjūsako nāma rukkho yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni,
anya-e0804n:1050_0: Dapha daphi vappha gatiyaṃ. Daphati. Damphati. Vapphati.
anya-e0804n:1058_0: Pabba vabba mabba kabba khabba gabba sabba cabba gatiyaṃ. Pabbati. Vabbati. Mabbati. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati. Sabbati. Cabbati.
anya-e0804n:1059_0: Abba sabba hiṃsāyañca. Gatyāpekkhāya cakāro. Abbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n:1061_0: Lubi tubi addane. Lumbati. Tumbati. Lumbinīvanaṃ. Udakatumbo. Athopi dve ca tumbāni.
anya-e0804n:1062_4: kathaṃ ambudharabinducumbitakūṭoti ettha avadane aviññāṇake pabbatakūṭe ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vutta”nti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1062_5: taṃ pana cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhavaṃ cetasi ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1062_6: yathā adassanasambhavepi dassanasadisenākārena sambhūtattā “rodante dārake disvā,
anya-e0804n:1062_7: ubbiddhā vipulā dumā”ti acakkhukānampi rukkhānaṃ dassanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1062_8: evamidhāpi cumbanākārasadisenākārena sambhūtattā avadanānampi ambudharabindūnaṃ cumbanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1062_9: Sabhāvato pana aviññāṇakānaṃ dassanacumbanādīni ca natthi,
anya-e0804n:1063_0: Ubbi tubbi thubbi dubbi dhubbi hiṃsatthā. Ubbati. Tubbati. Thubbati. Dubbati. Dubbā. Dhubbati.
anya-e0804n:1066_0: Pubba pabba sabba pūraṇe. Pubbati. Pabbati. Sabbati.
anya-e0804n:1066_3: sabbanāmesu ca tumantādivirahitesu ca nipātesu upasaggesu ca dhātucintā nāma natthi,
anya-e0804n:1066_6: tena te tabbhāvamuttattā dhātucintāyaṃ pubbācariyehi gahitā “pubbati sabbatī”ti payogadassanatoti.
anya-e0804n:1066_7: Yadi evaṃ kasmā buddhavacane etāni rūpāni na santīti?
anya-e0804n:1066_10: Kiñcāpi buddhavacanesu etāni rūpāni na santi,
anya-e0804n:1066_12: yathā “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha “nāthatī”ti rūpaṃ buddhavacane avijjamānampi gahetabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0804n:1066_14: Tasmā vohāresu viññūnaṃ kosallatthāya sāsane avijjamānāpi sāsanānurūpā lokikappayogā gahetabbāti “pubbati sabbatī”ti rūpāni gahitāni.
anya-e0804n:1068_0: Kabba khabba gabba dabbe. Dabbo ahaṅkāro. Kabbati. Khabbati. Gabbati.
anya-e0804n:1069_0: Abi dabi sadde. Ambati. Ambā, ambu. Dambati.
anya-e0804n:1073_0: Bhā dittiyaṃ. Cando bhāti, pañhā maṃ paṭibhāti. Ratti vibhāti. Bhāṇu, paṭibhānaṃ. Vibhātā ratti.
anya-e0804n:1076_0: Sumbha bhāsane ca. Cakāro hiṃsāpekkhako. Sumbhati. Sumbho. Kusumbho.
anya-e0804n:1078_0: Abbha vabbha mabbha gatiyaṃ. Abbhati. Abbho. Vabbhati. Mabbhati.
anya-e0804n:1079_1: So hi abbhati anekasatapaṭalo hutvā gacchatīti “abbho”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1079_6: sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti ettha pulliṅgo. “Abbhā, mahikā, dhūmo, rajo,
anya-e0804n:1081_0: Megho valāhako laṅghi, jīmūto ambudo ghano;
anya-e0804n:1084_2: Tathā hi “methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo”ti ca “na me rājā sakhā hoti,
anya-e0804n:1084_3: na rājā hoti methuno”ti ca sobhane vācāvisaye ayaṃ bhāsā āgatā.
anya-e0804n:1084_5: Na hi hirottappasampanno lokiyajanopi īdisiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
anya-e0804n:1084_6: Evaṃ santepi adhimattukkaṃsagatahirottappopi bhagavā mahākaruṇāya sañcoditahadayo lokānukampāya parisamajjhe abhāsi.
anya-e0804n:1087_0: Byathayo gāmadhammo ca, yābhassaṃ mohanaṃ rati.
anya-e0804n:1091_0: Debha abhi dabhi sadde. Debhati. Ambhati. Ambho. Dambhati.
anya-e0804n:1092_1: Tañhi nijjīvampi samānaṃ oghakālādīsu vissandamānaṃ ambhati saddaṃ karotīti ambhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1094_0: Pānīyaṃ udakaṃ toyaṃ, jalaṃ pāto ca ambu ca;
anya-e0804n:1095_0: Dakaṃ kaṃ salilaṃ vāri, āpo ambho papampi ca.
anya-e0804n:1096_0: Nīrañca kepukaṃ pāni, amataṃ elameva ca,
anya-e0804n:1098_0: Ettha ca “vālaggesu ca kepuke. Pivitañca tesaṃ bhusaṃ hoti pānī”tiādayo payogā dassetabbā.
anya-e0804n:1104_2: gabbhe vasati māṇavo”ti ettha mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1104_4: Gabbho ca patito chamā”ti ca ettha pana kucchigataputto.
anya-e0804n:1105_3: Taṃsamaṅgino pana pāḷiyaṃ “caṇḍā ruddhā rabhasā”ti evaṃ āgatā.
anya-e0804n:1107_1: Ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kriyāya vīriye hiṃsāya vikopaneti anekesu atthesu āgato.
anya-e0804n:1110_1: “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
anya-e0804n:1110_3: na te honti mahapphallā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikriyā.
anya-e0804n:1110_6: “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā.
anya-e0804n:1110_7: “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha chedanabhañjanādikaṃ vikopanaṃ. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:1113_0: Labha lābhe. Labhati, labbhati. Lābho, laddhaṃ, alattha, alatthuṃ.
anya-e0804n:1114_0: Subha dittiyaṃ. Sobhati. Sobhā, sobhanaṃ, sobhito.
anya-e0804n:1118_6: Divādigaṇaṃ pana patvā giddhiyatthe “lubbhatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:1120_0: Rubhi nivāraṇe. Rumbhati, sannirumbhati. Sannirumbho, sannirumbhitvā.
anya-e0804n:1121_0: Ubha ubbha umbha pūraṇe. Ubhati. Ubbhati. Umbhati. Ubhanā. Ubbhanā. Umbhanā. Obho. Keṭubhaṃ. Ubbhaṃ. Kumbho. Kumbhī.
anya-e0804n:1122_1: Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ kiṭeti gameti kriyādivibhāgaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1122_2: taṃ vā anavasesapariyādānato keṭento gamento obheti pūretīti keṭutaṃ kiṭaubhadhātuvasena.
anya-e0804n:1122_9: Tattha ca accubbhanti ativiya yācakānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1127_0: Mā māne sadde ca. Māti. Mātā. Ettha mātāti janikā vā cūḷamātā vā mahāmātā vā.
anya-e0804n:1128_0: Mū bandhane. Mavati. Kiyādigaṇassa panassa “munātī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1130_1: Sā hi sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti cāti medhāti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1130_3: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ “asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā,
anya-e0804n:1130_5: Saṅgamatthavācakassa pana medhadhātussa vasena medhati sīlasamādhiādīhi saddhammehi siriyā ca saṅgacchatīti medhāti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:1133_0: Omā sāmatthiye. Sāmatthiyaṃ samatthabhāvo. Aluttantoyaṃ dhātu, omāti, omanti.
anya-e0804n:1134_0: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “omāti bhante bhagavā iddhiyā manomayena kāyena brahmalokaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti.
anya-e0804n:1135_0: Timu addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Temati. Tinto, temiyo. Temitukāmā temiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:1136_0: Ettha temiyoti evaṃnāmako kāsirañño putto bodhisatto.
anya-e0804n:1136_1: So hi rañño ceva mahājanassa ca hadayaṃ temento addabhāvaṃ pāpento sītalabhāvaṃ janento jātoti “temiyo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1137_0: Nitami kilamane. Nitammati. Hadayaṃ dayhate nitammāmi.
anya-e0804n:1138_0: Camu chamu japu jhamu umu jimu adane. Camati. Camū.
anya-e0804n:1138_1: Camūti senā. Chamati. Jamati. Jhamati. Umati. Jemati.
anya-e0804n:1139_3: tasmā “nāssa kāye aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamatī”tiādīsu apadavikkhepatthopi gahetabbo. Kamati.
anya-e0804n:1139_23: Yasmā panāyaṃ dhātu curādigaṇaṃ patvā icchākanti yatthesu vattati,
anya-e0804n:1139_24: tasmā tepi atthe upasaggavisesite katvā idha abhikkantasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vattabbampi avatvā upari curādigaṇeyeva kathessāma.
anya-e0804n:1141_0: Nama bahutte sadde. Bahutto saddo nāma uggatasaddo. Namati.
anya-e0804n:1142_0: Ama dama hamma mima chama gatimhi. Amati. Damati. Hammati. Mimati. Chamati. Chamā.
anya-e0804n:1143_2: “na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti ca “chamāyaṃ
anya-e0804n:1143_4: So ca kho sattahi aṭṭhahi vā vibhattīhi dvīsu ca vacanesu yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:1144_1: Dhamadhātu sadde ca mukhavātena saddhiṃ aggisaṃyoge ca vattati.
anya-e0804n:1146_0: Namu namane. Namati. Namo. Nataṃ, namanaṃ. Nati. Namaṃ. Namamāno. Namanto. Namito. Nāmaṃ. Nāmitaṃ. Namituṃ. Natvā, natvāna. Namitvā,
anya-e0804n:1146_4: Tatra hi “namati namitvā”ti evaṃpakārāni padāni namanatthe vandanāyañca daṭṭhabbāni,
anya-e0804n:1151_1: Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni dissanti “devarāja namo tyatthu.
anya-e0804n:1152_0: Khamu sahane. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1158_0: Gamu gatiyaṃ. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1159_5: Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.
anya-e0804n:1161_0: Dhīratthu taṃ visaṃ vantaṃ, yamahaṃ jīvitakāraṇā;
anya-e0804n:1162_0: Vantaṃ paccāvamissāmi, mataṃ me jīvitā varaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1163_4: So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko.
anya-e0804n:1163_6: Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n:1163_7: Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakirayati,
anya-e0804n:1163_8: nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati,
anya-e0804n:1164_1: himavā”tiādīni padāni na kevalaṃ vantupaccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni,
anya-e0804n:1164_3: tenāha visuddhimaggakārako “yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanamanena vantaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1164_6: vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:1164_7: yathā loke ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā”ti vadatā niruttinayena saddasiddhi dassitā.
anya-e0804n:1165_2: yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha mekārakhakāralākārānaṃ kamato gahaṇaṃ dissati,
anya-e0804n:1165_3: “bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana bhakāravakāragakārānaṃ kamato gahaṇaṃ na dissatī”ti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1165_5: vijjācaraṇasampanno”tiādīsu viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena “bhavesu gamanavanto”ti vattabbepi evamavatvā
anya-e0804n:1165_6: saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṃ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṃ kesañca viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:1165_7: manaṃ tosetuṃ “bhagavā”ti pade akkharakkamaṃ anapekkhitvā atthamattanidassanavasena “āhitaggi,
anya-e0804n:1165_9: Īdisasmiñhi ṭhāne “āhitaggī”ti vā “aggāhito”ti vā “chinnahattho”ti vā “hatthacchinno”ti vā padesu yathā
anya-e0804n:1165_10: tathā ṭhitesupi atthassa ayutti nāma natthi aññamaññaṃ samānatthattā tesaṃ saddānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1166_1: Evaṃ visuddhimagge “bhagavā”ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā,
anya-e0804n:1166_5: bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:1166_10: Tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:1169_0: Tathā khandhāyatanadhātādibhede dhammakoṭṭhāse sabbaṃ papañca sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ
anya-e0804n:1169_1: samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvamīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:1169_2: Atha vā sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
anya-e0804n:1169_3: vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:1171_0: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bagavā mato.
anya-e0804n:1172_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana himavāti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā.
anya-e0804n:1172_1: Tathā hi sambhavajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttoti himavā.
anya-e0804n:1172_3: Evaṃ jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “himavā”ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā,
anya-e0804n:1172_8: tasmā ayaṃ nayo sabbatthapi na netabbo.
anya-e0804n:1172_15: atthayuttiyaṃ sati nipphādetumasakkuṇeyyānipi rūpāni aneneva sijjhanti.
anya-e0804n:1172_16: Ettha ca yaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ āharitvā dassetabbaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n:1172_17: taṃ upari rūpanipphādanādhikāre udāharaṇehi saddhiṃ pakāsessāma.
anya-e0804n:1177_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññunaṃ
anya-e0804n:1182_0: Ito paraṃ avaggantā, missakā ceva dhātuyo;
anya-e0804n:1185_0: Yā gatipāpuṇesu. Yāti, yanti. Yātu, yantu. Yeyya, yeyyuṃ,
anya-e0804n:1186_2: Upayanti etena issarassa vā piyamanāpassa vā santikaṃ gacchantīti upayānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1186_5: rājaputta tayi gate”ti ettha hi paṇṇākārāni “upayānānī”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:1186_6: Sampannadassanīyapupphaphalāditāya uddhaṃ olokentā yanti gacchanti etthāti uyyānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1187_0: Byā ummīsane. Byāti, byanti. Byāsi, byātha. Byāmi, byāma.
anya-e0804n:1187_6: ayañhi yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto cūḷabodhiparibbājako ahosi,
anya-e0804n:1188_0: Yu missane gatiyañca. Yoti, yavati. Āyu, yoni.
anya-e0804n:1189_2: Atha vā āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti tasmiṃ sati arūpadhammāti āyu.
anya-e0804n:1189_4: Tasmiñhi sati arūpadhammā āyavanti āgacchanti pavattanti,
anya-e0804n:1189_7: Abhidhammavasena pana “ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā jīvitindriyaṃ” iccetepi teheva saddhiṃ pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n:1189_8: Yonīti aṇḍajādīnaṃ aṇḍajādīhi saddhiṃ yāya missībhāvo hoti, sā yoni.
anya-e0804n:1189_9: Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ “yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññaṃ missakā hontīti yoni” iti.
anya-e0804n:1189_13: Catasso supaṇṇayoniyo”ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma.
anya-e0804n:1189_14: “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1194_0: Ettha sahabyoti saha byeti saha pavattatīti sahabyo, sahāyo,
anya-e0804n:1194_2: Tathā hi “tāvatiṃsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapanno”tiādīsu ekabhavūpago “sahabyo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1195_2: So hi hayati sīghaṃ gacchatīti hayoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1196_0: Asso turaṅgo turago, vājī vāho hayopi ca;
anya-e0804n:1197_0: Tabbhedā sindhavo ceva, gojo assataropi ca.
anya-e0804n:1199_0: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅkasso, vaḷavoti ca vuccati;
anya-e0804n:1202_0: Aya vaya paya maya taya caya raya gatiyaṃ. Ayati. Vayati. Payati. Mayati. Tayati. Cayati. Rayati. Ayo, samayo, vayo, payo, rayo.
anya-e0804n:1203_9: Ettha samayasaddassa atthuddhāro vuccate aha nibbacanena.
anya-e0804n:1205_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
anya-e0804n:1206_0: Tathā hi “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
anya-e0804n:1206_1: “Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo.
anya-e0804n:1206_4: “Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosī”tiādīsu hetu.
anya-e0804n:1206_5: “Tena samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
anya-e0804n:1207_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
anya-e0804n:1209_3: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo vutto.
anya-e0804n:1210_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇatāya sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
anya-e0804n:1210_1: Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggaloti samayo, khaṇo.
anya-e0804n:1210_3: etena vā saṅgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
anya-e0804n:1210_4: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena vohariyatīti. Samaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1210_5: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho,
anya-e0804n:1210_8: Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo, hetu,
anya-e0804n:1210_10: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandhā eti attano visaye pavattati,
anya-e0804n:1210_11: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
anya-e0804n:1210_16: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti samayo, pahānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1210_17: Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ sammā etabbo adhigantabboti samayo,
anya-e0804n:1210_19: abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti samayo.
anya-e0804n:1210_21: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0804n:1211_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantīti na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti?
anya-e0804n:1211_2: Saddavisese hi apekkhamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati.
anya-e0804n:1211_5: Ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samaya saddavacanīyatā sāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samayasaddassa vuttā.
anya-e0804n:1212_0: Ito yāto ayato ca, nipphattiṃ samudīraye;
anya-e0804n:1214_0: Ito yāto ayato ca, samānatthehi dhātuhi;
anya-e0804n:1216_3: Nayanti vā rakkhanti atthaṃ etenāti nayo,
anya-e0804n:1218_6: Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ “dayāsaddo yattha yattha pavattati,
anya-e0804n:1218_8: Dayāsaddo hi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca pavattatī”ti.
anya-e0804n:1219_1: dayati dadāti sattānaṃ abhayaṃ etāyāti dayā.
anya-e0804n:1219_2: Dayati gacchati vibhāgaṃ akatvā pāpakalyāṇajanesu samaṃ vattati,
anya-e0804n:1219_3: sītena samaṃ pharantaṃ rajomalañca pavāhentaṃ udakamivātipi dayā, mettā.
anya-e0804n:1219_4: Dayati vā hiṃsati kāruṇikaṃ yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanipphattiṃ na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0804n:1219_6: Dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi sajjano etāyātipi dayā.
anya-e0804n:1219_7: Dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhāti sajjano etāyāti dayā.
anya-e0804n:1219_8: Dayanti gaṇhanti etāya mahābodhisattā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇakāle hatthagatampi arahattaphalaṃ
anya-e0804n:1219_9: chaḍḍetvā saṃsārasāgarato satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsakaraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahantaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1219_10: pacchimabhave ca saha amatadhātupaṭilābhena anekaguṇasamalaṅkataṃ sabbaññutaññāṇañcātipi dayā, karuṇā.
anya-e0804n:1220_5: Kiñci payogamettha kathayāma “seyyathāpi gahapati gijjho vā kaṅko vā kulalo vā maṃsapesiṃ ādāya dayeyya.
anya-e0804n:1220_13: Ubhayampetaṃ vivaraṇaṃ rakkhaṇatthaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā adhippāyatthavasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1222_0: Pūyī visaraṇe duggandhe ca. Pūyati. Pūto, pūtavā. Pūtimacchaṃ kusaggena, yo naro upanayhati.
anya-e0804n:1225_0: Phāyi pāyi vuddhiyaṃ. Phāyati. Phīto, phatavā.
anya-e0804n:1226_3: Esa nayo “pūto pūtavā”tiādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbo. Pāyati. Pāyo. Apāyo.
anya-e0804n:1226_4: Ettha ca natthi pāyo vuddhi etthāti apāyo.
anya-e0804n:1226_5: Atha vā pana ayato sukhato apetoti apāyotipi nibbacanīyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1226_6: Apāyoti ca nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyoti cattāro apāyā.
anya-e0804n:1227_1: Divādigaṇe pana tā pālaneti dhātuṃ passatha,
anya-e0804n:1228_4: Nisāmayatha sādhavo”ti ca ādīsu hi olokanasavanāni nisāmanasaddena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n:1228_5: Apica ñāṇena upaparikkhaṇampi nisāmanamevāti gahetabbaṃ. Cāyati,
anya-e0804n:1232_0: Ri santāne. Reti. Reṇu. Reṇūti rajo.
anya-e0804n:1233_0: Ru gatiyaṃ rosane ca. Ravati, viravati.
anya-e0804n:1234_0: Ru sadde. Roti, ravati. Ravo, uparavo. Rutamanuññaṃ ruciyā ca piṭṭhi. Rutanti ravanaṃ rutaṃ, saddo.
anya-e0804n:1236_0: Brū viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Api hantvā hato brūti.
anya-e0804n:1237_0: Bravīti, brunti. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvhe. Bruve, brumhe.
anya-e0804n:1238_0: Brūtu, bruvitu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1239_0: Ettha ca ambaṭṭhasutte “puna bhavaṃ gotamo bruvitū”ti pāḷidassanato “bruvitū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1241_3: Evaṃ sabbattha paanuupasaggehipi yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n:1242_0: Āha, āhu. Brave, bravittha, bravire. Bravittho, bravivho. Braviṃ, bravimhe. Parokkhāvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0804n:1246_1: Brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Jīrati. Jīraṃ. Jīramāno. Jīraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1247_2: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā. Pūrituṃ, pūritvā, pūraṃ, pūritaṃ. Puṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1250_0: Sara gatiyaṃ. Sarati, visarati, ussarati. Ussāraṇā. Saro.
anya-e0804n:1251_0: Cara caraṇe. Carati, vicarati, anucarati, sañcarati.
anya-e0804n:1253_2: Tathā hi caranti padassa gacchanto khādanto cāti atthaṃ vadanti garū.
anya-e0804n:1253_4: Cārakoti taṃpavesitānaṃ sattānaṃ sukhaṃ carati bhakkhatīti cārako, rodho.
anya-e0804n:1253_6: Brahmacariyanti dānampi veyyāvaccampi sikkhāpadampi brahmavihāropi dhammadesanāpi methunaviratipi sadārasantosopi
anya-e0804n:1253_7: uposathopi ariyamaggopi sakalaṃ sāsanampi ajjhāsayopi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1262_0: Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1268_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0804n:1269_0: Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0804n:1270_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti
anya-e0804n:1271_1: “Idaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake sikkhāpadaṃ “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1271_2: “Taṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe…
anya-e0804n:1271_3: yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti imasmiṃ mahāgovindasutte brahmavihārā “brahmacariya”nti vuttā.
anya-e0804n:1271_7: mayamettha brahmacārino bhavissāmā”ti sallekhasutte methunavirati “brahmacariya”nti vuttā.
anya-e0804n:1275_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti
anya-e0804n:1279_0: Evaṃ nimijātake avītikkamavasena kato uposatho “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
anya-e0804n:1279_1: “Idaṃ kho pana pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe…
anya-e0804n:1279_2: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasuttasmiṃyeva ariyamaggo “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
anya-e0804n:1279_3: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsita”nti
anya-e0804n:1285_0: Sadāresu ca santoso, ariyamaggo ca sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0804n:1289_0: Ettha ca saroti saddopi vuccati usupi.
anya-e0804n:1289_1: Saraṇanti sarati upatāpeti hiṃsati saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāpaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikilesañcāti saraṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1289_3: Atha vā saddhā pasannā manussā “amhākaṃ saraṇamida”nti saranti cintenti,
anya-e0804n:1289_4: taṃ tattha ca vācaṃ niccharanti gacchanti cātipi saraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1291_5: atha vā dve kavāṭā aranti gacchanti pavattanti etthātipi dvāranti.
anya-e0804n:1291_7: Pāḷiyaṃ tu “dvāraṃ dvārā”ti ca itthinapuṃsakavasena dvārasaddo vutto.
anya-e0804n:1291_8: Tathā hi “dvārampi surakkhitaṃ hotī”ti ca “dvārāpesā”ti ca tassa dviliṅgatā vuttā.
anya-e0804n:1292_0: Gara ghara secane. Garati. Gharati. Gharaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1294_0: Tara plavanasaraṇesu. Tarati. Taraṇaṃ. Titthaṃ. Tiṇṇo. Uttiṇṇo.
anya-e0804n:1294_4: taranti uttaranti vā nadiṃ etenāti atthena.
anya-e0804n:1295_0: Nāvā plavo taraṃ poto, taraṇaṃ uttaraṃ tathā;
anya-e0804n:1297_0: Tara sambhame. Sambhamo anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Tarati. Tarito. Turaṅgo.
anya-e0804n:1298_0: Ettha ca “so māsakhettaṃ tarito avāsari”nti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1299_3: Tena añño rogo idha rogasaddena na vuccati. Jarati. Jaro. Sajjaro.
anya-e0804n:1300_0: Dara bhaye. Darati. Darī. “Bīlāsayā darīsayā”ti nidassanaṃ. Tattha darīti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena darī.
anya-e0804n:1301_0: Dara ādarānādaresu. Darati, ādarati, anādarati. Ādaro, anādaro.
anya-e0804n:1302_0: Ettha ca daratīti daraṃ karotīti ca anādaraṃ karotīti ca attho.
anya-e0804n:1302_3: Darasaddo ca kāyadarathe cittadarathe kilesadarathe ca vattati. Ayañhi –
anya-e0804n:1303_0: Ādittaṃ vata maṃ santaṃ, ghatasittaṃva pāvakaṃ;
anya-e0804n:1304_0: Vārinā viya osiñci, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye dara”nti
anya-e0804n:1305_2: sayaṃ abhiññāya abhāsi buddho”ti ettha pana kilesadarathe vattati.
anya-e0804n:1305_3: Vītaddaroti hi aggamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ samucchinnattā vigatakilesadarathoti attho.
anya-e0804n:1307_2: Yathā paṭhamapakatibhūto satto datarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena puri uccāṭṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:1307_4: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0804n:1307_12: Tattha narasaddassa tāva purisavacane “narā ca atha nāriyo”ti nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1307_17: naroti manusso”ti tattha tattha yathāsambhavaṃ attho saṃvaṇṇetabbo.
anya-e0804n:1309_0: Tattha pāṭihāriyanti samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1309_1: Paṭīti hi ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
anya-e0804n:1309_7: Vohāroti byavahāropi paṇṇattipi vacanampi cetanāpi. Tattha
anya-e0804n:1310_0: Yo hi koci manussesu, vohāraṃ upajīvati;
anya-e0804n:1311_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāti, vāṇijo so nabrāhmaṇo”ti.
anya-e0804n:1312_1: “Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro”ti ayaṃ paṇṇattivohāro nāma.
anya-e0804n:1312_2: Tathā tathā voharanti parāmasantīti ayaṃ vacanavohāro nāma.
anya-e0804n:1312_4: aṭṭha anariyavohārā”ti ayaṃ cetanāvohāro nāma. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:1315_6: Bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe titthiye haratīti pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1315_7: Mattāvaṇṇabhedenettha “pāṭiheraṃ pāṭihīraṃ pāṭihāriya”nti tīṇi padarūpāni, bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1317_0: Dhara dharaṇe. Dharaṇaṃ vijjamānatā. Dharati. Dharate satthusāsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1321_0: Īra vacane gatikampanesu ca. Īrati. Īritaṃ. Eritaṃ. Samīraṇo.
anya-e0804n:1322_2: samīreti ca rukkhasākhāpaṇṇādīni suṭṭhu kampetīti “samīraṇo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1324_0: Ettha harāyatīti lajjati, hiriṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1325_2: nara nayaneti dhātussa “narati naro”ti rūpāni viya.
anya-e0804n:1326_8: dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pālako pūrako ca mahābodhisatto.
anya-e0804n:1326_14: dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pūrako pālako cā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1328_0: Gira niggiraṇo. Niggiraṇaṃ paggharaṇaṃ. Girati, giri.
anya-e0804n:1329_2: So hi sandhisaṅkhātehi pabbehi citattā pabbamassa atthīti pabbato.
anya-e0804n:1329_3: Himavamanādivasena jalassa sārabhūtānaṃ bhesajjādivatthūnañca giraṇato girīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1331_0: Pabbato acalo selo, nago giri mahīdharo;
anya-e0804n:1334_0: Tatra saroti surati īsati devissariyaṃ pāpuṇāti virocati cāti suro.
anya-e0804n:1334_1: Sundarā rā vācā assāti vā suro, devo.
anya-e0804n:1334_3: Asuroti devo viya na surati na īsati na virocati cāti asuro.
anya-e0804n:1334_4: Surānaṃ vā paṭipakkho mittapaṭipakkhā amittā viyāti asuro, dānavo,
anya-e0804n:1339_2: tato paṭṭhāya asurā nāma jātā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1341_0: Asuro pubbadevo ca, dānavo devatāri tu;
anya-e0804n:1343_0: Pāko iti tu yaṃ nāmaṃ, ekassa asurassa tu;
anya-e0804n:1345_0: Kura sadde akkose ca. Kurati. Kuraro, kurarī. Kummo, kummī.
anya-e0804n:1346_0: Khura chedane vilekhane ca. Khurati. Khuro.
anya-e0804n:1349_2: paṭhamameva gamanaṃ vā. Purati. Puraṃ, purī.
anya-e0804n:1350_1: Tathā hi “nagaraṃ puraṃ purī rājadhānī”ti ete pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n:1350_4: Padhānatāya purato purato gamanena gantabbanti puraṃ,
anya-e0804n:1350_6: Avāpuraṇanti avāpuranti vivaranti dvāraṃ etenāti avāpuraṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1353_1: Te hi garanti uggacchanti uggatā pākaṭā hontīti garūti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:1353_2: Apica pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya bhāriyaṭṭhena garūti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:1353_4: bhavañhi me aññataro garūna”nti ettha mātāpitūsu dissati.
anya-e0804n:1357_0: Keci panācariyā “garu garū”ti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte garusaddo ṭhito.
anya-e0804n:1357_3: Pāḷivisaye hi sabbesampi yathāvuttānaṃ atthānaṃ vācakatte garusaddoyeva icchitabbo,
anya-e0804n:1358_4: Puriso purisaṃ māretuṃ māretvā” iccādīni rūpāni. Macco. Maru. Maraṇaṃ, maccu. Maṭṭu. Māro.
anya-e0804n:1359_1: Tathā hi alīnasattujātake “yo mattumicche pituno pamokkhā”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:1359_3: Marūti dīghāyukopi samāno maraṇasīloti maru, devo.
anya-e0804n:1360_0: Maraṇaṃ antako maccu, hindaṃ kālo ca maṭṭu ca;
anya-e0804n:1361_0: Nikkhepo cuti cetāni, nāmāni maraṇassa ve.
anya-e0804n:1362_0: Māroti sattānaṃ kusalaṃ māretīti māro, kāmadevo.
anya-e0804n:1364_0: Māro namuci kaṇho ca, vasavatti pajāpati;
anya-e0804n:1366_0: Kandappo ca ratipati, kāmo ca kusumāyudho.
anya-e0804n:1367_1: tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n:1368_0: Ettha ca māroti devaputtamārena saddhiṃ pañca mārā kilesamāro khandhamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro maccumāro devaputtamāroti.
anya-e0804n:1373_0: Dara dāhe. Kāyo darati. Daro, daratho.
anya-e0804n:1374_0: Tira adhogatiyaṃ. Tirati. Tiracchāno, tiracchā vā.
anya-e0804n:1375_0: Ara gatiyaṃ. Arati. Atthaṃ, attho, utu.
anya-e0804n:1376_0: Ettha atthaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ. Taṃ taṃ sattakiccaṃ arati vattetīti utu.
anya-e0804n:1379_0: Lā ādāne. Lāti. Lānaṃ, garuḷo, sīhaḷo, rāhulo, kusalaṃ, bālo, mahallako, mahallikā.
anya-e0804n:1380_0: Tatra garuḷoti garuṃ lāti ādadāti gaṇhātīti garuḷo,
anya-e0804n:1380_4: Sīhaḷoti sīhaṃ lāti ādadāti gaṇhātīti sīhaḷo,
anya-e0804n:1380_6: Tabbaṃse jātā etarahi sabbepi sīhaḷā nāma jātā.
anya-e0804n:1381_0: Rāhulotiādīsu pana rāhu viya lāti gaṇhātīti rāhulo, ko so?
anya-e0804n:1381_2: Tassa hi jātadivase suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa me tuṭṭhiṃ nivedethā”ti uyyāne kīḷantassa bodhisattassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
anya-e0804n:1381_3: Bodhisatto taṃ sutvā “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti āha.
anya-e0804n:1381_4: Puttassa hi jāyanaṃ rāhuggaho viya hoti.
anya-e0804n:1381_5: Taṇhākilissanatāpādanato bāḷhena ca saṅkhalikādibandhanena bandhaṃ viya hoti muccituṃ appadānatoti “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti āha.
anya-e0804n:1381_6: Rājā “kiṃ me putto avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya me nattā ‘rāhulo’ tveva hotū”ti āha,
anya-e0804n:1381_7: tato paṭṭhāya kumāro rāhulo nāma jāto.
anya-e0804n:1382_1: taṃ pana “rāhulo”ti vacanassatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ adhippāyatthavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1382_2: Na hi kevalo “rāhū”ti saddo “rāhuggaho”ti atthaṃ vadati,
anya-e0804n:1382_4: Tathā hi “rāhu jāto”ti bodhisattena vuttavacanassa “rāhuggaho jāto”ti atthौ bhavati,
anya-e0804n:1382_5: tasmā suddhodanamahārājā “mama nattā rāhu viya lātīti rāhuloti vattabbo”ti cintetvā “rāhulotveva hotū”ti āhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1383_0: Keci pana “rāhulo jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti paṭhanti,
anya-e0804n:1383_4: Na hi “rāhulo”ti kumārassa nāmaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1383_6: tasmā tadā bodhisattena “rāhulo jāto”ti vattuṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0804n:1383_7: Yathā hi anabhisitte arājini puggale “mahārājā”ti vohāro nappavattati.
anya-e0804n:1383_9: Athāpi tesaṃ siyā “rāhulo jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti padassa vijjamānattā eva ṭīkāyaṃ “rāhuggaho”ti bhāvavasena
anya-e0804n:1383_10: lāsaddena samānattho ādānattho gahasaddo vuttoti evampi nupapajjati,
anya-e0804n:1383_12: Rāhuloti hi idaṃ padaṃ “sīhaḷo”ti padaṃ viya dabbavācakaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1383_14: tasmā “rāhulo jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti etaṃ ekaccehi duropitaṃ pāṭhaṃ aggahetvā “rāhu jāto bandhanaṃ jāta”nti ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo,
anya-e0804n:1383_15: sārato ca paccetabbo suparisuddhesu anekesu potthakesu diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0804n:1384_1: rāhu jātoti bodhisatto puttassa jātasāsanaṃ sutvā saṃvegappatto “idāni mama rāhu jāto”ti vadati,
anya-e0804n:1384_2: muccituṃ appadānavasena mama gahaṇatthaṃ rāhu uppannoti hi attho.
anya-e0804n:1384_3: Bandhanaṃ jātanti iminā “mama bandhanaṃ jāta”nti vadati.
anya-e0804n:1385_0: Ekacce pana “rāhulotveva hotū”ti imaṃ padesaṃ disvā “rāhu jāto”ti vutte iminā na sameti,
anya-e0804n:1385_1: “rāhulo jāto”ti vutteyeva pana sametīti maññamānā evaṃ pāṭhaṃ paṭhanti likhanti ca,
anya-e0804n:1385_2: tasmā so anupaparikkhitvā paṭhito duropito pāṭho na gahetabbo,
anya-e0804n:1385_3: yathāvutto porāṇako porāṇācariyehi abhimato pāṭhoyeva āyasmantehi gahetabbo atthassa yuttito,
anya-e0804n:1386_0: Tattha kusalanti kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
anya-e0804n:1386_2: Bāloti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasaṅkhāte dve anatthe devadattakokālikādayo viya lāti ādadātīti bālo.
anya-e0804n:1387_0: Bālo avidvā añño ca, aññāṇī avicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n:1389_0: Eḷamūgo ca nippañño, dummedhī avidū mago;
anya-e0804n:1390_0: Aviññū andhabālo ca, duppañño ca aviddasu.
anya-e0804n:1391_0: Mahallakoti mahattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallako, jiṇṇapuriso. Imānissa nāmāni –
anya-e0804n:1392_0: Jiṇṇo mahallako vuddho, buddho vuḍḍho ca kattaro;
anya-e0804n:1393_0: Thero cāti ime saddā, jiṇṇapaññattiyo siyuṃ.
anya-e0804n:1397_0: Imāni pana nāmāni itthiyā itthiliṅgavasena vattabbāni –
anya-e0804n:1398_0: Jiṇṇā mahallikā vuddhī, buddhī vuḍḍhī ca kattarā;
anya-e0804n:1399_0: Therī cāti ime saddā, nāmaṃ jiṇṇāya itthiyā;
anya-e0804n:1400_0: Dala phala visaraṇe. Dalati. Phalati. Dalito rukkho. Phalito bhūmibhāgo.
anya-e0804n:1401_3: sālaṅkānanavajjitā”ti imissañhi kavīnaṃ kabbaracanāyaṃ alaṅkasaddo bhūsanavisesaṃ vadati.
anya-e0804n:1401_4: Keci panettha ala bhūsanapariyāpanavāranesūti dhātuṃ paṭhanti,
anya-e0804n:1401_6: Mayaṃ pana aladhātussa pariyattinivāraṇatthavācakattaṃ na icchāma payogādassanato.
anya-e0804n:1401_7: Nipātabhūto pana alaṃsaddo pariyattinivāraṇatthavācako dissati “alametaṃ sabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1402_0: Mīla nimelane. Mīlati, nimīlati, ummīlati. Nimīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1406_4: Samādhānaṃ vā kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho.
anya-e0804n:1406_5: Upadhāraṇaṃ vā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti attho.
anya-e0804n:1406_6: Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū anujānanti.
anya-e0804n:1406_8: sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho’ti evamādinā nayenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇentī”ti.
anya-e0804n:1406_9: Tattha “atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇa vidū anujānantī”ti idaṃ “sīla samādhimhi sīla upadhāraṇe”ti dvigaṇikassa sīladhātussa atthe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1406_13: Idha pana bhūvādigaṇikattā samādhānatthe “sīlatī”ti rūpaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0804n:1406_15: Punapi ettha sotūnaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ nibbacanāni vuccante.
anya-e0804n:1406_16: Sīlati samādhiyati kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena na vippakiratīti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1406_17: Atha vā sīlanti samādahanti cittaṃ etenāti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1406_19: Curādigaṇikavasena pana sīleti kusale dhamme upadhāreti patiṭṭhābhāvena bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1406_20: Sīlenti vā etena kusale dhamme upadhārenti bhuso dhārenti sādhavoti sīlanti nibbacanāni.
anya-e0804n:1408_4: Kūlati āvarati udakaṃ bahi nikkhamituṃ na detīti kūlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1409_0: Sūla rujāyaṃ. Sūlati. Sūlaṃ. Kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti.
anya-e0804n:1410_1: Nikkarīsaṃ nāma karīsamattenapi aminetabbato lahubhāvoyeva. Tūlati.
anya-e0804n:1412_1: Mūlasaddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso ussīranāḷimattānipī”tiādīsu mūlamūle dissati.
anya-e0804n:1416_0: Phala bhede. Phalati. Muddhā te phalatu sattadhā. Pādā phaliṃsu. Tattha phalatūti bhajjitu.
anya-e0804n:1417_2: Dveme bhikkhave asaniyā phalantiyā na santasanti.
anya-e0804n:1419_0: Phulla vikasanabhedesu. Phullati. Phullaṃ. Phullito kiṃsuko. Suphullitamaravindavanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1424_0: Velu celu kelu khelu pelu belu selu sala tila gatiyaṃ. Velati. Celati. Kelati. Khelati. Pelati. Belati. Selati. Salati. Tilati. Celaṃ, belako.
anya-e0804n:1425_0: Khala calane. Khalati. Khalo. Khaloti dujjano asādhu asappuriso pāpajano.
anya-e0804n:1426_2: Tañhi khalanti sañcinanti rāsiṃ karonti ettha dhaññānīti khalanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1427_0: Gila ajjhoharaṇe. Gilati. Gilamakkhaṃ puriso na bujjhati.
anya-e0804n:1428_0: Gala adane. Galati. Galo. Galanti adanti ajjhoharanti etenāti galo. Galoti gīvā vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1429_2: Ettha ca “sallaṃ usu saro sallo kaṇḍo tejano”ti pariyāyā ete.
anya-e0804n:1432_0: Mile gattavināme. Milāyati. Milāyano, milāyanto, milāyamāno.
anya-e0804n:1433_0: Kele mamāyane. Mamāyanaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhivasena “mama ida”nti gahaṇaṃ. Kelāyati. Tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyati.
anya-e0804n:1434_2: Saṃvaraṇāpekkhāyaṃ cakāro. Salati. Kusalaṃ. Valati. Vallati. Vallūro.
anya-e0804n:1435_0: Tattha kusalanti kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kampeti viddhaṃsetīti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1435_1: Kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1435_2: Vallanti saṃvaranti rakkhanti ito kākasenādayo satte akhādanatthāyāti vallūro.
anya-e0804n:1436_0: Mala malla dhāraṇe. Malati. Malaṃ. Mallati. Mallo.
anya-e0804n:1441_0: Jala dittiyaṃ. Jalati. Jalaṃ, jalanto, pajjalanto, jalamāno.
anya-e0804n:1442_0: Ko eti siriyā jalaṃ. Jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti me sutaṃ. Saddhammapajjoto jalito.
anya-e0804n:1443_2: so hi holeti bhūmiṃ bhindanto mattikakhaṇḍaṃ cāletīti “halo”ti vuccati ukārassa akāraṃ katvā.
anya-e0804n:1444_0: Cala kampane. Calati. Calito, acalo. Mahanto bhūmicālo. Calanaṃ, cālo.
anya-e0804n:1447_3: Yathā hi loke udakoghena anottharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ “thalo”ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:1447_4: evaṃ kilesoghena anottharaṇīyattā pabbajjā nibbānañca “thalo”ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:1447_5: “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1448_0: Phāla vilekhane. Phālati bhūmiṃ vilekhati bhindatīti phālo.
anya-e0804n:1450_0: Bala pāṇane. Iha pāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ sasanañca. Balati. Balaṃ, bālo.
anya-e0804n:1451_0: Ettha balanti jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti balaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1451_2: Atha vā balanti sammājīvanaṃ jīvanti etenāti balaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1451_4: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “assaddhiye na kampatīti saddhābala”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1451_5: taṃ daḷhaṭṭhena balanti vattabbānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ akampanabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1451_6: Atha vā dhātūnaṃ atthātisayayogato assaddhiyādīnaṃ abhibhavanena saddhādibalānaṃ abhibhavanatthopi gahetabbo “abalā naṃ baliyantī”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n:1451_7: Bāloti balati assasati ceva passasati cāti bālo,
anya-e0804n:1453_0: Kula saṅkhāne bandhumhi ca. Kolati. Kulaṃ, kolo.
anya-e0804n:1455_0: Kila pītiya kīḷanesu. Pītassa bhāvo pītiyaṃ yathā dakkhiyaṃ. Kīḷanaṃ kīḷāyeva. Kilati.
anya-e0804n:1457_1: Tathā hi “elambujaṃ kaṇṭakiṃ vārijaṃ yathā”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ niddisanto āyasmā sāriputto “elaṃ vuccati udaka”nti āha.
anya-e0804n:1457_3: Apica elāti kheḷo vuccati “sutvā nelapatiṃ vācaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1457_5: Ettha nelapatiṃ vācanti kheḷabindunipātavirahitaṃ vacananti attho.
anya-e0804n:1457_6: Lālākheḷavācakassa tu elāsaddassa aññaṃ pavattinimittaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1457_9: ila kampaneti evaṃ vuttaṃ kampanaṃ eva lālākheḷavācakassa elāsaddassa pavattinimittaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1457_10: tasmā ilanti jigucchitabbabhāvena kampenti hadayacalanaṃ pāpuṇanti janā etthāti elāti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:1457_11: Samānapavattinimittāyeva hi saddā lokasaṅketavasena nānāpadatthavācakāpi bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1461_0: Tila sinehane. Tilati. Tilaṃ, telaṃ, tilo.
anya-e0804n:1475_0: Jīva pāṇadhāraṇe. Jīvati. Jīvitaṃ, jīvo, jīvikā.
anya-e0804n:1476_0: Piva miva tiva niva thūliye. Pivati. Pivaro. Mivati. Tivati. Nivati.
anya-e0804n:1477_2: Tathā hi “pivaro kacchape thūle”ti pubbācariyehi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1478_0: Ava pālane. Avati. Buddho mama avataṃ.
anya-e0804n:1484_0: Sevu kevu khevu gevu gilevu mevu milevu secane. Sevati. Kevati. Khevati. Gevati. Gilevati.
anya-e0804n:1486_0: Dhātu gatisuddhiyaṃ. Dhāvati, vidhāvati. Ādhāvati, paridhāvati. Dhāvako.
anya-e0804n:1492_0: Si sevāyaṃ. Sevati. Sevanā, sevako, sevito, sivo, sivaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1497_0: Si gatibuddhīsu. Seti, atiseti. Atisituṃ, atisitvā, setu.
anya-e0804n:1498_0: Sī saye. Sayo supanaṃ. Seti. Sayati. Senaṃ. Sayanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1499_0: Su gatiyaṃ. Savati. Pasavati. Pasuto, suto.
anya-e0804n:1500_1: “vittiñhi maṃ vindati suta disvā”ti “devasuto ca mātalī”ti ca imāni tattha payogāni.
anya-e0804n:1501_0: Su savane. Savanaṃ sandanaṃ. Savati. Āsavo.
anya-e0804n:1502_0: Sū pasave. Pasavo jananaṃ. Savati, pasavati. Suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1503_0: Ettha pana suttanti atthe savati janetīti suttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1509_0: Hiṃsa hiṃsāyaṃ. Hiṃsati. Hiṃsako, hiṃsanā, hiṃsā.
anya-e0804n:1510_0: Issa issāyaṃ. Issati. Purisaparakkamassa devā na issanti. Issā, issāyanā.
anya-e0804n:1511_3: na namudhātu viya sakammako ceva akammako ca.
anya-e0804n:1512_0: Ghusa sadde. Ghusati, ghosati. Paṭighoso, nigghoso, vacīghoso.
anya-e0804n:1514_0: Pusa buddhiyaṃ. Pusati. Poso. Sampīḷe mama posanaṃ. Posananti vaḍḍhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1515_0: Musa theyye. Thenanaṃ theyyaṃ corikā. Musati. Duddikkho cakkhumusano. Musalo.
anya-e0804n:1517_0: Vāsi bhūsa alaṅkāre. Vāsati. Bhūsati, vibhūsati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1520_0: Ettha pana sīlādayo guṇe esantīti isayo,
anya-e0804n:1520_1: buddhādayo ariyā tāpasapabbajjāya ca pabbajitā narā.
anya-e0804n:1520_2: “Isi tāpaso jaṭilo jaṭī jaṭādharo”ti ete tāpasapariyāyā.
anya-e0804n:1521_0: Kasa vilekhane. Kasati, kassati. Kassako, ākāso.
anya-e0804n:1527_0: Kasa sisa jasa jhasa vasa masa disa jusa yusa hiṃsatthā. Kasati. Sisati. Jasati. Jhasati. Vasati. Masati. Masako. Omasati,
anya-e0804n:1528_0: Tattha omasatīti vijjhati. Omasavādoti paresaṃ sūciyā viya vijjhanavādo. Masakoti makaso.
anya-e0804n:1531_0: Nijjhattomhi subhaṭṭhena, tvañca me saraṇaṃ bhavā”ti
anya-e0804n:1532_1: Tattha nijjhattoti nijjhāpito dhammojapaññāya paññattigato amhi.
anya-e0804n:1533_0: Jisu nisu visu misu vassa secane. Jesati. Nesati. Vesati. Mesati. Devo vassati.
anya-e0804n:1534_0: Marisu sahane ca. Cakāro secanāpekkhako. Marisati.
anya-e0804n:1535_2: “Aññepi devo posetī”ti dassanato pana curādigaṇepi imaṃ dhātuṃ vakkhāma.
anya-e0804n:1536_0: Pisu silisu pusu palusu usu upadāhe. Pesati. Silesati. Sileso. Posati. Palosati. Osati. Usu.
anya-e0804n:1540_2: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi “idha bhikkhuṃ araññagataṃ vā rukkhamūlagataṃ vā suññāgāragataṃ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0804n:1540_3: uhasati” iti ca “so mātugāmena uhasiyamāno” iti ca.
anya-e0804n:1540_4: Hāsoti hasanaṃ vā somanassaṃ vā “hāso me upapajjathā”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:1541_0: Tusa hasa hisa rasa sadde. Tusati, hasati, hisati, rasati, rasitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1546_0: “Naheva ṭhita nā’sīnaṃ, na sayānaṃ na paddhaguṃ;
anya-e0804n:1548_0: Tattha rasatibbayoti so so vayo rasati parihāyati, na vaḍḍhatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1550_0: Nisa samādhimhi. Samādhi samādhānaṃ cittekaggatā. Nesati.
anya-e0804n:1551_0: Misa masa sadde rose ca. Mesati. Masati. Meso. Masako.
anya-e0804n:1553_0: Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ. Sasati. Satthaṃ. Satthaṃ vuccati asi.
anya-e0804n:1556_1: dakkheyya. Disse, passe, dakkhe. Dissa, passa, dakkha. Adissā, apassā.
anya-e0804n:1558_0: Disā. Passo. Passaṃ. Passitā. Dassetā. Dassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1558_6: Imasmiṃ pana pāḷippadese “dakkhitāye”ti idaṃ tadatthe tumatthe vā catutthiyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1558_7: Tathā hi dakkhitāyeti imassa dassanatthāyāti vā passitunti vā attho yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:1558_8: Disātiādīsu pana puratthimādibhedāpi disāti vuccati. Yathāha –
anya-e0804n:1565_0: Puttadārā disā pacchā, mittāmaccā ca uttarā;
anya-e0804n:1567_0: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti;
anya-e0804n:1568_0: Paccayadāyakāpi. Yathāha – “agārino annadapānavatthadā, avhāyikā nampi disaṃ vadantī”ti.
anya-e0804n:1572_0: Evaṃ disāsaddena vuccamānaṃ attharūpaṃ ñatvā idānissa nibbacanamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1572_1: Dissati candāvaṭṭanādivasena “ayaṃ purimā ayaṃ pacchimā”tiādinā nānappakārato paññāyatīti disā,
anya-e0804n:1572_5: Dissanti sakāya puññakriyāya ime dāyakāti paññāyantīti disā,
anya-e0804n:1572_7: Dissati uppādavayābhāvena niccadhammattā sabbakālampi vijjatīti disā, nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1575_5: Tathā “dassanena pahātabbā dhammā”ti vacanato dassanaṃ nāma sotāpattimaggo.
anya-e0804n:1575_10: disvā kattabbakiccaṃ pana na karoti saṃyojanānaṃ appahānato,
anya-e0804n:1575_12: Yattha katthaci rājānaṃ disvāpi paṇṇākāraṃ datvā kiccanipphattiyā adiṭṭhattā ajjāpi rājānaṃ na passāmīti vadanto gāmavāsī nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1576_1: Ñāṇadassananti dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1576_2: “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti ettha hi dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n:1576_4: “Abhabbā te ñāṇadassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo,
anya-e0804n:1576_5: “ayamañño uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1576_10: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kālāmo”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1580_0: Daṃsa daṃsane. Daṃsati, vidaṃsati. Danto. Kārite ālokaṃ vidaṃseti.
anya-e0804n:1582_0: Saṃsa kathane. Saṃsati. Yo me saṃse mahānāgaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1584_0: Ettha bādhanaṭṭhena rāgādayopi “kilesā”ti vuccanti dukkhampi. Etesu dukkhavasena –
anya-e0804n:1587_0: Payogo veditabbo. Divādigaṇaṃ pana pattassa “kilissatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1591_0: Bhāsabyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Bhāsati. Bhāsā, bhāsitaṃ, bhātā. Paribhāsati. Paribhāsā, paribhāsako.
anya-e0804n:1592_3: Vacanattho hi bhāsitasaddo niccaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:1592_11: So hi pubbe jātattā evaṃ vattuṃlabhati.
anya-e0804n:1593_0: Nanu ca bho katthaci “jeṭṭhabhātā”ti visesetvā vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1593_1: taṃ pana bhātāsaddassa kaniṭṭhepi vattanato pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ “jeṭṭhabhātā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1593_2: Yathā hi hariṇesu vattamānassa migasaddassa kadāci avasesacatuppadesupi vattanato “hariṇamigo”ti visesetvā vācaṃ bhāsanti,
anya-e0804n:1593_4: Yathā ca gohatthimahiṃsaacchasūkarasasabiḷārādīsu sāmaññavasena migasadde vattamānepi “migacammaṃ migamaṃsa”nti
anya-e0804n:1593_5: āgataṭṭhāne “hariṇassā”ti visesanasaddaṃ vināpi “hariṇamigacammaṃ hariṇamigamaṃsa”nti visesatthādhigamo hoti,
anya-e0804n:1593_6: ettha na gohatthiādīnaṃ cammaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā viññāyati.
anya-e0804n:1593_7: Tathā “migamaṃsaṃ khādantī”ti vacanassa gohatthiādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khādantīti attho na sambhavati,
anya-e0804n:1593_8: evameva katthaci vināpi jeṭṭhakaiti visesanasaddaṃ “bhātā”ti vutteyeva “jeṭṭhakabhātā”ti attho viññāyatīti.
anya-e0804n:1593_10: migamaṃsa”nti ettha cammamaṃsasaddeheva visesatthādhigamo hotīti? Na hoti,
anya-e0804n:1593_12: evañca sati kena visesatthādhigamo hotīti ce?
anya-e0804n:1593_14: tathā hi migasadde ca cammasaddādīsu ca sāmaññavasena vattamānesupi lokasaṅketena paricchinnattā gohatthiādīnaṃ cammādīni na ñāyanti lokena,
anya-e0804n:1594_0: Gilesu anvicchāyaṃ. Punappunaṃ icchā anvicchā. Gilesati.
anya-e0804n:1596_0: Jesu nesu esu hesu gatiyaṃ. Jesati. Nesati. Esati. Hesati.
anya-e0804n:1601_0: Kāsa saddakucchāyaṃ. Kāsati, ukkāsati. Kāso. Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ balyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
anya-e0804n:1603_2: Tucchabhāvena puñjabhāvena vā kāsati pakāsati pākaṭā hotīti kāsu.
anya-e0804n:1605_0: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃkāsuyā karissasī”ti
anya-e0804n:1606_2: narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā”ti ettha rāsi. Kārite –
anya-e0804n:1606_19: Imasmiṃ atthe bhāsusaddo “rāja dittiya”nti ettha rājasaddo viya virājanavācako siyā,
anya-e0804n:1606_20: tasmā rūpasiriyā virājanasampannatāya bhāsu virājanatā etassa atthīti bhāsuroti nibbacanaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1607_0: Nāsu rāsu sadde. Nāsati. Rāsati. Nāsā, nāsikā.
anya-e0804n:1608_0: Tatra nāsāti hatthisoṇḍāpi nāsāti vuccati “sace maṃ nāganāsūrū,
anya-e0804n:1608_2: Manussādīnaṃ nāsikāpi nāsāti vuccati “yo te hatthe ca pāde ca,
anya-e0804n:1608_7: tattha taṃ suviññeyyattā appasiddhattā vā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1614_0: Bhisi bhaye. Bhiṃsati. Bhiṃsanako. Tadāsi yaṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ. Bhesmākāyo.
anya-e0804n:1617_0: Ghusī kantikaraṇe. Īkārantoyaṃ, tena ito na niggahītāgamo. Ghusati.
anya-e0804n:1619_0: Dhaṃsu gatiyaṃ. Dhaṃsati. Rajo nuddhaṃsati uddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1621_0: Kusa avhāne rodane ca. Kosati, pakkosati. Pakkosako, pakkosito, pakkosanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1623_0: Asa dityādānesu ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Asati.
anya-e0804n:1628_0: Pasa bādhanaphassanesu. Pasati. Pāso, nāgapāso, hatthapāso.
anya-e0804n:1629_0: Lasa kantiyaṃ. Lasati, abhilasati, vilasati. Lāso, vilāso, vilasanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1632_0: Tisa tittiyaṃ. Titti tappanaṃ paripuṇṇatā suhitatā. Tisati. Titti.
anya-e0804n:1633_0: Vasa nivāse. Vasati, vasiyati, vacchati. Vatthu, vatthaṃ, parivāso, nivāso, āvāso, upavāso, uposatho,
anya-e0804n:1634_0: Atra upavāsoti annena vajjito vāso upavāso.
anya-e0804n:1634_2: upavasanti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1634_5: “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1639_4: Tasmā atthīti padaṃ ākhyātanipātavasena duvidhanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1640_0: Tatrāyaṃ padamālā – “atthi, santi. Asi, attha. Asmi, asma, amhi,
anya-e0804n:1640_1: amha” iccetāni pasiddhāni. “Atthu, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi,
anya-e0804n:1640_3: amha” iccetāni ca, “siyā, assa, siyuṃ, assu, siyaṃsu. Assa, assatha. Siyaṃ, assa,
anya-e0804n:1641_0: Ettha pana “tesañca kho bhikkhave samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ…pe…
anya-e0804n:1641_1: siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1642_0: Idāni siyāsaddassa atthuddhāro pabhedo ca vuccate.
anya-e0804n:1642_1: Siyāti ekaṃse ca vikappane ca “pathavīdhātu siyā ajjhattikā,
anya-e0804n:1643_4: “Puttā matthi dhanā matthī”ti ettha atthīti abyayapadamiva ekavacanantampi bahuvacanantampi bhavati.
anya-e0804n:1643_7: siyā pītisahagata”nti “ime dhammā siyā parittārammaṇā”ti ca ekavacanabahuvacanappayogā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n:1643_9: Parokkhāyaṃ “itiha asa itiha asā”ti dassanato asa iti padaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1643_11: Ajjataniyā pana “āsi, āsiṃsu, āsuṃ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṃ,
anya-e0804n:1645_4: Apica sāsananti “rañño sāsanaṃ pesetī”tiādīsu viya pāpetabbavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1645_8: Satthāti tividhayānamukhena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ sāsatīti satthā,
anya-e0804n:1645_10: Satthanti sadde ca atthe ca sāsati ācikkhati etenāti satthaṃ. Kiṃtaṃ?
anya-e0804n:1646_0: Īsa issariye. Issariyaṃ issarabhāvo. Īsati. Vaṅgīso, janapadeso, manujeso.
anya-e0804n:1647_0: Tatra vaṅgīsoti vācāya īso issaroti vaṅgīso. Ko so? Āyasmā vaṅgīso arahā. Āha ca sayameva –
anya-e0804n:1650_1: Upavesanaṃ nisīdanaṃ “āsane upaviṭṭho saṅgho”ti ettha viya. Āsati. Acchati. Āsīno. Āsanaṃ. Upāsati. Upāsako.
anya-e0804n:1651_0: Tattha āsananti āsati nisīdati etthāti āsanaṃ, yaṃ kiñci nisīdanayoggaṃ mañcapīṭhādi.
anya-e0804n:1652_0: Kasī gatisosanesu. Īkārantoyaṃ dhātu, tenito na niggahītāgamo. Kasati.
anya-e0804n:1654_0: Disī appītiyaṃ. Dhammaṃ dessati. Diso. Diṭṭho. Dessī. Desso. Dessiyo.
anya-e0804n:1655_0: Tatra disoti ca diṭṭhoti ca paccāmittassādhivacanametaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1655_2: parehi vā dessiyati piyo na kariyatīti “diso”ti ca “diṭṭho”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1655_3: Atha vā disoti coro vāpaccāmitto vā.
anya-e0804n:1656_0: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
anya-e0804n:1657_0: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti ca.
anya-e0804n:1658_1: “disā hi me te manusse bhajantu ye dhammamevādapayanti santo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n:1660_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti ca.
anya-e0804n:1662_0: “Na me dessā ubho puttā, maddīdevī na dessiyā;
anya-e0804n:1663_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā piye adāsaha”nti ca,
anya-e0804n:1664_0: “Na me sā brāhmaṇī dessā, napi me balaṃ na vijjatī”ti ca,
anya-e0804n:1665_0: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, napi dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ;
anya-e0804n:1666_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vatamadhiṭṭhahi”nti ca
anya-e0804n:1667_0: Payogā. Sabbattha meti ca mayhanti ca sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1669_0: “Paccamitto ripu diṭṭho, diso verī ca satva’ri;
anya-e0804n:1670_0: Amitto ca sapatto ca, evaṃ paṇṇattikārisū”ti.
anya-e0804n:1672_0: Bhassa bhassanadittīsu. Bhassanaṃ vacanaṃ. Ditti sobhā. Bhassati. Bhassaṃ, pabhassaraṃ.
anya-e0804n:1677_5: Devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyati. Phuṭṭhuṃ, phusituṃ, phusitvā,
anya-e0804n:1679_0: Rusa risa hiṃsāyaṃ. Rosati. Risati. Puriso.
anya-e0804n:1680_0: Ettha ca “puṃ vuccati nirayo, taṃ risatīti puriso”ti ācariyā vadanti.
anya-e0804n:1683_0: Masa āmasane. Masati, āmasati, parāmasati. Parāmāso, parāmasanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1684_2: “Parāmāso micchādiṭṭhi kummaggo micchāpatho”tiādīni bahūni vevacanapadāni abhidhammato gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:1685_0: Isu icchāyaṃ. Icchati, sampaṭicchati. Sampaṭicchanaṃ, icchā, abhicchā, icchaṃ, icchamāno.
anya-e0804n:1686_0: Vesu dāne. Vecchati, pavecchati, paveccheti. Pavecchaṃ, pavecchanto.
anya-e0804n:1687_0: Nisa baddhāyaṃ. Baddhāti vinibaddho, ahaṅkārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Nisati.
anya-e0804n:1689_0: Isa pariyesane. Esati. Isi, iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhaṃ, esaṃ, esamāno.
anya-e0804n:1693_0: Hā cāge. Jahati, vijahati. Vijahanaṃ, jahituṃ, jahātave, jahitvā, jahāya.
anya-e0804n:1698_0: Hu pasajjakaraṇe. Pasajjakaraṇaṃ pakārena sajjanakriyā. Havati. Huto, hutavā, hutāvī, āhuti.
anya-e0804n:1699_0: Hū sattāyaṃ. Hoti, honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Pahoti, pahonti. Pahūtaṃ, pahūtā,
anya-e0804n:1699_1: kuto pahūtā kalahā vivādā. Honto, hontā, hontaṃ, pahonto.
anya-e0804n:1700_0: Hotu, hontu. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Pañcamīvibhattirūpāni. Etthāpi pasiddharūpāneva gahitāni.
anya-e0804n:1701_8: Ettha pana “upako ājīvako ‘huveyya pāvuso’ti vatvā sīsaṃ okampetvā ummaggaṃ gahetvā pakkamī”ti pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0804n:1702_0: Aparo nayo – heyya, heyyuṃ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Hetha, heraṃ. Hetho, heyyāvho. Heyyaṃ, heyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n:1702_4: uppādassāpi uppādo pāpuṇeyyā”ti idampi nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1703_0: Huva, huvu. Huve, huvittha. Huvaṃ, huvimha. Huvittha,
anya-e0804n:1703_2: Tathāhi “kasirā jīvikā hothā”ti padassatthaṃ vaṇṇentehi “dukkhā no jīvikā ahosī”ti attho vutto. huvire. Huvittho, huvivho. Huviṃ, huvimhe.
anya-e0804n:1705_2: yaṃ balaṃ ahuvamhase”ti pāḷiyaṃ pana “ahuva amhase” iti vā padacchedo kātabbo “ahu amhase”ti vā.
anya-e0804n:1705_3: Pacchimanaye vakārāgamo “ahuvā”ti ca “ahū”ti ca dvinnampi ahosīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1705_8: mayaṃ tena balena tava kiccaṃ akaramhāti.
anya-e0804n:1706_3: ahuvāsiṃ iccapi, ahosimhā, ahumhā. Ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvase,
anya-e0804n:1707_3: “Ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsiṃ pubbe sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako”ti dassanato “ahuvāsi”nti iccevattho.
anya-e0804n:1707_4: Tathā hi anekavaṇṇavimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ vaṇṇentehi ahuvāsinti ahosinti attho pakāsito.
anya-e0804n:1708_0: “Hessati, hehissati, hehiti, hohitī”ti imāni cattāri bhavissantiyā mātikāpadāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n:1709_0: Idāni tāni vibhajissāmi – hessāti, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha. Hessāmi, hessāma. Hessate, hessante. Hessase, hessavhe. Hessaṃ, hessāmhe.
anya-e0804n:1713_0: Hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bhavissantiyā rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:1715_4: Saddo ravo. Vheti, vhāyati, avheti, avhāyati,
anya-e0804n:1720_0: Ettha avhetīti sārambhavasena attano visayaṃ dassetuṃ saṅghaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1720_2: avhettha yakkho avikampamāno”ti etthāpi sārambhavasena ghaṭṭanaṃ avhāyanaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n:1723_0: Ettha pana avhāyanti varāvaranti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo sārambhaṃ karontīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:1724_2: Ayaṃ pana pāḷi “paripucchati paripañhati idaṃ bhante kathaṃ imassa ko attho”ti.
anya-e0804n:1724_8: Koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohī”ti taddīpikā pāḷiyo dissanti,
anya-e0804n:1725_1: Ettha ca pañhoti ñātuṃ icchito attho.
anya-e0804n:1725_2: Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ pañhiyati ñātuṃ icchiyati soti pañhoti.
anya-e0804n:1725_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “vissajjitamhi pañhe”ti imissā nettipāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentena “pañheti ñātuṃ icchite atthe”ti.
anya-e0804n:1726_0: Miha secane. Mihati, ummihati. Megho, mehanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1727_1: Meghoti mihati siñcati lokaṃ vassadhārāhīti megho, pajjunno.
anya-e0804n:1728_2: Ayaṃ puriso imaṃ itthiṃ ayyikaṃ dahati,
anya-e0804n:1728_4: Imassa purisassa ayaṃ itthī ayyikā hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0804n:1728_5: Atra panāyaṃ pāḷi “sakyā kho ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ ukkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahantī”ti.
anya-e0804n:1728_10: bhasmāchannova pāvako”tiādayo payogā ettha nidassanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1733_0: Bahi saddhe ca. Cakāro vuddhāpekkho. Bahati.
anya-e0804n:1735_0: Araha maha pūjāyaṃ. Arahati. Arahaṃ, arahā. Mahati.
anya-e0804n:1737_0: Tatra nikkilesattā ekantadakkhiṇeyyabhāvena attano katapūjāsakkārādīnaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena arahaṇīyo pūjanīyoti arahā,
anya-e0804n:1738_0: Īha cetāyaṃ. Īhati. Īhā. Īhā vuccati vīriyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1740_0: Ahi pilahi gatiyaṃ. Ahati. Pilahati, ahi.
anya-e0804n:1741_0: Ettha ca ahīti nippādopi samāno ahati gacchati gantuṃ sakkotīti ahi.
anya-e0804n:1742_0: Garaha kalaha kucchane. Garahati. Garahā, kalahati, kalaho.
anya-e0804n:1743_0: Varaha valaha padhāniye paribhāsanahiṃsādānesu ca. Varahati. Valahati. Varāho.
anya-e0804n:1744_0: Ettha ca varāhoti sūkaropi hatthīpi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1744_4: bhisaṃ ghasamānassā”tiādīsu pana hatthī “varāho”ti nāmena vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1745_0: Vehu jehu vāhu payatane. Vehati, jehati. Vāhati. Vāhano.
anya-e0804n:1746_1: So hi vāhanti saṅgāmādīsu kicce uppanne payatanti vīriyaṃ karonti,
anya-e0804n:1748_0: Ūha vitakke. Ūhati, āyūhati, viyūhati, byūhati apohati. Ūhanaṃ, āyūhanaṃ, byūho, apoho.
anya-e0804n:1750_0: Gāhu viloḷane. Gāhati. Gāho, candaggāho, sūriyaggāho, nakkhattaggāho.
anya-e0804n:1751_0: Gaha gahaṇe. Gahati, paggahati. Āhutiṃpaggahissāmi. Paggaho, paggāho.
anya-e0804n:1753_0: Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ khanti. Sahati. Saho, asaho, asayho.
anya-e0804n:1756_0: Guhū saṃvaraṇe. Guhati nigguhati. Guho, guyhako.
anya-e0804n:1758_0: Duha papūraṇe. Duhati, dohati. Duyhamānā gāvī.
anya-e0804n:1759_0: Diha upacaye. Dehati. Deho. Dehoti sarīraṃ.
anya-e0804n:1760_4: sunakhā imassa kumārassa pādatale attano jivhāya palihiṃsūti.
anya-e0804n:1761_0: Oha cāge. Ohati. Sabbamanatthaṃ apohati. Apoho.
anya-e0804n:1764_0: Brūha vaḍḍhane. Uparūpari brūhatīti brahmā. Kārite “vivekamanubrūhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti payogo.
anya-e0804n:1765_0: Brahmāti tehi tehi guṇavisesehi brūhitoti brahmā.
anya-e0804n:1765_1: Brahmāti mahābrahmāpi vuccati tathāgatopi brāhmaṇopi mātāpitaropi seṭṭhampi.
anya-e0804n:1765_2: “Sahasso brahmā dvisahasso brahmā”tiādīsu hi mahābrahmā “brahmā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1765_3: “Brahmāti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ettha tathāgato.
anya-e0804n:1772_0: Tathāgate ca seṭṭhe ca, brahmasaddo pavattatī”ti.

anya-e0804n:1775_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe,
anya-e0804n:1782_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatī”ti ca evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmā.
anya-e0804n:1782_2: Tato nibbattā avisesena sabbepi ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya.

anya-e0804n:1782_4: nāma sadevake loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito.

anya-e0804n:1811_0: Khuḷa bālye ca. Cakāro ghasanāpekkhako. Khuḷati.

anya-e0804n:1841_4: antarantarā uppajjamānena kosajjena vokiṇṇāti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0804n:1841_6: aṭṭhikasaññaṃ nissāya aṭṭhikasaññaṃ bhāvetvā paṭiladdhanti attho.
anya-e0804n:1841_7: “Lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ arūpasahagatānaṃ vā”ti ārammaṇe,
anya-e0804n:1841_9: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ sahajātaṃ sampayutta”nti saṃsaṭṭhe,
anya-e0804n:1844_0: Gatīti gatigati nibbattigabhi ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigati ñāṇagatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1845_0: Tattha “taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti ca “yassa gatiṃ na jānanti,
anya-e0804n:1845_2: “Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi gatiṃvā agatiṃvā”ti ayaṃ nibbattigati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1845_3: “Evaṃ kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiñca jānāmi jutiñca jānāmī”ti ayaṃ ajjhāsayagati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1845_5: nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti ayaṃ vibhavagati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1845_6: “Dve gatiyo bhavanti anaññā”ti ayaṃ nipphattigati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1845_7: “Taṃ tattha gatimā dhibhimā”ti ca “sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato”ti ca ayaṃ ñāṇagati nāma.
anya-e0804n:1848_1: Mātuyā samabhāvaṃ missībhāvañca gacchati pāpuṇātīti mātugāmo.
anya-e0804n:1852_2: Atha vā indabhūtena kammunā gacchatīti indagu.
anya-e0804n:1852_8: Medhagoti attano nissayañca parañca medhamāno hiṃsamāno gacchati pavattatīti medhago, kalaho.
anya-e0804n:1852_9: “Tato sammanti medhagā”ti ettha hi kalaho medhagasaddena bhagavatā vutto.
anya-e0804n:1854_0: Tato vinesi bhagavā, gantvā gantvā tahiṃ tahi”nti
anya-e0804n:1855_4: sappasseva padāsiro”ti imissā pāḷiyā niddese “sappo vuccati ahi.
anya-e0804n:1855_17: Pīṭhasappīti pīṭhena sappati gacchatīti pīṭhasappī, paṅguḷo.
anya-e0804n:1855_19: tassa balāyuvaḍḍhanatthaṃ sappati gacchati pavattatīti sappi, ghataṃ.
anya-e0804n:1857_0: Ke re ge sadde. Kāyati. Rāyati. Gāyati. Jātakaṃ. Rā. Gītaṃ. Kāyituṃ. Rāyituṃ, gāyituṃ. Kāyitvā. Rāyitvā. Gāyitvā.
anya-e0804n:1858_0: Tattha jātakanti jātaṃ bhūtaṃ atītaṃ attano caritaṃ kāyati katheti bhagavā etenāti jātakaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1858_2: Aññatra pana jātaṃ evaṃ jātakanti gahetabbā.
anya-e0804n:1858_3: Tathā hi jātakasaddo pariyattiyampi vattati “itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhamma”ntiādīsu,
anya-e0804n:1859_0: Khe je se khaye. Khāyati. Jāyati. Sāyati. Khayaṃ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:1860_0: Ettha pana siyā “nanu ca bho khāyatīti padassa khādatīti vā paññāyatīti vā attho bhavati,
anya-e0804n:1860_3: evaṃ sante bho kasmā idha evaṃ attho tumhehi kathiyatī”ti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1860_4: dhātūnantu anekatthattā evaṃ attho kathetuṃ labbhati.
anya-e0804n:1860_6: balibaddova jīratī”ti ettha jīratīti ayaṃ saddo jaraṃ pāpuṇātīti atthaṃ avatvā vaḍḍhatīti atthameva vadati,
anya-e0804n:1861_0: Gu ghu ku u sadde. Gavati. Ghavati. Kavati. Avati.
anya-e0804n:1862_0: Khu ru ku sadde. Khoti. Roti. Koti.
anya-e0804n:1863_0: Cu ju pu plu gā se gatiyaṃ. Cavati. Javati. Pavati. Plavati. Gāti. Seti. Cavanaṃ, cuti. Javanaṃ, javo. Pavanaṃ, plavanaṃ. Gānaṃ. Setu. Poto. Plavo.
anya-e0804n:1864_1: Pototi pavati gacchati udake etenāti poto, nāvā.
anya-e0804n:1864_2: Tathā plavati na sīdatīti plavo, nāvā eva.
anya-e0804n:1864_3: “Bhinnaplavo sāgarasseva majjhe”ti hi jātakapāḷi dissati. “Nāvā, poto, plavo,
anya-e0804n:1865_0: Dhe the saddasaṅghātesu. Dhāyati. Thāyati. Bhāve – dhiyati, thiyati. Itthī. Thī.
anya-e0804n:1866_0: De te pālane. Dāyati. Dayā. Tāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1868_0: Ati adi bandhane. Antati. Andati. Antaṃ. Andu.
anya-e0804n:1869_0: Jutasubha ruca dittiyaṃ. Jotati. Sobhati. Rocati, virocati.
anya-e0804n:1870_0: Aka aga kuṭilāyaṃ gatiyaṃ. Akati. Agati.
anya-e0804n:1872_0: Sala hula cala kampane. Salati. Hulati. Calati. Kusalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1873_0: Ettha ca kucchite pāpake dhamme salayatīti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1873_2: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “kucchite pāpake dhamme salayanti calayanti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalā”ti hetukattuvasena attho kathito.
anya-e0804n:1873_4: Aññesampi dhātūnaṃ vasena kusalasaddassa nibbacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:1873_5: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ aññānipi nibbacanāni dassitāni. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0804n:1873_7: te akusaladhammasaṅkhāte kuse lunanti chindantīti kusalā.
anya-e0804n:1873_8: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
anya-e0804n:1873_11: Yathā vā kusā ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthappadesaṃ lunanti,
anya-e0804n:1873_15: Tatra “dhammā” iti padāpekkhaṃ katvā tadanurūpaliṅgavacanavasena “kusalā”ti niddeso kato,
anya-e0804n:1873_16: idha pana sāmaññaniddesavasena “kusala”nti napuṃsakekavacananiddeso amhehi kato.
anya-e0804n:1873_17: Puññavācako hi kusalasaddo ārogyavācako ca ekantena napuṃsakaliṅgo,
anya-e0804n:1873_22: Kusalasaddo imasmiṃ bhūvādigaṇe lādhātusaladhātuvasena nipphattiṃ gatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:1875_0: Vitthārato ca saṅkhepā, bhūvādīnaṃ gaṇo mayā;

anya-e0804n:1907_2: Ettha āvaraṇaṃ nāma pidahanaṃ vā parirundhanaṃ vā palibuddhanaṃ vā harituṃ vā appadānaṃ,

anya-e0804n:1907_5: maggo purisena rundhiyati. Rodho, orodho, virodho,

anya-e0804n:1908_3: sā pana yathākāmacāraṃ carituṃ appadānena orundhiyati avarundhiyatīti orodho.
anya-e0804n:1909_0: Muca mocane. Migaṃ bandhanā muñcati. Muñcanaṃ, mocanaṃ. Dukkhappamocanaṃ, moco.
anya-e0804n:1910_0: Mocoti cettha aṭṭhikakadalīrukkho. Muñcituṃ. Muñcitvā. Kārite “moceti, mocetuṃ, mocetvā”tiādīni.

anya-e0804n:1918_15: Ettha siyā “nanu ca bho atra bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu vutto,
anya-e0804n:1918_20: Ito paṭṭhāya tumantādīni rūpāni na vakkhāma.

anya-e0804n:1922_0: Visaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
anya-e0804n:1926_6: Idaṃ pana bhidichididvayaṃ divādigaṇaṃ patvā “bhijjati chijjatī”ti suddhakattuvācakaṃ rūpadvayaṃ janeti,
anya-e0804n:1927_0: Tadi hiṃsānādaresu. Tandati. Tandī, taddu. Taddati kacchu.
anya-e0804n:1928_0: Udi pasavakiledanesu. Pasavanaṃ sandanaṃ. Kiledanaṃ tindatā. Undati. Undūro, samuddo.

anya-e0804n:1932_0: Vedaganthe ca ñāṇe ca, somanasse ca vattati;
anya-e0804n:1934_0: Lipa limpane. Limpati, limpako. Avalepo. Avalepoti ahaṅkāro.
anya-e0804n:1935_0: Lupa acchedane. Lumpati. Vilumpako, vilutto vilopo.
anya-e0804n:1937_0: Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatīti.
anya-e0804n:1938_2: Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “attano piyabhāvaṃ parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ yāya vācāya bhāsati,
anya-e0804n:1940_0: Ahiṃsakoti me nāmaṃ, hiṃsakassa pure sato;
anya-e0804n:1941_0: Ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kiñcanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1943_0: Sumbha pahāre. Yo no gāvova sumbhati. Parisumbhati. Sumbhoti. Atrime pāḷito payogā –
anya-e0804n:1946_0: Datvā ca no pakkamati, bahudukkhaṃ anappaka”nti ca,
anya-e0804n:1948_3: yathā bhūvādigaṇe “saki saṅkāyaṃ khaji gativekalle”tiādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa
anya-e0804n:1948_5: tathā imasmiṃ rudhādigaṇe “muca mocane kati chedane”tiādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭiladdhavaggantabhāvassa niggahītāgamassa
anya-e0804n:1948_7: Evaṃ sante ko imesaṃ tesañca visesoti?
anya-e0804n:1948_9: ye bhūvādigaṇasmiṃ anekassarā asaṃyogantā ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n:1948_10: te ākhyātattañca nāmikattañca patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti,
anya-e0804n:1948_11: na katthacipi tesaṃ vinā niggahītāgamena rūpappavatti dissati.
anya-e0804n:1948_14: Ayaṃ anekassarānaṃ ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhānaṃ bhūvādigaṇikānaṃ viseso.
anya-e0804n:1949_0: Ye ca rudhādigaṇasmiṃ anekassarā asaṃyogantvā akārantavasena vā ukārantavasena vā niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0804n:1949_1: te ākhyātattaṃ patvā suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti,
anya-e0804n:1949_3: Nāmikattaṃ pana sahaniggahītāgamena vinā ca niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:1949_10: Chindanaṃ, chedo. Muñcanaṃ, mocanaṃ. Kantati, kantanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1950_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante ākhyātanāmikabhāvaṃ patvā suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato paṭiladdhaniggahītāgamehi
anya-e0804n:1951_0: Nanu kaccāyane niggahītāgamassa niccavidhānatthaṃ “rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā”ti lakkhaṇaṃ vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1951_2: Yadi ca nāmikapadattampi sandhāya vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0804n:1952_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante sakikhajiādīnaṃ niccaṃ saniggahītāgamakriyāpadattaṃyeva sandhāya “rudhādito niggahītapubbañcā”ti idaṃ vuttanti sakkā mantunti? Na sakkā,
anya-e0804n:1952_1: sakikhajiādīnaṃ rudhadhātuyā asamānagatikattā nāmikatte dvippakārassa asambhavato.
anya-e0804n:1952_2: Tathā hi yesaṃ yā nāmikatte niggahītāgamāniggahītāgamavasena dvippakāravantatā,
anya-e0804n:1952_5: “Saṅkā khañjo”tiādinā hi nāmatte ekoyeva pakāro dissati saniggahītāgamo,
anya-e0804n:1952_7: caṅkamana”ntiādinā nāmikatte dvippakāravantatāsambhavepi niggahītāgamassa abbhāsavisaye pavattattā sā
anya-e0804n:1952_9: tasmā abbhāsavisaye pavattaṃ niggahītāgamaṃ vajjetvā yā dvippakāravantatā,
anya-e0804n:1952_11: Ayaṃ nayo atīva sukhumo sammā manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0804n:1953_0: Rudhādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:1957_12: Imesu atthesu divudhātu vattati. Dibbati. Devo. Devī. Devatā.
anya-e0804n:1958_0: Ettha devoti tividhā devā sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti.
anya-e0804n:1958_1: Tesu mahāsammatakālato paṭṭhāya lokena “devā”ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma.
anya-e0804n:1958_4: Vuttampi cetaṃ “sammutidevā nāma rājāno deviyo kumārā.
anya-e0804n:1959_3: Dibbanti yathābhilāsitaṃ visayaṃ appaṭighātena gacchantīti devā.
anya-e0804n:1959_5: Atha vā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti devanīyā abhitthavanīyāti devā.
anya-e0804n:1960_0: Ettha ca thutikanti atthā kammasādhanavasena daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0804n:1961_0: Idaṃ pana yathāvuttesu sammutidevādīsu paccekaṃ nibbacanaṃ –
anya-e0804n:1961_1: dibbanti kīḷanti attano visaye issariyaṃ karontīti devā, rājāno.
anya-e0804n:1961_9: sakkonti ca ānubhāvasampattiyā taṃtaṃkiccaṃ nipphādetunti devā,
anya-e0804n:1961_16: kāmiyanti ca anuttarapuññakkhettatāya daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca,
anya-e0804n:1961_18: sakkonti ca cittācāraṃ ñatvā te te satte hite niyojetuṃ amatamahānibbānasukhe ca patiṭṭhāpetunti devā,
anya-e0804n:1962_3: “Ahaṃ deva sakalajambudīpe aññassa rañño santike kiñci bhayaṃ na passāmī”tiādīsu issarapuggale.
anya-e0804n:1962_4: “Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti devo maññe”tiādīsu upapattideve.
anya-e0804n:1963_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dibbati attano puññiddhiyā kīḷatīti devī”ti.
anya-e0804n:1964_1: “Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya ruttiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā”tiādīsu hi devaputto “devatā”ti vutto “devoyeva devatā”ti katvā,
anya-e0804n:1966_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā”ti-
anya-e0804n:1969_0: Devo suro ca vibudho, nijjaro amaro maru;
anya-e0804n:1972_0: Khi khaye. Khiyati. Khayo. Khiyanaṃ. Rāgakkhayo.
anya-e0804n:1973_0: Khi nivāse kodhahiṃsāsu ca. Khiyati. Na gacchasi yamakkhayaṃ. Nāgadānena khiyanti.
anya-e0804n:1974_0: Tattha khiyatīti nivasati. Yamakkhayanti yamanivesanaṃ. Khiyantīti kujjhanti hiṃsanti vā.
anya-e0804n:1975_0: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyituṃ ghāyitvā.
anya-e0804n:1976_5: Keci pana imasmiṃ divādigaṇe “ruca dittimhī”ti paṭhanti.
anya-e0804n:1976_6: Taṃ na yuttaṃ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno “ruccatī”ti rūpābhāvato.
anya-e0804n:1976_12: Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
anya-e0804n:1976_13: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle “gamanaṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1976_14: Curādigaṇikakāle “kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1977_0: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
anya-e0804n:1978_0: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
anya-e0804n:1980_6: anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1980_7: “Evaṃ vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego “ukkā”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1980_8: “Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṃ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:1984_0: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṃ, avacchātaṃ. Chetvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:1985_0: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṃ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṃ, sajjito, satto.
anya-e0804n:1986_2: kāyakammādīnaṃ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati. Yogo, yogī.
anya-e0804n:1989_0: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu”nti
anya-e0804n:1990_0: Vacanato avassaṃ kātuṃ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:1991_2: Rajjamāno, rajjaṃ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:1992_0: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṃkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṃ maggo ca.
anya-e0804n:1993_0: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Saṃvego, saṃvejanīyaṃ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
anya-e0804n:1994_0: Luja vināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṃ, lutto.
anya-e0804n:1995_0: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ. Ṭhāyati. Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṃ, ṭhito,
anya-e0804n:1998_0: Pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Lāpaṃ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
anya-e0804n:2001_3: ciraṃ rujjati assame. Tāṇaṃ, parittaṃ, gottaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2002_0: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṃ bhayaṃ upaddavaṃ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2003_0: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṃ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
anya-e0804n:2004_0: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṃ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṃ. Anuyogaṃ datvā. Dānaṃ datvā.
anya-e0804n:2005_0: Dā supane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṃ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
anya-e0804n:2008_0: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2008_2: Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṃ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
anya-e0804n:2011_1: Ādīnavotiādīnaṃ dukkhaṃ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
anya-e0804n:2013_0: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṃ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0804n:2014_0: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṃ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṃ chiddaṃ. Chijjanaṃ chedo.
anya-e0804n:2016_0: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ parissamaṃ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2018_3: Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
anya-e0804n:2019_0: Vida sattāyaṃ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṃvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
anya-e0804n:2020_1: So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati,
anya-e0804n:2020_3: Vijjāti dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ viditaṃ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2020_9: Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā, moho.
anya-e0804n:2021_1: Ummādo nāma muyha naṃ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā. Majjati,
anya-e0804n:2022_0: Appamādo amataṃ padaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2023_0: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
anya-e0804n:2024_0: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṃ, mitto.
anya-e0804n:2025_1: Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati.
anya-e0804n:2026_1: Avagamanaṃ jānanaṃ. Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṃ, bodho, bodhi.
anya-e0804n:2027_2: Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṃ abujjhīti buddho.
anya-e0804n:2027_3: Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṃ icchantā evaṃ nibbacanaṃ karonti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti
anya-e0804n:2028_1: Bodhīti hi rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi nibbānampi evaṃpaṇṇattiko puggalopi vuccati,
anya-e0804n:2028_3: “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2028_7: “Bodhi bhante rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti “ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccatī”ti ca āgataṭṭhāne evaṃpaṇṇattiko puggalo.
anya-e0804n:2030_0: Rukkhe magge ca nibbāne, ñāṇe sabbaññutāya ca;
anya-e0804n:2033_0: Ettha ca koci payogo tumantādīni ca rūpāni vuccante –
anya-e0804n:2035_1: “budhvā bodhitale yamāha sugato’ti ca dhakāravakārasaññogavato padassa dassanato tvāpaccayantabhāvato
anya-e0804n:2035_3: taṃ tādisassa padarūpassa buddhavacane adassanato ca,
anya-e0804n:2035_6: “buddhā bodhitale”ti ca padassa dassanato na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2035_7: Tathā hi na tādiso pāṭho buddhavacanassa anukūlo hotīti.
anya-e0804n:2035_8: Na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi vassasahassampi pariyesantā tādisaṃ vakāradhakārasaññogapadaṃ passissanti.
anya-e0804n:2035_10: Tañhi sakkaṭaganthe kataparicayabhāvena vañcitehi vidūhi icchitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2039_4: Iti “viddhā laddhā laddhāna diṭṭhā”ti padāni tvāpaccayena saddhiṃ gatānipi saññogavasena vakārapaṭibaddhāni na honti,
anya-e0804n:2039_5: tasmā “buddhā buddhāna” iccetānipi “laddhā laddhāna” iccādīni viya parihīnavakārasaññogāni eva gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2039_9: tasmā tādisaṃ rūpaṃ aggahetvā yo saddanītiyaṃ saddavinicchayo vutto,
anya-e0804n:2040_2: Tathā hi bodhanasadduccāraṇena jānanaṃ vikasanaṃ niddakkhayo ca gahito,
anya-e0804n:2041_4: Na sandhiyatīti idaṃ aññehi pakaraṇehi asādhāraṇaṃ divādirūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2042_0: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidharassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyati. Idampi asādhāraṇaṃ divādirūpaṃ.
