anya-e0804n:2048_0: Radha hiṃsāyaṃ. Rajjhati, virajjhati, aparajjhati. Aparādho.
anya-e0804n:2051_4: Ijjhanti vā sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0804n:2052_0: Gidhu abhikaṅkhāyaṃ. Gijjhati, gijjho. Gaddho. Gaddhabādhipubbo. Kāmagiddho na jānāsi. Gedho.
anya-e0804n:2054_2: Puriso aññassa purisassa kriyaṃ anuvidhīyati tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n:2059_0: Tattha anuruddhoti anurujjhati paṇītaṃ paṇītaṃ vatthuṃ kāmetīti anuruddho.
anya-e0804n:2060_0: Byadha tāḷane. Byajjhati. Byādho. Byādhoti luddho. Taṃ taṃ migaṃ byajjhati tāḷeti hiṃsatīti byādho.
anya-e0804n:2062_4: maññitattaṃ, māno, ahaṅkāro, unnati, ketu, paggaho,
anya-e0804n:2063_9: Tattha “janeti janayatī”ti rūpāni curādigaṇaṃ patvā suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2065_4: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokile sote paṭihaññati.
anya-e0804n:2065_6: Bhūvādigaṇaṃ pana patvā “lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2065_7: na jātarūpena hananti loha”nti pāḷiyaṃ “haññatī”ti padaṃ kammapadaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2065_10: lohaṃ jātarūpena kammārā hanantīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n:2066_1: Ruppanaṃ kuppanaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ pīḷanaṃ. Ruppati. Rūpaṃ, ruppanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2066_2: Imassa pana “rūpa rūpakriyāya”nti curādigaṇe ṭhitassa “rūpeti rūpayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2068_4: Ettha ca kuppatīti etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṃ dasseti,
anya-e0804n:2068_7: so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “bhijjatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2069_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā.
anya-e0804n:2069_2: teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0804n:2069_5: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṃ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā,
anya-e0804n:2070_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n:2070_1: Ayañhi “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati.
anya-e0804n:2070_6: “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre.
anya-e0804n:2070_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
anya-e0804n:2071_0: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n:2073_0: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n:2081_3: Ettha pana “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṃ vanatho” iccādīni lobhassa bahunāmāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2083_0: Samu upasame. Cittaṃ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n:2084_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo.
anya-e0804n:2084_1: Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2086_1: “Ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve.
anya-e0804n:2086_2: “Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2090_0: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṃ. Kārite “cittaṃ dameti, damayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2091_2: Vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro “damo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n:2091_4: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā “damo”ti vuttā.
anya-e0804n:2091_5: “Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ “damo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2095_1: pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati.
anya-e0804n:2095_2: “Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati.
anya-e0804n:2095_4: “Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṃ hotū”tiādīsu kāraṇe.
anya-e0804n:2099_0: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n:2105_0: Sā antakammani. Siyati anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2106_0: Sā assādane. Rasaṃ sāyati. Sāyitaṃ, sāyanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2107_0: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n:2112_0: Līsa appībhāve. Lissati. Leso. “Lisa lesane”tipi paṭhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n:2113_0: Tasa pipāsāyaṃ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n:2114_0: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṃ, dosito.
anya-e0804n:2115_0: Dusa appītiyaṃ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n:2116_0: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṃ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṃ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n:2117_0: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṃ tathā dhammakkhānādīni.
anya-e0804n:2119_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena “nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso bālaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2119_2: “Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma”nti ettha pana niggahakammaṃ niyasakammaṃ nāma.
anya-e0804n:2121_0: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṃ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n:2122_5: cara pire vinassa. Naṭṭho, vinaṭṭho. Kārite – nāseti, nāsayati.
anya-e0804n:2125_3: Bhāve “bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā,
anya-e0804n:2125_4: so pahīyissatī”ti ca “rāgo pahīyatī”ti ca rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2125_6: “Rāgo pahīyatī”ti idaṃ pana “hā cāge”ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṃ “rāgaṃ pajahatī”ti kattupadassa dassanato.
anya-e0804n:2126_0: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n:2129_4: Ettha ca sīsaṃ nhātoti sīsaṃ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo porāṇehi anumatattā.
anya-e0804n:2131_3: Tathā hi “viriḷitoti lajjito”ti atthasaṃvaṇṇakā garū vadanti “lajjanākārappatto”ti ca.
anya-e0804n:2132_0: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2136_9: Anabbhāsavisaye – sāvako, soto, suṇaṃ, suṇanto, suṇamāno,
anya-e0804n:2136_11: Asuyitthāti vā sutaṃ. Sutavā, sotaṃ, soṇo, suṇituṃ, sotuṃ. Suṇitvā, suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite – sāveti, sāvayati. Kamme –
anya-e0804n:2137_2: tattha āgatapphalo savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti “sāvako”ti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:2138_0: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṃ vadāma saddhiṃ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena.
anya-e0804n:2145_6: yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0804n:2145_8: Taṇhāsoto diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu.
anya-e0804n:2145_9: “Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2145_12: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṃ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṃ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca paraloke patiṭṭhitañcā”tiādīsu cittasantatiyanti.
anya-e0804n:2146_0: Soṇoti sunakho. So hi sāmikassa vacanaṃ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2148_0: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n:2149_0: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṃsano.
anya-e0804n:2151_0: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n:2154_0: Kukkuroti ayaṃ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n:2156_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake “ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā,
anya-e0804n:2156_1: koleyyakā vaṇṇabalūpapannā”tiimasmiṃpadese evamatthaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu “ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n:2156_2: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo’ti,
anya-e0804n:2159_1: So hi parahitaṃ sakahitañca kātuṃ sakkuṇātīti sakko.
anya-e0804n:2159_3: Tathā hi “atha kho mahānāmo sakko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2159_5: Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho kumārā”ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā “sakyā”ti ca “sākiyā”ti ca “sakkā”ti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:2159_6: Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti,
anya-e0804n:2160_0: Khī khaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n:2162_0: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṃ. Pākāraṃ cinoti. Citaṃ kusalaṃ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n:2164_0: Rādha sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṃ. Ārādhanaṃ. Sādhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2165_0: Pī pītiyaṃ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n:2166_0: Apa pāpuṇe sambhu ca. Pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti. Patto.
anya-e0804n:2167_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo “pappotī”ti ettha pasaddo viya.
anya-e0804n:2167_1: Tathā hi “patto”ti ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2168_0: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṃ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n:2171_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto.
anya-e0804n:2171_1: “Mitto have sattapadena hotī”ti vacanaṃ pana vohāravasena vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2171_4: yo koci avissāsiko attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya,
anya-e0804n:2171_6: Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṃ “sattapadavītihāramattenapi saha gacchanto saha gacchantassa piyavācānicchāraṇena
anya-e0804n:2171_7: aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2171_9: Daḷhavissāso mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṃsāvasena evaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n:2172_0: Vu saṃvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṃvuto.
anya-e0804n:2173_0: Su abhisave. Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṃ manthanaṃ sandhānaṃ sinhānaṃ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n:2176_0: Na hi nūnāyaṃ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2179_0: Vusa pāgabbiye. Pāgabbiyaṃ nāma kāyavācāmanehi pagabbabhāvo. Vusuṇāti.
anya-e0804n:2182_0: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṃ samodhānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2183_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṃsāyaṃ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti.
anya-e0804n:2183_2: Dikkhuṇāti. Kivuṇāti. Ciruṇāti. Jiruṇāti. Dāsuṇāti. Duṇoti,
anya-e0804n:2184_0: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2188_1: Dabbavinimayo kayavikkayavasena bhaṇḍassa parivattanaṃ. Kiṇāti, kiṇanti.
anya-e0804n:2189_0: Khi gatiyaṃ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṃ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2190_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho”ti padatthavivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:2190_6: tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2191_14: “Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho kadambo vaggo karo ghaṭā”iccevamādayo pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n:2192_0: Ji jaye. Jināti, vijināti, jiniyati. Jetā, jino.
anya-e0804n:2192_2: Māraṃ jito. Jitavā, jitāvī, jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṃ, jitaṃ, vijitaṃ, jayo,
anya-e0804n:2193_6: Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo ca arayo ajinīti jino.
anya-e0804n:2194_0: “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2195_0: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṃ upaka jino”ti,
anya-e0804n:2197_1: sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi ca yathārahaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0804n:2198_3: putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino.
anya-e0804n:2200_0: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n:2208_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṃ dunāti hiṃsati dubbhatīti mittaddu.
anya-e0804n:2209_0: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n:2210_1: Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṃ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n:2210_2: “Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni mosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati.
anya-e0804n:2210_4: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n:2213_0: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n:2218_4: Yaṃ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṃ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca,
anya-e0804n:2218_5: vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritaṃ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca niddhotañca.
anya-e0804n:2218_7: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṃ dhutā ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca,
anya-e0804n:2218_10: pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2219_1: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2219_2: Sobhitattheragāthāyaṃ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena “ahaṃ monena monissa”nti rūpantarañca dissati.
anya-e0804n:2219_5: Tattha monanti kiñcāpi “na monena muni hotī”ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo “mona”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:2219_6: tathāpi idha “ñāṇe”ti vacanato na so adhippeto,
anya-e0804n:2219_9: Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṃ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n:2219_10: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
anya-e0804n:2219_11: ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni.
anya-e0804n:2221_0: Yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n:2222_0: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n:2223_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n:2224_4: So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho.
anya-e0804n:2224_11: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha “munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0804n:2225_0: Pū pavane. Pavanaṃ sodhanaṃ. Punāti. Puññaṃ, putto, dantapoṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2226_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṃ punāti sodhetīti puññaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2226_1: Atha vā yattha sayaṃ uppannaṃ taṃsantānaṃ punāti visodhetīti puññaṃ. Kintaṃ?
anya-e0804n:2226_4: Puttoti attano kulaṃ punāti sodhetīti putto.
anya-e0804n:2226_5: Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṃ caṇḍālādīnaṃ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṃ saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito,
anya-e0804n:2226_6: tasmā attano pitu hadayaṃ pūretīti puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṃ gahetabbameva.
anya-e0804n:2227_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho.
anya-e0804n:2227_1: Tattha attānaṃ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n:2227_2: Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma.
anya-e0804n:2227_4: Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante punanti visodhenti etenāti dantapoṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2229_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
anya-e0804n:2229_1: Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsanamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0804n:2229_3: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ vīci viya kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0804n:2229_4: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti.
anya-e0804n:2229_5: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0804n:2229_7: sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā “piṇātī”ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṃ yujjati.
anya-e0804n:2231_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṃ mināti paricchindatīti mano.
anya-e0804n:2233_1: Macchassa hi “mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro”ti anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n:2233_2: Visesanāmāni pana “amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko
anya-e0804n:2233_3: sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo savaṅko pāvuso” iccevamādīni,
anya-e0804n:2233_5: Kumīnanti kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṃsanti etenāti kumīnaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2238_0: Ettha munīti attano cittaṃ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṃ gantuṃ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n:2239_0: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2240_0: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṃ, sallīnaṃ, paṭisallānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2241_3: idaṃ kho āvuso cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṃ. Suvītaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2241_6: tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ” iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2242_0: Vī hiṃsāyaṃ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṃso.
anya-e0804n:2243_0: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṃ, kusalaṃ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n:2244_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṃ vināseti sarasabhāvaṃ karotīti loṇaṃ, lavaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2244_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṃ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2244_3: Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā.
anya-e0804n:2244_6: Yūsaṃ pātuṃ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṃ jīvitaṃ lunātīti lūto.
anya-e0804n:2246_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā.
anya-e0804n:2246_3: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2248_0: Su hiṃsāyaṃ. Suṇāti. Parasu. Paraṃ suṇanti hiṃsanti etenāti parasu.
anya-e0804n:2252_0: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2259_0: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2267_0: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṃ maññanti.
anya-e0804n:2270_0: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṃ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n:2271_0: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n:2273_0: Pakkhipiṃsu gaṇe evaṃ, na vadiṃsu gahādikaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2274_0: Na tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n:2275_0: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṃ gaṇo visuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2276_0: “Gahādito ppaṇhā” iti, lakkhaṇaṃ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n:2278_0: Sace visuṃ gahādīnaṃ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n:2280_0: “Gahato ppaṇhā” icceva, vattabbaṃ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n:2282_0: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2283_0: Tasmā ayaṃ visuṃyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n:2289_0: Sappayogaṃ gahādīnaṃ, gaṇaṃ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n:2290_3: Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṃ vadati.
anya-e0804n:2290_4: Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ upādānanti samīpattho upasaddo.
anya-e0804n:2290_5: Katthaci hi upasaddo ādānasaddasahito daḷhaggahaṇe vattati “kāmupādāna”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n:2290_6: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṃ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṃ vā,
anya-e0804n:2290_8: tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Gheppati,
anya-e0804n:2290_19: Ahaṃ jāliṃ gahessāmi. Gahetuṃ. Gahetvā. Uggāhako,
anya-e0804n:2290_33: Tathā hi “gaṇhiyanti uggaṇhiyantī”ti niddesapāḷi dissati. “Gehaṃ, gāho,
anya-e0804n:2291_3: Gaṇhasī”ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0804n:2291_4: Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṃ “gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṃ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n:2292_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni “aggahī mattikāpattaṃ. Aggahuṃ,
anya-e0804n:2293_4: “sītaṃ uṇhaṃ paṭihanatī”tiādīsu pana guṇaṃ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n:2294_0: Tasa vipāsāyaṃ. Taṇhā. Kenaṭṭhena taṇhā? Tassati paritassatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n:2295_0: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n:2296_0: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṃsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n:2297_2: Jotati sayaṃ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n:2298_0: Sā tanukaraṇe. Saṇhavācā. Siyati tanukariyati, na pharusabhāvena kakkasā kariyatīti saṇhā.
anya-e0804n:2299_1: Siyati sayaṃ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṃ antaṃ karoti nipphattiṃ pāpetīti saṇhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2300_0: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṃ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n:2301_4: suti sūramati byākaraṇaṃ chandoviciti nirutti jotisatthaṃ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṃ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā
anya-e0804n:2301_5: kāmatantaṃ assalakkhaṇaṃ purāṇaṃ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n:2302_0: Ku kucchāyaṃ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n:2303_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā,
anya-e0804n:2303_2: Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṃ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti kaṇho,
anya-e0804n:2305_0: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṃ, na mayhaṃ manaso piyo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n:2314_0: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n:2317_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane “taṇhāyatī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati,
anya-e0804n:2317_2: mettāyatī”tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2317_3: “Taṇhāyatī”ti hi idaṃ ṇhāpaccayavatā tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2317_4: Tathā kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ “vāsiphalaṃ tāpetvā udakaṃ vā khīraṃ vā uṇhāpetī”ti
anya-e0804n:2317_6: tathāpi tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa
anya-e0804n:2317_7: vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2318_0: Kiñca bhiyyo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “uṇhāpetī”ti kāritapadassa diṭṭhattāyeva “uṇhatī”ti kattupadampi nayato
anya-e0804n:2318_1: diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṃ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā, yathā? Gaṇhati,
anya-e0804n:2318_4: tasmā “usa dāhe”ti dhātussa “uṇhatī”ti rūpaṃ upalabbhatīti mantvā “uṇhatīti uṇha”nti nibbacanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2318_5: Iti ppapaccayo gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati,
anya-e0804n:2318_6: ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2318_8: tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni vicinitabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2318_9: Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo amhehi gahitā,
anya-e0804n:2318_10: imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi,
anya-e0804n:2318_12: tasmā ayaṃ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṃ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n:2319_0: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2324_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2324_2: Tañhi kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṃ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṃ pāpiyatīti “tanū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2324_3: “Tanu vapu sarīraṃ puṃ kāyo deho”tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā.
anya-e0804n:2324_7: na tato attā vā attaniyaṃ vā upalabbhati.
anya-e0804n:2324_9: appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṃ na passāma,
anya-e0804n:2325_0: Tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma. Tanute, tanunte. Tanuse, tanuse, tanuvhe. Tane, tanumhe.
anya-e0804n:2326_0: Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, tane, taneyyuṃ. Vitana, vitanu. Atanā, atanu.
anya-e0804n:2328_1: So hi atthānaṃ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya saparahitaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti “sakko”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2328_2: Aññatra pana dhātūnaṃ avisaye taddhitavasena sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṃ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2328_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0804n:2331_2: Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2333_0: Hanu apanayane. Apanayanaṃ anālāpakaraṇaṃ nibbacanatākaraṇaṃ. Hanoti. Hanute.
anya-e0804n:2335_0: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṃ. Mānasaṃ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n:2336_2: Imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ manasaddānaṃ “yasmiṃ mano nivisati.
anya-e0804n:2336_3: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotī”tiādīsu punnapuṃsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n:2336_6: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha hi rāgo mānasaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2336_9: kālaṃ kayirā jane suto”ti ettha arahattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2339_1: Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṃ mānasaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2339_2: Anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2339_6: rūpāni manu passatī”ti ettha hi “manū”ti satto vutto.
anya-e0804n:2339_7: Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṃ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne ṭhito manunāmako puriso,
anya-e0804n:2339_9: So hi sakalalokassa hitaṃ kātuṃ manute jānātīti “manū”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2339_10: Yathābalaṃ attano hitaṃ manute jānātīti manusso,
anya-e0804n:2339_12: Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṃ manusso.
anya-e0804n:2339_14: nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate “māṇavo”ti rūpaṃ sijjhati.
anya-e0804n:2339_19: na panettha vattabbaṃ “māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṃ vacanaṃ virujjhatī”ti antarasaddassa atthuddhāre
anya-e0804n:2340_1: cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttasmiñhi “subho māṇavotodeyyaputto”ti imasmiṃ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko,
anya-e0804n:2340_4: so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī”ti evaṃ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito,
anya-e0804n:2340_5: taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi “yaṃ apaccaṃ kucchitaṃ muddhaṃ vā,
anya-e0804n:2340_7: yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṃ ‘taruṇakāle vohariṃsū”ti,
anya-e0804n:2340_12: ye pamajjanti māṇavā”tiādīsu hi satto “māṇavo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n:2342_0: Ettha āpoti appoti taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n:2343_0: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṃ, vimānaṃ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:2344_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṃ na minoti na vicchindati,
anya-e0804n:2344_1: sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā yathā “goṇo viya gavajo”ti.
anya-e0804n:2344_6: Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro “sīho viya bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2344_10: Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi,
anya-e0804n:2344_11: tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena “sīho viya bhagavā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2344_12: Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena visesato miniyati paricchindiyatīti vimānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2345_0: Kara karaṇe. “Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti,
anya-e0804n:2345_8: Tasmiṃyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṃ vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo.
anya-e0804n:2346_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca.
anya-e0804n:2346_2: kammavasena pana ayaṃ pāḷi “kuṭi me kayirati adesitavatthukā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2346_3: Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṃ kattupadaṃ yirapaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2346_4: Kammavasena pana vuttaṃ kammapadaṃ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṃ rayakārānaṃ vipariyāyenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti,
anya-e0804n:2347_1: tatra paṭhamaṃ “kubbatī”ti padasseva padamālaṃ yojessāma sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n:2347_2: “Karotī”ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana “kāretī”ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ pacchā yojessāma ekākārena ayojetabbattā.
anya-e0804n:2348_0: Tatra kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasi, kubbatha. Kubbāmi, kubbāma. Kubbate, kubbante. Kubbase, kubbavhe. Kubbe, kubbamhe.
anya-e0804n:2349_0: Pañcamiyādīnaṃ vasena pana kubbatu, kubbantu. Kubbeyya,
anya-e0804n:2350_2: Kubbasī”tiādinā vuttā ayaṃ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā.
anya-e0804n:2350_3: Saddasatthavidū pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṃ katvā “kubbati,
anya-e0804n:2350_4: kubbasī”ti evaṃpakārāni rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ natthīti maññantā na icchanti.
anya-e0804n:2350_5: Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi “asanto nānukubbantī”tiādīsu okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṃ pappotīti maññamānā “kubbanti,
anya-e0804n:2350_9: Mayaṃ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma.
anya-e0804n:2350_10: Atra sotārānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ kiñci pāḷinayaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0804n:2350_19: Tathā hi yathā “agginiṃ sampajjalitaṃ pavisantī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṃ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n:2351_0: Yathā ca “bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedā”ti pāḷigatidassanato “santo sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ
anya-e0804n:2351_1: upetīti pavedayantī”ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca “sabbhi, sabbhī, sabbhayo. Sabbhiṃ, sabbhī, sabbhayo.
anya-e0804n:2352_0: Idāni yathāpaṭiññātā padamālā anuppattā. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kare, karumhe.
anya-e0804n:2353_0: Karotu, kurutu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurutaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2356_0: Taṃ vivāhaṃ asaṃyuttaṃ, kathaṃ amhe karomase”ti
anya-e0804n:2357_0: Pāḷidassanato “karomase”ti padaṃ kasmā idha na vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2357_1: nanu karadhātuto paraṃ okāraṃ paṭicca āmasevacanassāvayavabhūto ākāro lopaṃ pappotīti? Tanna,
anya-e0804n:2357_6: Evaṃbhūto ca sekāro katthaci nāmikapadato paro hoti “ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse.
anya-e0804n:2359_0: Sutaṃ netaṃ abhiṇhaso, tasmā evaṃ vademase”ti
anya-e0804n:2362_0: Kara, karu. Kare, karittha. Karaṃ, karimha. Karittha, karire. Karittho, karivho. Kariṃ, karimhe.
anya-e0804n:2363_0: Ettha karāti puriso kammaṃ karīti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2363_2: akaraṃ kammadukkaṭa”nti etthāpi “mahārāja bhavaṃ āguṃ karī”ti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2363_3: Evañhi sati ayaṃ payogo “maññe bhavaṃ patthayati,
anya-e0804n:2363_4: rañño bhariyaṃ patibbata”ntiādayo viya paṭhamapurisappayogo bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2364_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana majjhimapurisappayogo vutto “āguṃ karāti mahārāja tvaṃ mahāparādhaṃ mahāpāpaṃ kari.
anya-e0804n:2364_1: Dukkaṭanti yaṃ kataṃ dukkaṭaṃ hoti,taṃ lāmakaṃ kammaṃ akara”nti,
anya-e0804n:2364_2: tasmā jātakaṭṭhakathāvasenāpi kadāci karaiti ca karīti ca akaranti ca majjhimapurisappayogo bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2364_10: mā kisittho mayā vinā”ti ettha “kisittho”ti padena samaṃ parokkhāyattanopadamajjhimapurisekavacanavasena,
anya-e0804n:2364_11: ediso pana nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2365_3: Akarāti puriso kammaṃ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:2365_7: mā me udakamāharī”ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo
anya-e0804n:2366_0: Kiñca bhiyyo “jarādhammaṃ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṃ ṭhāna”ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve
anya-e0804n:2366_1: māsaddayogato ajjatanīvibhattipañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “mā jīratū”tiādinā paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2366_2: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “jarādhammaṃ mā jīrīti yaṃ mayhaṃ jarāsabhāvaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2366_7: mayhampetaṃ na ruccatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n:2366_8: Tassāyamattho “ācariya bhavaṃ atikkantakaraṇaṃ akarā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2366_9: Apica “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe “tva”nti vacanaṃ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena “ācariya tvaṃ atikkantakaraṇaṃ karosī”ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n:2367_0: Akaro, akattha, akarotha. Akaraṃ, akaṃ, akaramha, akamha.
anya-e0804n:2367_2: akaṃ puḷinacetiya”nti pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Akattha, akatthuṃ. Akuruse,
anya-e0804n:2368_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2368_1: Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena.
anya-e0804n:2368_8: Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṃ āmasevacanassāvayavo,
anya-e0804n:2368_16: Eseseti imassa hi “esoso eko ekaṭṭho”ti attho.
anya-e0804n:2368_19: Tattha “akaramhasa te kicca”nti imassa “akaramhase te kicca”nti attho.
anya-e0804n:2369_0: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṃ, akariṃsu, akaṃsu, akaṃsuṃ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n:2370_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṃ akaroti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2370_1: “Akaro” iti hi padaṃ “varañce me ado sakkā”ti ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṃ “ado”ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ
anya-e0804n:2370_8: mā kho sūkaramukho ahū”tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato “tvaṃ pāpaṃ mā akāsi,
anya-e0804n:2370_9: mā sūkaramukho ahosī”ti padayojanā kātabbā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2371_0: Akariṃ, kariṃ, akāsiṃ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha. Akarā, akarū. Akaruse,
anya-e0804n:2372_13: Tathā kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Kāhiti, kāhinti.
anya-e0804n:2373_0: Akarissā, akarissa, akarissaṃsūti sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Kālātipattivasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2375_0: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n:2377_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṃ “puññañce puriso kayirā”ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2377_1: “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti etthāpi “sārathi bhavaṃ adhammaṃ kareyyā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2377_3: Atha vā “kayirāsī”ti vattabbe sikāralopaṃ katvā “kayirā”ti majjhimapurisavacanaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2378_1: yathā “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti pāḷiyaṃ “labhethā”ti imassa padassa “sabbhireva samāsetha,
anya-e0804n:2378_2: sabbhi kubbetha santhava”ntiādīsu “samāsethā”tiādīnaṃ viya paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṃ
anya-e0804n:2378_4: tathā tumhehipi “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha “kayirā”ti padassa purisavipallāsaṃ katvā “kareyyāsī”ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo,
anya-e0804n:2378_6: evaṃ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu paramakosallasamannāgatattā “tva”nti vattabbe atthe bhavaṃsaddo pavattati,
anya-e0804n:2378_7: “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe tvaṃsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena “kareyyāsī”ti attho vutto,
anya-e0804n:2378_9: Tathā hi “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “labhethā”ti ulliṅgitvā “labheyya”nti purisavipallāsavasena vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0804n:2378_10: “Adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kayirā”ti ulliṅgitvā “kareyyāsī”ti vivaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0804n:2378_11: tasmā “adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2378_12: Atha vā yathā “puttaṃ labhetha varada”nti ettha ca “kāye rajo na limpethā”tiādīsu ethavacanaṃ gahitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2378_13: evaṃ ethavacanaṃ aggahetvā “labhe athā”ti padacchedo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0804n:2378_15: Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṃ “vajjhañcāpi pamocaye”ti padamiva.
anya-e0804n:2378_17: Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena aparampi varaṃ puttaṃ labheyyanti attho.
anya-e0804n:2378_19: yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo,
anya-e0804n:2379_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti
anya-e0804n:2379_2: tathāpi so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito.
anya-e0804n:2379_3: Tatra kayirāthāti padaṃ sattamiyā parassapadavasena attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati,
anya-e0804n:2379_6: dadantā aparāpara”nti ettha “kayirāthā”ti idaṃ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2379_8: “Kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti ettha pana “kayirāthā”ti idaṃ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2379_10: Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n:2380_8: Kārāpetīti kārāpako. Karaṃ, kubbaṃ, krubbaṃ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno,
anya-e0804n:2380_18: Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi “aphalā hoti akrubbato”tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṃyogavantāni padāni dissanti,
anya-e0804n:2380_19: tathāpi klesasaddo viya pāḷiyaṃ na dissati,
anya-e0804n:2380_20: adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n:2381_0: Kātuṃ, kattuṃ. Kātave, kāretuṃ. Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā,
anya-e0804n:2382_2: Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṃ nissāya “adhikicca” iti rūpaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0804n:2382_3: mayaṃ panetādisaṃ rūpaṃ pāḷiyā anukūlaṃ na hotīti na icchāma.
anya-e0804n:2382_4: Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṃ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane “padakkhiṇaṃ kacca nipacca pāde”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n:2382_6: Kaccāti padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti,
anya-e0804n:2383_0: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṃ atthātisayayogaṃ kathayāma –
anya-e0804n:2384_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṃ taṇhaṃ lobhaṃ karoti hiṃsatīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n:2384_1: Atha vā rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṃ sinehaṃ karoti janetīti taṇhaṅkaro.
anya-e0804n:2384_4: Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2384_5: Atha vā piyaṃ piyāyamāno tussamāno modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2384_6: Yathā “rājānaṃ sevatī”ti etasmiṃ atthe rājānaṃ piyaṃ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti,
anya-e0804n:2385_1: “parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhittaṃ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2388_0: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṃ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n:2389_0: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2396_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:2403_3: Tasmiṃ theyye curadhtu vattati. Coreti, corayati, coro, corī, corikā, coretu,
anya-e0804n:2406_0: Tattha lokoti tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0804n:2406_1: Tattha “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:2406_2: “Sassato loko’ti vā ‘asassato loko’ti vā”ti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
anya-e0804n:2412_0: Atha vā lokoti tividho loko kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti.
anya-e0804n:2412_8: Tattha ye vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā,
anya-e0804n:2414_0: “Saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsaloko khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātulokoti anekavidho loko.
anya-e0804n:2414_2: aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo’ti ettha saṅkhāraloko vutto.
anya-e0804n:2414_4: ‘Ayaṃ loko paro loko brahmaloko sadevako’tiādīsu pana sattaloko vutto.
anya-e0804n:2414_8: ettha tevattate vaso’ti ettha okāsaloko vutto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2415_0: Atthato pana indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho santāno ca sattaloko,
anya-e0804n:2415_3: Anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpānaṃ samūho santāno ca okāsaloko,
anya-e0804n:2415_7: Duvidhopi cesa rūpādidhamme upādāya paññattattā upādāpaññattibhūto aparamatthasabhāvo sappaccaye pana
anya-e0804n:2415_8: rūpārūpadhamme upādāya paññattattā tadubhayassāpi upādānānaṃ vasena pariyāyato paccayāyattavuttitā upacaritabbā,
anya-e0804n:2415_11: lujjanti palujjanti cāti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi satipi lujjanapalujjanatte
anya-e0804n:2416_1: ālokenti etena bhuso passanti janā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vāti āloko.
anya-e0804n:2416_8: Avalokananti “nāgāvalokitaṃ avaloketvā”tiādīsu viya purimakāyaṃ parivattetvā pekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2416_9: “Ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hotī”ti etthāpi bhāvavasena ālokanaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokanaṃ vilokitanti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2417_0: Thaka paṭighāte. Thaketi, thakayati dvāraṃ puriso.
anya-e0804n:2418_0: Takka vitakke. Takketi, vitakketi, vitakkayati. Takko, vitakko, vitakkitā.
anya-e0804n:2419_5: vitakkanamattameva vā etanti vitakko. “Takko, vitakko, appanā, byappanā,
anya-e0804n:2420_4: Ye imasmiṃ curādigaṇe anekassarā asaṃyogantā ikārānubandhavasena niddiṭṭhā dhātavo,
anya-e0804n:2420_5: te evaṃvuttehi imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatā ākhyātattaṃ nāmikattañca pāpuṇantā ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpāyeva bhavanti,
anya-e0804n:2420_6: na katthacipi vigataniggahītāgamarūpāni bhavanti. Aṅketi, aṅkayati. Aṅkanaṃ, aṅko.
anya-e0804n:2421_0: Sakka vakka bhāsane. Sakketi, sakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n:2422_0: Nakka vakka nāsane. Nakketi, nakkayati. Vakketi, vakkayati.
anya-e0804n:2426_0: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ sampattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:2428_3: So hi mahājutitāya akkiyati abhitthaviyati tappasannehi janehīti akko.
anya-e0804n:2431_4: Ettha ca “bukkayati sā core” iti lokiyappayogo veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:2432_0: Daka laka assādane. Daketi, dakayati. Laketi, lakayati.
anya-e0804n:2433_0: Takka loka bhāsāyaṃ. Takketi, takkayati. Loketi, lokayati.
anya-e0804n:2434_0: Cika sika āmasane. Ciketi, cikayati. Siketi, sikayati.
anya-e0804n:2438_0: Gaṅgāya vālukā khīye, udakaṃ khīye mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0804n:2439_0: Mahiyā mattikā khīye, lakkhe na mama buddhiyā.
anya-e0804n:2440_7: Lakkhadhātuyā yupaccayantāya samādipubbānaṃ rūpānaṃ nakāro dantajo.
anya-e0804n:2443_2: Tattha makkhoti parehi kataguṇaṃ makkheti pisatīti makkho,
anya-e0804n:2443_4: “Makkhaṃ asahamāno”ti ettha pana attani parehi kataṃ avamaññanaṃ makkhoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2444_7: “Paramayakkhavisuddhiṃ paññāpentī”ti ettha hi yakkhasaddo satte vattati.
anya-e0804n:2444_8: Tathā hi yakkhopi sattopi devopi sakkopi khīṇāsavopi yakkhoyeva nāma,
anya-e0804n:2444_9: mahānubhāvatāya yakkhiyati saraṇagatehi janehi nānāpaccayehi nānābalīhi ca pūjiyatīti yakkho.
anya-e0804n:2445_0: Satte deve ca sakke ca, khīṇāsave ca rakkhase;
anya-e0804n:2447_0: Lakkha ālocane. Lakkheti, lakkhayati. Lakkhaṃ vijjhati usunā.
anya-e0804n:2449_5: Ettha ca “samaṇo ayaṃ pāpo atirukkhavāco”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2452_3: Ettha liṅgaṃ nāma dīgharassakisathūlaparimaṇḍalādibhedaṃ saṇṭhānanti gahaṇe atīva yujjati.
anya-e0804n:2452_5: liṅgīyati vicittaṃ kariyati avijjātaṇhākammehi utunā vā cuṇṇādīhi vā sarīramiti liṅgaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2452_7: Liṅgasaddo sadde saddappavattinimitte itthibyañjane purisabyañjane saññāṇe ākāre cāti imesu atthesu dissati.
anya-e0804n:2452_8: Ayañhi “rukkhoti vacanaṃ liṅga”nti ettha sadde dissati.
anya-e0804n:2452_10: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavatī”ti ettha itthibyañjane.
anya-e0804n:2452_14: “Tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi tehi ākārehi āgantukabhāvo jānitabbo “āgantukā ime”ti ettha ākāre dissati.
anya-e0804n:2453_0: Sadde ca tannimitte ca, kāṭakoṭacikāya ca;
anya-e0804n:2455_0: Maga anvesane. Mageti, magayati. Migo, mago, mago, magayamāno.
anya-e0804n:2456_0: Ettha ca “yathā biḷāro mūsikaṃ magayamāno”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2456_2: Ettha migoti magayati ito cito gocaraṃ anvesati pariyesatīti migo.
anya-e0804n:2456_4: Ettha visesato hariṇa migo migo nāma.
anya-e0804n:2456_5: Sāmaññato pana avasesāpi catuppadā “migo” icceva vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:2456_6: Tathā hi susīmajātake “kāḷā migā setadantā tava ime,
anya-e0804n:2456_7: parosahassaṃ hemajālābhisañchannā”ti etasmiṃ pāḷippadese hatthinopi migasaddena vuttā “kāḷamigā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2456_8: Atha vā magiyati jīvitakappanatthāya maṃsādīhi atthikehi luddehi anvesiyati pariyesiyatīti migo,
anya-e0804n:2456_11: “Atthaṃ na labhate mago”ti ettha pana mago viyāti mago,
anya-e0804n:2457_0: Magga gavesane. Maggeti, maggayati. Maggo, magganaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2458_0: Ettha ca maggoti paṭipadāya ca pakatimaggassa ca upāyassa ca adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2458_3: Tatra paṭipadā ekantato jātijarābyādhidukkhādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi dukkhakkhayaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇatthāya maggitabbo gavesitabboti maggo.
anya-e0804n:2458_5: Pakatimaggamūḷhehi ca paṭipadāsaṅkhātāriyamaggamūḷhā eva bahavo santi.
anya-e0804n:2458_6: Pakatimaggo hi kadāci eva addhikānaṃ muyhati,
anya-e0804n:2458_10: Tasmā so eva avijjāsammūḷhehi maggitabboti maggo.
anya-e0804n:2458_11: Aññesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasenapi atthaṃ vadanti garū “kilese mārento gacchatīti maggo”ti.
anya-e0804n:2458_12: Taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ hitaṃ vā nipphādetukāmehi maggiyati gavesiyatīti maggo, upāyo.
anya-e0804n:2458_16: khandhāyatanādīnaṃ kusalādīnañca dhammānaṃ avabodhassa saccappaṭivedhasseva vā upāyabhāvato abhidhammakathāmaggo”ti vutto,
anya-e0804n:2458_18: So hi dīghattā maggo viyāti maggo,
anya-e0804n:2463_0: Nāva uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti
anya-e0804n:2464_1: Ettha pana keci “nāvātiādīni pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0804n:2465_18: “kullo’ti kho bhikkhave ariyamaggassetaṃ adhivacana”nti ca evamādinā tattha tattha bhagavatā ariyamaggo “nāvā”tiādīhi anekehi nāmehi vutto.
anya-e0804n:2465_19: Aṭṭhakathācariyehipi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “baddhā bhisi susaṅkhatā bhagavā”ti etasmiṃ padese evaṃ
anya-e0804n:2465_20: atthasaṃvaṇṇanā katā “bhisīti pattharitvā puthulaṃ katvā baddhā ‘kullā’ti vuccati loke,
anya-e0804n:2467_0: Nāvā uttara setu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo;
anya-e0804n:2469_0: Evaṃ ācariyehi katāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya dassanato ca “nāvātiādīnipi pakatimaggassa nāmānī”ti vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2470_0: Koci panettha evaṃ vadeyya “dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ katvā’ti ettha ‘dhammasetunti maggasetu’nti vacanato dhammasaddo magge vattati,
anya-e0804n:2470_2: dhammasaddo viya setusaddopi magge vattatīti setu viyāti setu,
anya-e0804n:2470_5: Aparampi vadeyya “nanu brahmajālasuttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṃ
anya-e0804n:2470_6: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbuttarabhāge ṭhito’ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne dakkhiṇuttarasaddena dakkhiṇo maggo vutto”ti.  Na,
anya-e0804n:2470_7: anekesu pāḷippadesesu aṭṭhakathāpadesesu ca abhidhānasatthesu ca maggavācakassa uttarasaddassa anāgatattā,
anya-e0804n:2470_8: tasmā tattha evamattho daṭṭhabbo “dakkhiṇadisato gantabbo uttaradisābhāgo dakkhiṇuttaroti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:2470_9: evaṃbhūtena dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍapavisanaṃ sandhāya dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvāti vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n:2470_12: Evaṃ gahaṇaṃyeva hi yaṃ jātakanidāne vuttaṃ “bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ ārūyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge uttarābhimukho aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0804n:2470_13: tasmiṃ khaṇe dakkhiṇacakkavāḷaṃ osīditvā heṭṭhā avīcisampattaṃ viya ahosi,
anya-e0804n:2470_14: uttaracakkavāḷaṃ ullaṅghitvā upari bhavaggappattaṃ viya ahosi,
anya-e0804n:2470_15: bodhisatto idaṃ sambodhipāpuṇaṭṭhānaṃ na bhavati maññeti padakkhiṇaṃ karonto pacchimadisābhāgaṃ gantvā puratthābhimukho aṭṭhāsī”tiādi,
anya-e0804n:2470_18: evañca sati “dakkhiṇuttarenā”ti enayogaṃ avatvā “dakkhiṇuttarāyā”ti āyayogo vattabbo”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0804n:2473_3: Sāsanasmiñhi bhūvādigaṇacurādigaṇapariyāpannassa gatyatthavācakaullaṅghanatthaparidīpakassa dhātussa rūpaṃ atīva pasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2477_0: Imasmiṃ sattilaṅghanajātake curādigaṇapariyāpannassa gatyatthavācakassa ullaṅghanatthaparidīpakassa laṅghadhātussa “laṅghayitvā,
anya-e0804n:2477_3: Bhāsatthavācakassa pana tathārūpāni rūpāni na diṭṭhāni,
anya-e0804n:2477_4: evaṃ santepi pubbācariyehi dīghadassīhi abhimatattā bhāsatthavācikāpi laṅghadhātu atthīti gahetabbā,
anya-e0804n:2477_5: evaṃ sabbesupi bhūvādigaṇādīsu sāsane appasiddhānampi rūpānaṃ sāsanānukūlānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2478_0: Agha pāpakaraṇe. Agheti, aghayati. Aghaṃ, agho, anagho.
anya-e0804n:2479_6: Tattha aghayanti pāpaṃ karonti sattā etenāti aghaṃ, kintaṃ? Dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2479_8: Nanu ca sappurisā dukkhahetupi kilesahetupi ca attano sukhatthāya pāpaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0804n:2483_0: Chandā ca dosā na jahanti dhamma”nti
anya-e0804n:2484_1: Evaṃ sante kasmā “agha pāpakaraṇe”ti dhātu ca “aghayanti pāpaṃ karonti sattā etenāti agha”ntiādivacanañca vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2484_2: yebhuyyena pana sattā dukkhādihetu pāpakammaṃ karonti,
anya-e0804n:2484_5: Evaṃ pāpakaraṇassa hi dukkhaṃ kileso ca hetu.
anya-e0804n:2489_1: Ayañhi gāthā dukkhahetupi sattā pāpaṃ karontīti etamatthaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0804n:2489_3: kuddho hanti samātara”nti ayaṃ pana kilesahetupi pāpaṃ karontīti etamatthaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0804n:2492_0: Loca dassane. Loceti, locayati. Locanaṃ. Rūpārammaṇaṃ locayati passatīti locanaṃ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2493_0: Kici maddane. Kiñceti, kiñcayati. Kiñcanaṃ, akiñcano.
anya-e0804n:2494_3: Manussā hi vīhiṃ maddantā goṇaṃ “kiñcehi kāpila,
anya-e0804n:2495_0: Paci vitthāre. Pañceti, pañcayati. Papañceti, papañcayati. Papañcā.
anya-e0804n:2496_1: Etā hi attanissitānaṃ sattānaṃ saṃsāraṃ papañcenti vitthinnaṃ karontīti papañcāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:2496_2: Atha vā papañcenti yattha sayaṃ uppannā taṃsantānaṃ vitthārenti ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā.
anya-e0804n:2496_3: Lokiyā pana “amhākaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ kathentānaṃ papañco hotī”tiādīni vadantā kālassa cirabhāvaṃ papañcoti vadanti,
anya-e0804n:2500_0: Cu cavane. Cāveti, cāvayati. Añño “cu sahane” iti brute. Cāveti, cāvayati, sahatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2502_1: locayati samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya bhavatīti locanaṃ, cakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2503_0: Raca patiyatane. Raceti, racayati. Racanā, viracitaṃ, kesaracanā, gāthāracanā.
anya-e0804n:2504_0: Sūca pesuññe. Pisuṇabhāvo pesuññaṃ. Sūceti, sūcayati. Sūcako.
anya-e0804n:2507_5: vācayatī”ti rūpāni. Vattuṃ, vattave, vatvā, vuttaṃ, vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2509_0: Sūca gandhane. Suceti, sūcayati. Sūcako, suttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2510_0: Ettha ca attatthaparatthādibhede atthe sūcetīti suttaṃ. Tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2512_0: Ettha kaccoti rūpasampattiyā kacceti dibbati virocatīti kacco,
anya-e0804n:2515_0: Milecha abyattāyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Mileccheti, milecchayati. Milakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2516_0: Ettha milakkhūti mileccheti abyattavācaṃ bhāsatīti milakkhu.
anya-e0804n:2517_0: Kuccha avakkhepe. Avakkhepo adhokhipanaṃ. Kuccheti, kucchayati.
anya-e0804n:2521_0: Vajja vajjane. Vajjeti, vajjayati. Parivajjanako. Vajjito sīlavantehi, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasīti.
anya-e0804n:2523_0: Tuji piji hiṃsābaladānaniketanesu. Niketanaṃ nivāso. Tuñjeti, tuñjayati. Piñjeti. Piñjayati.
anya-e0804n:2525_0: Khaji rakkhaṇe. Tādisāniyeva rūpāni. Bhūvādigaṇe “khaji gativekalleti imissā “khañjatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2526_1: Esāva pūjanā seyyo. Pūjako, pūjito, pūjanīyo,
anya-e0804n:2530_0: Tajja santajjane. Tajjeti, tajjayati. Santajjeti, santajjayati. Santajjito.
anya-e0804n:2532_0: Sajja sajjane. Sajjeti, sajjayati dānaṃ. Gamanasajjo hutvā.
anya-e0804n:2533_0: Bhaja vissāse. Bhajeti, bhajayati. Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bhajatī”ti rūpaṃ, bhatti, sambhatti.
anya-e0804n:2534_0: Tuji piji luji bhaji bhāsāyaṃ. Tuñjeti,
anya-e0804n:2539_0: Yuja saṃyamane. Saṃpubbo bandhane. Yojeti, yojayati. Saṃyojeti, saṃyojayati. Saṃyojanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2540_0: Majja soceyyālaṅkāresu. Majjeti, majjayati. Sammajjeti, sammajjayati. Sammajjā.
anya-e0804n:2541_0: Bhāja bhājanadānesu. Bhājeti, bhājayati. Kathaṃ vessantaro putto, gajaṃ bhājeti sañcaya.
anya-e0804n:2548_0: Naṭa avasandane. Avasandanaṃ gattavikkhepo. Naṭeti, naṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2549_0: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭṭa chedane. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Chuṭeti, chuṭayati. Kuṭṭeti, kuṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2550_0: Puṭṭa caṭṭa appabhāve. Puṭṭeti, puṭṭayati. Cuṭṭeti, cuṭṭayati, appaṃ bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2552_0: Aṭṭa suṭṭa anādare. Aṭṭeti, aṭṭayati. Suṭṭeti, suṭṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2555_0: Tuvaṭṭa nipajjāyaṃ. Tuvaṭṭeti, tuvaṭṭayati. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
anya-e0804n:2558_0: Kīṭa bandhe. Bandho bandhanaṃ. Kīṭeti, kīṭayati. Kīṭo.
anya-e0804n:2561_0: Kūṭa appasāde. Kūṭeti, kūṭayati. Kūṭaṃ rajataṃ. Kūṭā gāvī. Kuṭatāpaso.
anya-e0804n:2562_0: Cuṭa puṭa phuṭa vibhede. Cuṭeti, cuṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Phoṭeti, phoṭayati. Aṅguliyo phoṭesuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2563_0: Ghaṭa saṅghāṭe hantyatthe ca. Ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2564_0: Paṭa puṭa luṭa ghaṭa ghaṭi bhāsāyaṃ. Pāṭeti, pāṭayati. Poṭeti, poṭayati. Loṭeti, loṭayati. Ghāṭeti,
anya-e0804n:2565_0: Paṭa vaṭa ganthe. Paṭeti, paṭayati. Vaṭeti, vaṭayati.
anya-e0804n:2578_0: Ettha saṭhoti kerāṭiko. Saṭhayatīti saṭho, na sammā bhāsatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2582_0: Ettha sākuṇiko “kitavā”ti vutto. Tassa idaṃ ketavaṃ, tasmiṃ ketave ayaṃ dhātu vattatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2586_0: Paṭi parihāse. Paṇḍeti, paṇḍayati. Uppaṇḍeti, uppaṇḍayati. Manussānaṃ naṃ bhikkhuniṃ uppaṇḍiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:2588_0: Khaḍi kaḍi chede. Khaṇḍeti, khaṇḍayati. Kaṇḍeti, kaṇḍayati. Khaṇḍo, kaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:2590_0: Ettha ca piṇḍoti samūhasaṅkhāto kalāpopi “coḷaṃ piṇḍo rati khiḍḍā”ti ettha vutto āhārasaṅkhāto piṇḍopi piṇḍoyeva.
anya-e0804n:2592_0: Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ hasane ca. Maṇḍeti, maṇḍayati. Maṇḍo, maṇḍanaṃ, maṇḍito.
anya-e0804n:2593_0: Bhaḍi kalyāṇe. Kalyāṇaṃ kalyāṇatā. Bhaṇḍeti, bhaṇḍayati. Bhaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:2594_0: Ettha ca bhaṇḍoti dhanaṃ, alaṅkāro vā. “Bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti. Samalaṅkaritvā bhaṇḍenā”ti ca ādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:2599_0: Vaḍḍha ākiraṇe. Kaṃsapātiyā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍheti, vaḍḍhayati. Bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi.
anya-e0804n:2603_2: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2604_0: Tattha chaviyanti chavigatā vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
anya-e0804n:2604_4: Vaṇṇiyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāviyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2604_10: Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena vaṇṇasaddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0804n:2606_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2607_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2608_2: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇe.
anya-e0804n:2609_0: Chaviyaṃ thutiyaṃ heme, kulavagge ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n:2615_0: Cuṇṇa peraṇe. Cuṇṇeti, cuṇṇayati. Cuṇṇaṃ. Cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n:2617_0: Kuṇa saṅkocane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Kuṇo. Kuṇahattho. Hatthena kuṇī.
anya-e0804n:2619_0: Ettha tūṇīti sarakalāpo. Sā hi tūṇenti pūrenti sare etthāti tūṇī.
anya-e0804n:2622_0: Ettha kāṇoti ekena vā dvīhi vā akkhīhi parihīnakkhi.
anya-e0804n:2622_4: Itarathā kāṇakacchapopamasutte vutto kacchapo ekasmiṃ kāṇo siyā,
anya-e0804n:2622_5: ekakkhikāṇo ca pana puriso “andho”ti na vattabbo siyā,
anya-e0804n:2622_6: tasmā tesamayugaḷatte ekekassa yathāsambhavaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnamākārānaṃ vācakatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n:2622_7: Tathā hi kosalasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kāṇoti ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2622_8: Atha vā “ovadeyyānusāseyyā”ti ettha ovādānusāsanānaṃ viya savisesatā avisesatā ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n:2623_0: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne. Gaṇeti, gaṇayati. Gaṇanā, gaṇo.
anya-e0804n:2637_1: tathāpi saṅghagaṇasaddāyeva vināpi visesakapadena bhikkhusamūhe vattanti, nāññe,
anya-e0804n:2637_2: aññe pana saṅghagaṇasaddehi saddhiṃ aññamaññañca kadāci samānatthavisayā honti,
anya-e0804n:2639_0: Kuṇa guṇa āmantane. Kuṇeti, kuṇayati. Guṇeti, guṇayati. Guṇo. Goṇo.
anya-e0804n:2640_2: Goṇāpiyati āmantāpiyati attani patiṭṭhito puggalo daṭṭhuṃ sotuṃ pūjituñca icchantehi janehīti guṇo.
anya-e0804n:2640_4: tathāpi taṃhetuāmantanaṃ nimantanañca teyeva karonti nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2645_0: Ettha kassakassa tuṭṭhiuppattikāraṇattā hetuvasena niccetanassapi phalassa tosanaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2645_2: Aññe pana “guñjante abyayante iti guṇā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2647_0: Ettha vaṇoti aru. Sā hi sarīraṃ vaṇayati vicuṇṇeti chiddāvachiddaṃ karotīti vaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2648_0: Paṇṇa harite. Paṇṇeti, paṇṇayati. Tālapaṇṇaṃ. Sūpeyyapaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2649_0: Ettha ca haritabhāvavigatepi vatthusmiṃ paṇṇabhāvo rūḷhito pavattoti daṭṭhabbo. “Paṇṇaṃ, pattaṃ, palāso,
anya-e0804n:2650_0: Paṇa byavahāre. Paṇeti, paṇayati. Rājā ca daṇḍaṃ garukaṃ paṇeti.
anya-e0804n:2654_4: kasmā “ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti citta”nti vatvāpi “vijānātīti attho”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2654_7: duppaññassa hi nānappakārehi cintayatopi sukhumatthādhigamo na hotīti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2654_8: “vijānātī”ti idaṃ padaṃ cittassa saññāpaññākiccehi visiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā cittasaddassa.
anya-e0804n:2654_11: tasmā vijānanatthaṃ gahetvā saññāpaññākiccāvisiṭṭhavisayaggahaṇaṃ dīpetuṃ “vijānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2655_2: taṃ javanavīthivasena attano santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2655_6: sabbassa tassa citteneva karaṇato citteti vicitteti vicittaṃ kariyati etenāti cittaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2656_0: Ettha hi cittassa sarāgasadosādibhedabhinnattā sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ vasena cittassa cittatā veditabbā.
anya-e0804n:2656_1: Kiñcāpi ekassa cittassa evaṃ vicittatā natthi,
anya-e0804n:2656_2: tathāpi vicittānaṃ antogadhattā samudāyavohārena avayavopi “citta”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:2656_3: yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādiekadesesu diṭṭhesu pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:2656_4: Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0804n:2656_5: cittānaṃ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṃ kiñci ekampi cittatāya ‘citta’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
anya-e0804n:2657_0: Ettha ca vuttappakārānamatthānaṃ vinicchayo bavati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0804n:2657_1: Yasmā yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
anya-e0804n:2657_7: taṃ parittakriyadvayaṃ antimajavanañca labbhamānacintanavicittatādivasena cittanti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2659_0: Cittaṃ mano mānasañca, viññāṇaṃ hadayaṃ manaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2661_0: Cittasaddo paññattiyaṃ viññāṇe vicitte cittakamme acchariyeti evamādīsu atthesu dissati.
anya-e0804n:2661_5: “Diṭṭhaṃ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṃ nāma citta”ntiādīsu cittakamme.
anya-e0804n:2662_1: Ratto kho brāhmaṇa rāgena abhibhūto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti,
anya-e0804n:2663_1: saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2666_0: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “cetanāhaṃ bhikkhave kammaṃ vadāmi, cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2668_4: tasmā hi manto khippamupeti bheda”nti ettha hi guttabhāsanaṃ “manto”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2668_8: Ettha sikkhā nirutti kappa byākaraṇa jotisattha chandovicitivasena manto “chaḷaṅgo”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:2669_0: Yanta saṅkocane. Yanteti, yantayati. Yantaṃ, telayantaṃ yathācakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī.
anya-e0804n:2671_0: Santa āmappayoge. Āmappayogo nāma ussannakriyā. Santeti, santayati.
anya-e0804n:2673_0: Tanta kuṭumbadhāraṇe. Tanteti, tantayati. Satanto, sappadhānoti attho.
anya-e0804n:2677_2: Tattha sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ. Vāteti, vātayati. Vāto,
anya-e0804n:2679_0: Satta santānakriyāyaṃ. Santānakriyā nāma pabandhakriyā avicchedakaraṇaṃ. Satteti, sattayati. Satto.
anya-e0804n:2682_0: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “gatasattaṃ jaraggava”nti pāṭhassa “vigatajīvitaṃ jiṇṇagoṇa”nti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ.
anya-e0804n:2682_2: “na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu”nti ettha paggahasaddassa pattakathanaṃ viya.
anya-e0804n:2685_0: Kattara sethille. Kattareti, kattarayati. Kattaro. Kattaradaṇḍo, kattarasuppaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2686_3: Kattarayati aṅgānaṃ sithilabhāvena sithilo bhavatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n:2686_4: Kattaradaṇḍoti kattarehi jiṇṇamanussehi ekantato gahetabbatāya kattarānaṃ daṇḍo kattaradaṇḍo.
anya-e0804n:2687_0: Citta cittakaraṇe, kadāci dassanepi. Cittakaraṇaṃ vicittabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Citteti, cittayati. Cittaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2690_0: Katha kathane. Katheti, kathayati. Dhammaṃ sākacchati. Sākacchā, kathā, parikathā, aṭṭhakathā.
anya-e0804n:2691_0: Tattha sākacchatīti saha kathayati. Attho kathiyati etāyāti aṭṭhakathā, tthakārassa ṭṭhakārattaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2695_5: idha pana ikārantavasena kathitassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni niccaṃ bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2699_0: Putha bhāsāyaṃ. Potheti, pothayati. Kathetīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2700_0: Putha pahāre. Potheti, pothayati. Kumāre pothetvā agamāsi.
anya-e0804n:2707_0: Santha gantha santhambhe. Santheti, santhayati. Gantheti, ganthayati. Gantho.
anya-e0804n:2710_0: Hada karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo karīsassa ussaggo vissajjanaṃ. Hadeti, hadayati. Ohadeti, ohadayati.
anya-e0804n:2711_2: tasmā vidadhātu anubhavane vattatīti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2711_4: Dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti. Vedayati. Vedanā, vitti.
anya-e0804n:2713_0: Mida sinehane. Atra sineho nāma pīti. Medeti, medayati.
anya-e0804n:2715_0: Tatra chattanti ātapattaṃ. Ātapaṃ chādetīti chattaṃ. Paṭicchādiyateti channā.
anya-e0804n:2716_0: Cuda sañcodane āṇattiyañca. Codeti, codayati. Codako, cuditako, codanā. Ānando buddhacodito.
anya-e0804n:2717_0: Tatra codanāti cālanā. Cālanāti dosāropanāti attho.
anya-e0804n:2722_0: Ettha ca “maṃ saddāyatīti saññāya vegena udake patī”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2722_1: idaṃ “pabbatāyatī”ti rūpaṃ viya dhātuvasena nipphannaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2722_5: Atha vā saddiyati attho anenāti saddo.
anya-e0804n:2725_0: Kanda sātacce. Sātaccaṃ satatabhāvo nirantarabhāvo. Kandeti, kandayati.
anya-e0804n:2726_0: Muda saṃsagge. Ekatokaraṇaṃ saṃsaggo. Modeti, modayati sattūni sappinā.
anya-e0804n:2727_1: Hetukatturūpānīti na vattabbāni pāḷidassanato “sīho ca sīhanādena,
anya-e0804n:2728_0: Sada assādane. Sādeti, sādayati. Assādeti, assādayati. Ettha āupasaggo rassavasena ṭhito.
anya-e0804n:2729_0: Gada devasadde. Devasaddo vuccati meghasaddo. Gadeti, gadayati.
anya-e0804n:2732_1: Nanu bho yo catudhā vā pañcadhā vā anekasatadhā vā chindati,
anya-e0804n:2732_2: tassa taṃ chedanaṃ dvedhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hoti,
anya-e0804n:2732_3: evaṃ sante kasmā sāmaññena avatvā “dvedhākaraṇe”ti dvidhā gahaṇaṃ katanti?
anya-e0804n:2732_4: Dvidhākaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2732_6: Aparassa hi aparassa chinnakoṭṭhāsassa pubbena ekena koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ apekkhanavasena dvidhākaraṇaṃ hotiyeva. Chedeti,
anya-e0804n:2733_0: Yo te hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n:2734_0: Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ vinassa idaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2735_0: Yo me hatthe ca pāde ca, kaṇṇanāsañca chedayi;
anya-e0804n:2736_0: Ciraṃ jīvatu so rājā, na hi kujjhanti mādisāti.
anya-e0804n:2737_0: Chada apavāraṇe. Chādeti, chādayati. Chattaṃ. Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayati.
anya-e0804n:2738_0: Īdī sandīpane. Īdeti, īdayati. Īkārantavasena niddiṭṭhattā saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2741_11: “Vādo jappo vitaṇḍā”ti evaṃvidhāsu tīsu kathāsu vādasaṅkhātā kathā.
anya-e0804n:2742_6: Purisassa bhattaṃ chādayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati chādentaṃ vā.
anya-e0804n:2743_2: tasmā imassapi saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Vādeti, vādayati, vandati,
anya-e0804n:2744_4: vandanto hi atthato evaṃ vadāpeti nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vutto,
anya-e0804n:2744_5: amhehi pana vandanasaddaṃ saddasatthanayamaggahetvā suddhakattuvasena attho kathito.
anya-e0804n:2744_7: na vadāpanaṃ abhisaddena sambandhitattā “abhivādanasīlissā”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n:2745_0: Athāpi siyā “kassaci vuddhena visiṭṭhaṃ vadāpanaṃ abhivādana”nti,
anya-e0804n:2745_3: chidi dvidhākaraṇe”tiādinā bhāvavasena atthappakāsanamatteyeva “pacati, paccati, pāceti. Chindati, chijjati,
anya-e0804n:2745_4: chedāpetī”tiādīni sakammakāni ceva akammakāni ca sakāritāni ca rūpāni nipphajjanti,
anya-e0804n:2745_5: na ca tadatthāya visuṃ visuṃ dhātuniddeso kariyati.
anya-e0804n:2745_6: Tasmā “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti ettha kāritavasena dhātuattho kathitotipi vattuṃ na sakkā kriyāsabhāvattā dhātūnaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2746_6: Yadi “abhivādetvā”ti imassa padassa “sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā”ti attho siyā,
anya-e0804n:2746_7: “sirasā abhivādayi”nti ettha “sirasā”ti padaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā vadāpanena asambandhattā.
anya-e0804n:2746_11: Yasmā bhūvādigaṇe “vanda abhivādānathutīsū”ti imassa dhātussa “vandatī”ti padarūpassa “abhivandati,
anya-e0804n:2746_14: Tathā hi “vande sugataṃ gativimutta”nti padānamatthaṃ vadantena ṭīkācariyenapi “vandeti vandāmi,
anya-e0804n:2747_15: tasmā taṃ kāritapaccayantaṃ na hotīti siddhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2748_0: Imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathaṃ vidhurajātakappadesaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0804n:2750_0: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2751_3: kathaṃ vā tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve.
anya-e0804n:2751_4: Tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ na upapajjatī”ti.
anya-e0804n:2751_7: Evaṃ vibhāgaṃ pana ñatvā pāḷiyā aṭṭakathāya ca adhippāyo gahetabbo “naro yaṃ puggalaṃ hantuṃ iccheyya,
anya-e0804n:2751_8: so hantā taṃ vajjhaṃ puggalaṃ kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya,
anya-e0804n:2751_10: tena vajjhena maṃ vandāhīti attānaṃ kathaṃ vandāpeyyā”ti.
anya-e0804n:2751_11: Ettha pana “rājāno coraṃ sunakhehipi khādāpentī”tiādīsu viya karaṇavasena “tena vajjhenā”ti padaṃ yojitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2751_12: attho pana “taṃ vajjha”nti upayogavacanavasena daṭṭhabbo dvikammakattā sakāritapaccayassa sakammakadhātuyāti.
anya-e0804n:2751_13: Nanu evaṃ sante “aṭṭhakathācariyā passitabbaṃ na passanti,
anya-e0804n:2751_14: atitthe pakkhandantī”ti tesaṃ doso hotīti? Na hoti,
anya-e0804n:2751_16: tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “abhivādetvā”ti ettha “vadī abhivādanathutīsū”ti dhātuyā atthamaggahetvā
anya-e0804n:2751_17: vohāravisaye kosallasamannāgatattā saṇhasukhumamatthaṃ sotūnaṃ bodhetuṃ “vada viyattiyaṃ vācāya”nti dhātuyevatthaṃ
anya-e0804n:2751_18: gahetvā kāritapaccayaparikappanena kāritatthamādāya “abhivādetvāti ‘sukhī arogo hotū’ti vadāpetvā,
anya-e0804n:2751_19: vandanto hi atthato evaṃ vadāpeti nāmā”ti hetukattuvasena abhivādanasaddattho vuttoti na koci tesaṃ doso.
anya-e0804n:2751_22: idampi ṭhānaṃ sukhumaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2754_6: Puriso sūdaṃ sūdena vā odanaṃ randhāpeti,
anya-e0804n:2756_0: Gandha sūcane addane ca. Sūcanaṃ. Pakāsanaṃ. Addanaṃ pariplutā. Gandheti, gandhayati, gandho.
anya-e0804n:2757_0: Ettha gandhoti gandheti attano vatthuṃ sūcayati pakāsetīti gandho.
anya-e0804n:2757_1: Paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ upasaṃharanto viya pakāsetīti gandho.
anya-e0804n:2757_2: Gamudharadhātudvayavasenapi gandhasaddattho vattabbo “gacchanto dhariyatīti gandho” iti,
anya-e0804n:2757_5: Gandhasaddo ca “uppalagandhatheno”ti ettha chedane vattatīti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:2760_0: Vaddha chedanapūraṇesu. Vaddheti, vaddhayati. Vaddhakī. Vaddhakīti gahakārako.
anya-e0804n:2764_1: Diṭṭhūpasaṃhāro nāma cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāro apanayanaṃ vināso vā.
anya-e0804n:2764_2: Cakkhu hi passanti etāyāti diṭṭhīti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2764_3: Yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu “sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhaṃ
anya-e0804n:2764_5: Ṭīkāyampi ca “diṭṭhimaṇḍaleti abhimukhaṭṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattidesabhūte cakkhusaññitāya diṭṭhiyā maṇḍale”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2764_6: Evaṃbhūtāya diṭṭhiyā upasaṃhāre andhadhātu vattati. Andheti,
anya-e0804n:2764_10: Dvinnaṃ cakkhūnaṃ ekassa vā vasena naṭṭhanayano,
anya-e0804n:2764_12: Kaccāyane pana “khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhā”ti vacanena amadhātussa andhādesakaraṇavasena rūpanipphatti dassitā.
anya-e0804n:2765_0: Badha bandhane. Migaṃ bādheti, bādhayati. Baddho migo, baddhosi mārapāsena.
anya-e0804n:2766_0: Tattha bādhetīti bandhatīti suddhakattuvasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n:2766_3: yo anicchantimicchasī”ti ettha bādhesīti bandhasīti suddhakattuvasena attho.
anya-e0804n:2766_4: Bhūvādigaṇe pana “bādha baddhāya”nti bādhadhātussa vasena “bādhatī”ti kattupadaṃ “bādheti,
anya-e0804n:2769_0: Māna pūjāyaṃ pemane vīmaṃsāyaṃ. Māneti, mānayati. Mātā. Vimāneti,
anya-e0804n:2770_0: Amānanā yattha santo, santānaṃ vā vimānanā;
anya-e0804n:2771_0: Hīnasammānanā vāpi, na tattha vasatiṃ vase.
anya-e0804n:2773_1: aṭṭhakathāsu pana “mānentī”ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ayamattho dassito “mānentīti manena piyāyanti.
anya-e0804n:2774_0: Mana thambhe. Thambho cittassa thaddhatā. Māneti, mānayati. Māno.
anya-e0804n:2775_0: Thana devasadde. Devasaddo meghasaddo, thaneti, thanayati.
anya-e0804n:2779_0: Ūna parihāniyaṃ. Ūneti, ūnayati. Ūno loko.
anya-e0804n:2780_0: Dhana sadde. Dhaneti, dhanayati, dhaniyyati. Dhani, dhanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2781_2: tañhi mama idanti dhanāyitabbaṃ saddāyitabbanti dhananti.
anya-e0804n:2786_0: Ñapa tosananisānesu. Ñāpeti, ñāpayati, paññāpeti, paññāpayati, paññatti.
anya-e0804n:2787_1: Tattha paññāpetīti katanibbacanehi vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2787_7: Kārite “puriso purisena āsanaṃ paññapāpetī”ti ekameva padaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2787_9: paññāpayatī”ti rūpāni yadā “ñā avabodhane”ti imissā rūpāni siyuṃ,
anya-e0804n:2788_0: Lapa viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Lapeti, lapayati. Lāpo, lapanaṃ, ālāpo, sallāpo, kathāsallāpo, lapitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2789_0: Byapa dāhe. Jhāpeti, jhāpayati. Jhatto, jhānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2790_0: Tattha jhattoti khuddāpareto pācanagginā jhāpitoti jhatto,
anya-e0804n:2791_0: Rūpa rūpakriyāyaṃ. Rūpakriyā nāma pakāsanakriyā. Rūpeti, rūpayati. Rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2792_2: Divādigaṇe panāyaṃ “rūpaṃ ruppane”ti bhijjanādiatthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0804n:2794_0: Kappa vitakke vidhimhi chedane ca. Kappeti,
anya-e0804n:2796_2: yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
anya-e0804n:2796_3: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
anya-e0804n:2797_0: Atha vā kappasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vitakkavidhānapaṭibhāgapaññattikālaparamāyuvohārasamantabhāvābhisaddahana
anya-e0804n:2797_1: chedana viniyoga vinaya kriyā lesantara kappataṇhādiṭṭhiasaṅkhyeyyakappamahākappādīsu dissati.
anya-e0804n:2797_5: “Satthukappena vata bho sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu paṭibhāge,
anya-e0804n:2797_9: “Ākaṅkhamāno ānanda tathāgato kappaṃ vātiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā”tiādīsu paramāyumhi.
anya-e0804n:2797_11: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”ntiādīsu samaṇavohāre.
anya-e0804n:2797_23: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.
anya-e0804n:2802_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ niddese “kappoti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo diṭṭhikappo”ti.
anya-e0804n:2803_0: Vitakke ca vidhāne ca, paṭibhāge tatheva ca;
anya-e0804n:2804_0: Paññattiyaṃ tathā kāle, paramāyumhi ca chedane.
anya-e0804n:2809_6: kampeti hadayaṃ mamā”ti akammakāya dhātuyā sakammakarūpadassanato.
anya-e0804n:2811_0: Thūpa samussaye. Samussayo āroho ubbedho. Thūpeti, thūpayati. Thūpo, thūpikā.
anya-e0804n:2816_0: Ḍapa ḍipa saṅghāte. Ḍāpeti. Ḍāpayati. Ḍepeti, ḍepayati.
anya-e0804n:2818_0: Gupa kupa dhūpa bhāsāyaṃ. Gopeti, gopayati. Kopeti, kopayati. Dhūpeti, dhūpayati.
anya-e0804n:2820_0: Khepa peraṇe. Peraṇaṃ cuṇṇikaraṇaṃ, khepeti, khepayati.
anya-e0804n:2823_0: Tapa dāhe. Tapeti, tapayati. Tapo, tāpo. Ātāpo, santāpo. Kārite – tāpeti, tāpayati.
anya-e0804n:2823_1: Tattha tapoti akusalānaṃ tāpanaṭṭhena tapo, sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2825_2: Ettha purime saralopo thassa ṭhattaṃ visadisabhāvena dvittañca.
anya-e0804n:2826_0: Māpa māpane. Paṇṇasālaṃ māpeti, māpayati. Yo pāṇamatimāpeti, paṇṇasālā sumāpitā.
anya-e0804n:2827_0: Yapa yāpane. Yāpanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Tena so tattha yāpeti. Yāpayati. Yāpanā.
anya-e0804n:2828_0: Tattha yāpetīti idaṃ yādhātussa payogatte sati kāritapadaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:2832_0: Samba sambandhe. Sambandho daḷhabandhanaṃ. Sambeti, sambayati. Sambalaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2833_0: Sabi maṇḍale. Maṇḍalaṃ parimaṇḍalatā. Rūpaṃ tādisameva.
anya-e0804n:2835_0: Lubi dubi addane. Addanaṃ hiṃsā. Lumbeti, lumbayati. Dumbeti, dumbayati.
anya-e0804n:2836_0: Pubba niketane. Niketanaṃ nivāso. Pubbeti, pubbayati.
anya-e0804n:2837_0: Gabba māne. Māno ahaṃkāro. Gabbeti, gabbayati. Gabbanaṃ, gabbito. Tattha gabbatīti na saṅkucati.
anya-e0804n:2841_0: Tattha bhāvetīti puriso gacchantaṃ purisamanugacchanto pāpuṇātīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2841_2: Ettha ca “bhāvetī”tiādīni yattha sace “bhū sattāya”nti dhātuyā rūpāni honti,
anya-e0804n:2841_9: bhū pattiya”nti dvigaṇikānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakathāṭīkānayanissitaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāma āgamikānaṃ kosallatthāya.
anya-e0804n:2841_10: Tattha cakkhubhūtoti yathā cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti,
anya-e0804n:2841_12: Atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtotipi cakkhubhūto.
anya-e0804n:2841_13: Paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhūñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti cakkhubhūto.
anya-e0804n:2841_15: asādhāraṇaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ bhūto pattoti ñāṇabhūto,
anya-e0804n:2841_17: pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto.
anya-e0804n:2841_18: Bodhipakkhiyadhammehi vā uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ bhūto pattoti dhammabhūto.
anya-e0804n:2841_20: Atha vā brahmaṃ vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā,
anya-e0804n:2841_22: Evaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena vutto attho veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:2842_1: “Tātā mayaṃ mahallakā suddhodanamahārājaputtaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā,
anya-e0804n:2842_2: tumhe tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti ca “atha kho therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ revataṃ sahajātiyaṃ sambhāviṃsū”ti cāti.
anya-e0804n:2843_0: Bhū avakampane. Ayampi sakammako. Bhāveti, bhāvayati. Manobhāvanīyā bhikkhū.
anya-e0804n:2844_0: Ettha ca bhāvetīti anukampati puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā yaṃkiñci.
anya-e0804n:2844_1: Manobhāvanīyāti “dīghāyukā hontu bhadantā arogā abyāpajjā”ti evamādinā bhāvetabbā anukampitabbāti manobhāvanīyā.
anya-e0804n:2847_0: Lābha pesane. Lābheti, lābhayati. “Labha lābheti dhātussa rūpāni ce, kāritarūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:2848_0: Dabhī bhaye. Īkārantāyaṃ dhātu, tena saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na bhavanti. Dabheti, dabhayati.
anya-e0804n:2850_0: Vambha viddhaṃsane. Vambheti, vambhayati. Vambhanā. Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ vambhenti.
anya-e0804n:2853_0: Ātena camu dhovane. Āpubbo camudhātu dhovane vattati. Ācameti, ācamayati. Ācamanakumbhī.
anya-e0804n:2854_0: Ettha pana “tato hi so ācamayitvā licchavī,
anya-e0804n:2854_1: therassa datvā yugāni aṭṭhā”ti appasakkārapetavatthupāḷippadeso nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2854_3: Ayaṃ pana dhātu bhūvādigaṇikatte “camatī”ti bhakkhanatthaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n:2855_0: Kamu icchākantīsu. Kāmeti, kāmayati. Kāmo, kanti, nikanti, kāmanā,
anya-e0804n:2856_0: Ettha ca kāmoti rūpādivisayaṃ kāmetīti kāmo.
anya-e0804n:2856_5: So hi accantakaṇhadhammasamaṅgitāya papañcasamatikkantepi buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvake attano vase ṭhapetuṃ kāmetīti “kāmo”ti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2861_0: Kāmo namuci kaṇho ca, vasavattī pajāpati;
anya-e0804n:2863_0: Kandappo ca ratipati, māro ca kusumāyudho;
anya-e0804n:2864_1: Tāni sāsanānulomāni na hontīti idha na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n:2865_0: Idāni abhikkantasaddassa bhūvādigaṇe “kamu padavikkhepe”ti vohārasīsena vuttassa kamudhātussa vasena
anya-e0804n:2865_1: idha ca “kamu icchākantīsū”ti vuttassa kamudhātussa vasena atthuddhāraṃ kathayāma.
anya-e0804n:2865_6: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”tiādīsu sundare.
anya-e0804n:2866_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2871_0: Thoma silāghāyaṃ. Silāghā pasaṃsā. Thometi, thomayati. Thomito, thomanā.
anya-e0804n:2873_0: Sama vitakke. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Samā. Nisāmeti,
anya-e0804n:2874_2: “Yo yajetha sataṃ sama”nti ettha hi samāsaddo itthiliṅgo,
anya-e0804n:2875_0: Imāni saṃvaccharassa nāmāni “saṃvaccharo, vaccharo, samā, hāyano, sarado,
anya-e0804n:2876_0: Sama ālocane. Ālocanaṃ pekkhanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati. Nisāmanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2877_4: Dhātūnamatthātisayena yogoti vacanato pana upasaggayogato vā savanepi ayaṃ vattati.
anya-e0804n:2878_0: Ama roge. Ameti, amayati. Andho. Bilaṅkapādo andhanakho.
anya-e0804n:2879_0: Tattha andhoti naṭṭhanayano vuccati. Andhanakhoti pūtinakho. Ubhayathāpi sarogattaṃ sūcitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2882_0: Sāma svāntane āmantane. Svāntanaṃ sāmappayogo. Āmantanaṃ avhāyanaṃ pakkosanaṃ. Sāmeti, sāmayati.
anya-e0804n:2884_3: idha pana upasagganipātapubbakāni katvā “āgametī”tiādīni suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2894_1: Ettha ca “iti kho ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī”ti pāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2898_0: Vara icchāyaṃ. Vareti, varayati. Varo, varaṃ, varanto.
anya-e0804n:2899_0: Tattha varoti variyate varitabboti varo. Varanti varetīti varaṃ, icchanto patthentoti attho.
anya-e0804n:2901_0: Muttaṃ muttaṃ sudassanaṃ, vande bodhivaraṃ vara”nti
anya-e0804n:2903_0: Sara akkhepe. Sareti, sarayati. Saro. Saroti saddo.
anya-e0804n:2904_0: Sāra dubbalye. Sāreti, sārayati. Dubbalo bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2905_0: Kumāra kīḷāyaṃ. Kumāreti, kumārayati. Kumāro, kumārako. Kumārī, kumārikā.
anya-e0804n:2906_0: Ettha kumārayati tattha tattha kīḷatīti kumāro. So eva atidaharattā kumārako. Esa nayo itaratrāpi.
anya-e0804n:2907_1: Vikkanti vikkamanaṃ. Sūreti, sūrayati. Vīreti, vīrayati. Sūro, vīro.
anya-e0804n:2907_2: Sāsanikehi pana saddhammavidūhi evaṃ dhātusabhāvānampi sūravīrasaddānaṃ nibbacanaṃ na dassitaṃ,
anya-e0804n:2907_3: kevalaṃ pana tattha tattha “sūroti visiṭṭhauro”ti ca “mahāvīroti mahāvikkanto”ti ca “vīroti vīriyavā”ti ca atthavivaraṇamattameva dassitaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2908_1: Kammasampatti nāma kammassa parisamāpanaṃ niṭṭhāpanaṃ. Pāreti, pārayati. Tīreti, tīrayati. Pāraṃ. Tīraṃ.
anya-e0804n:2909_0: Tattha na pāremīti chindituṃ na sakkomīti attho.
anya-e0804n:2911_0: Jara vayohānimhi. Jareti, jarayati. Jarā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “jīratī”ti pāṭho.
anya-e0804n:2913_0: Dhara dhāraṇe. Dhāreti, dhārayati. Ādhāro, ādhārako, dhammo iccādīni.
anya-e0804n:2914_0: Tattha dhammoti anekavidhesu dhammesu lokuttaro uppādito sacchikato ca catūsu apāyesu saṃsāre vā satte apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0804n:2914_4: Kakkhaḷattādinā phusanādinā santiādinā sakasakabhāvena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati sallakkhiyatītipi dhammo.
anya-e0804n:2914_5: Tepiṭako pana pāḷidhammo sakatthaparatthādibhee atthe dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0804n:2914_6: Keci tu vidū “pāpake akusale dhamme dhunāti kampeti viddhaṃsetīti dhammo”ti dhūdhātuvasenapi nibbacanaṃ vadanti,
anya-e0804n:2915_1: Ayañhi “dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:2916_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n:2917_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti
anya-e0804n:2919_2: Ayañhi “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”tiādīsu sabhāve dissati.
anya-e0804n:2921_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti
anya-e0804n:2923_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
anya-e0804n:2924_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n:2925_6: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇa”ntiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2926_0: Atha vā dhammasaddo pariyattisaccasamādhipaññāpakatipuññāpattiñeyyādīsu bahūsu atthesu diṭṭhappayogo.
anya-e0804n:2926_1: Tathā hi “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu pariyattiyaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:2926_10: tattha tattha pana ādisaddena yuttivisayādayo ca atthā gahetabbā.
anya-e0804n:2927_0: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ tvaṃ gaccheyya ekako;
anya-e0804n:2928_0: Ahampi tena gacchāmi, yena gacchasi khattiyā”ti
anya-e0804n:2929_1: “Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”ntiādīsu visaye.
anya-e0804n:2929_2: “Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upetī”ti ettha nibbāne vattati.
anya-e0804n:2932_0: Sabhāve ceva paññāyaṃ, puññe paññattiyampi ca.
anya-e0804n:2936_0: Keci pana dhammasaddassa pavattivisayānaṃ dasadhāva paricchedaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0804n:2937_0: Ñeyyamagge ca nibbāne, sabhāve atha jātiyaṃ;
anya-e0804n:2940_0: Tatra atthuddhāroti samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro.
anya-e0804n:2943_1: “Rakkhaṇaṃ, tāṇaṃ, gopanaṃ, avanaṃ, pālanaṃ, rakkhā, rakkhaṇā,
anya-e0804n:2943_2: gutti” iccete pariyāyā. Pāleti, pālayati. Pālako,
anya-e0804n:2943_5: Samo bhavatu pālinā. Pālito, pālanaṃ, pāḷi.
anya-e0804n:2944_2: Atha vā antodakaṃ rakkhaṇaṭṭhena mahato taḷākassa thirā mahatīti pāḷi viyāti pāḷi,
anya-e0804n:2944_4: Aparo nayo pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n:2948_0: Tila sinehane. Teleti, telayati. Telaṃ, tilo, tilaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2949_6: “tilasinehane”ti evaṃ vuttāya tiladhātuyā sāmaññato yassa kassaci sinehassa vacanato.
anya-e0804n:2949_10: tila”nti saddarūpānaṃ pakāsanamukhena “tilānaṃ idanti tela”nti vadāma,
anya-e0804n:2949_11: na pana tena vacanena sāsapādīnaṃ sinehassa atelattaṃ vadāma.
anya-e0804n:2949_13: Taddhitavidhāne viññunaṃ kosallatthaṃ tilasaddaṃ paṭicca “tilānaṃ idanti tela”nti vadāma.
anya-e0804n:2949_14: Sinehasaṅkhātassa sāsapādīnaṃ telassa vacanaṃ na jahāma,
anya-e0804n:2949_18: Idañhi vacanaṃ telassa sāmaññato sinehe pavattiṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0804n:2950_0: Jala apavāraṇe. Jāleti, jālayati. Jālaṃ, jālā. Jālanti macchajālaṃ. Jālāti aggijālā.
anya-e0804n:2951_0: Khala soceyye. Soceyyaṃ sucibhāvo. Khāleti, khālayati. Pakkhāleti, pakkhālayati.
anya-e0804n:2952_0: Tala patiṭṭhāyaṃ. Tāleti, tālayati. Tālo, talaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2953_2: Tañhi tālayati patiṭṭhāti ettha vatthujātanti talaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2955_0: Dula ukkhepe. Ukkhepo uddhaṃ khipanaṃ. Doleti, dolayati. Dolā.
anya-e0804n:2956_0: Ettha ca doliyati ukkhipiyati yattha nipanno dārako, yathānipannako vāti dolā.
anya-e0804n:2958_0: Mīla nimīlane. Mīleti, mīlayati. Mīlanaṃ, ummīlanaṃ, nimīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2960_0: Tattha mūlanti mūlayati rūhati rukkhādi etenāti mūlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2960_1: Atha vā mūlayati chinnopi koci etena acchinnena punadeva rūhatīti mūlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2966_0: Kala pila khepe. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo. Pileti, pilayati.
anya-e0804n:2967_1: Tatra samayo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āyuṃ kālayati khepeti divase divase appaṃ appaṃ karotīti kāloti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2970_0: Maccu pana kālayati tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ khepeti samucchedavasena nāsetīti kāloti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2970_4: “Maraṇaṃ hindaṃ maccu maṭṭu cuti kālo antako nikkhepo”ti maraṇassābhidhānāni.
anya-e0804n:2975_0: Dala vidāraṇe. Dāleti, dālayati, padāleti, padālayati. Kudālo.
anya-e0804n:2976_0: Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu. Kāleti, kālayati. Kālo, kalā.
anya-e0804n:2977_2: patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo. Sīleti, sīlayati. Sīlaṃ, sīlanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2978_0: Ettha sīlanti sīleti upadhāreti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ apāyesu uppattinivāraṇavasena bhuso dhāretīti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2978_1: Atha vāsīliyati upacāriyati sappurisehi hadayamaṃsantaraṃ upanetvā dhāriyatīti sīlaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2978_7: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi “kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvo upadhāraṇa”nti vutto.
anya-e0804n:2979_1: Keci “vela iti dhātusaddo na hotī”ti vadanti,
anya-e0804n:2980_4: Lokassa vimatiṃ pāleti lunāti sodheti cāti palaṃ. Mūleti, mūlayati.
anya-e0804n:2981_0: Thūla paribrūhane. Paribrūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ. Thūleti, thūlayati. Thūlo puriso. Thūlā javena hāyanti.
anya-e0804n:2986_0: Divu parikūjane. Parikūjanaṃ gajjanaṃ. Deveti, devayati. Devo ca paridevitvā. Devoti megho.
anya-e0804n:2987_0: Divu addane. Addanaṃ gandhapisananti vadanti. Deveti, devayati.
anya-e0804n:2991_1: Imāni rūpāni kiñcāpi bhūvādigaṇikaṃ “posetī”ti rūpaṃ paṭicca hetukatturūpāni viya dissanti,
anya-e0804n:2991_2: tathāpi “aññepi devo posetī”tiādikassa curādigaṇikarūpassa dassanato suddhakattuvasena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:2999_1: So hi puriso viya sātisayaṃ paccāmitte na puṃseti abhimaddanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti napuṃsakoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:2999_4: Tathā hi saddasatthavidū taṃ puggalaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgavasena napuṃsakanti vadanti.
anya-e0804n:3001_0: Rusa rosane. Rosanaṃ kopakaraṇaṃ. Roseti, rosayati. Roso. Rosoti kodho.
anya-e0804n:3004_3: Daṃsanti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā etenāti daṃsano.
anya-e0804n:3006_0: Tassa santajjane. Tasseti, tassayati puriso core.
anya-e0804n:3007_0: Vassu sattibandhane. Sattibandhanaṃ samatthatākaraṇaṃ. Vasseti, vassayati.
anya-e0804n:3008_0: Jasa tāḷane. Tāḷanaṃ paharaṇaṃ. Jāseti, jāsayati.
anya-e0804n:3009_0: Pasa bandhane. Pāseti, pāsayati. Pāso. Pāsanti bandhanti satte etenāti pāso, sakuṇapāsādi.
anya-e0804n:3010_0: Ghusi visaddane. Visaddanaṃ ugghosanaṃ. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n:3011_1: Silyayogo lāsiyaṃ nāṭakanāṭanaṃ recakadānaṃ. Lāseti, lāsayati. Lāsento, lāsentī.
anya-e0804n:3011_5: Tattha lāsentīti yā uplavamānā viya uṭṭhahitvā lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭenti,
