anya-e0804n:3012_0: Bhūsa alaṅkāre. Bhūseti, bhūsayati. Vibhūseti, vibhūsayati. Bhūsanaṃ, vibhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3013_0: Vasa sinehanachedāvaharaṇesu. Avaharaṇaṃ corikāya gahaṇaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vasā.
anya-e0804n:3014_0: Tāsa vāraṇe. Vāraṇaṃ nivāraṇaṃ. Tāseti, tāsayati.
anya-e0804n:3017_0: Pusa dhāraṇe. Poseti, posayati, ābharaṇaṃ dhāretīti attho.
anya-e0804n:3018_0: Tusi pisi kusi dasi bhāsāyaṃ. Tuṃseti,
anya-e0804n:3020_0: Gavesa maggane. Gaveseti, gavesayati. Gavesako, gavesito, gavesanā, gaveṭṭhi.
anya-e0804n:3021_0: Vāsa upasevāyaṃ. Vāseti, vāsayati. Vāso, āvāso.
anya-e0804n:3023_0: Nivāsa acchādane. Vatthaṃ nivāseti, nivāsayati. Pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā.
anya-e0804n:3024_0: Aṃsa saṅghāte. Aṃseti, aṃsayati. Aṃso, aṃsā.
anya-e0804n:3025_0: Ettha ca aṃsoti koṭṭhāsopi khandhopi vuccati. Aṃsāti arisarogo.
anya-e0804n:3027_0: Rasa assādane. Raseti, rasayati. Raso. Rasiyate assādiyate janehīti raso.
anya-e0804n:3029_3: yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇā bhagavantaṃ “arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo”ti avocuṃ.
anya-e0804n:3035_0: Pisa pesane. Peseti, pesayati. Pesako, pesito.
anya-e0804n:3036_0: Ghusa sadde. Ghoseti, ghosayati. Ugghosayuṃ bodhimaṇḍe pamoditā. Ghoso.
anya-e0804n:3037_0: Disī uccāraṇe. Deseti, desayati. Desako, desetā, desito, desanā.
anya-e0804n:3038_0: Vasa acchādane. Vāseti, vāsayati. Nivāseti, nivāsayati. Vatthaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3041_0: Araha pūjāyaṃ. Araheti, arahayati. Arahā, arahaṃ. “Arahā, khīṇāsavo, asekkho”ti arahato nāmāni.
anya-e0804n:3044_1: “Eṇeyyā ca varāhā cā”ti ettha hi sūkaro “varāho”ti vutto,
anya-e0804n:3047_0: Maha pūjāyaṃ. Maheti, mahayati. Mahito rājā mahārājā. Vihāramaho, cetiyamaho.
anya-e0804n:3048_0: Piha icchāyaṃ. Piheti, pihayati. Pihā, pihālu, apiho, pihanīyā vibhūtiyo.
anya-e0804n:3049_0: Kuha vimhāpane. Kuheti, kuhayati. Kuhako. Kuhayati lokavimhāpanaṃ karotīti kuhako. Kuhanā.
anya-e0804n:3051_0: Garaha vinindane. Garaheti, garahayati. Garahā. Bhūvādigaṇikassa panassa “garahatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3054_0: Taḷa tāḷane. Tāḷeti, tāḷayati. Patāḷeti, patāḷayati. Tāḷaṃ. Tāḷanti kaṃsatāḷādi.
anya-e0804n:3060_3: Bhūvādigaṇaṭṭhāya pana vilāsanatthe vattamānāya etissā “laḷatī”ti rūpaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3061_0: Siḷa seḷane. Seḷeti, seḷayati. Seḷento. Ettha seḷetīti seḷitasaddaṃ karoti.
anya-e0804n:3063_0: Curādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0804n:3069_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0804n:3077_8: imasmiṃ bhagavato pāvacane aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā bhavanti.
anya-e0804n:3080_0: Yapaccayo divādimhā, ṇu ṇā uṇā suvādito;
anya-e0804n:3081_0: Kyādito pana nāyeva, ppaṇhā pana gahādito.
anya-e0804n:3082_0: Oyirā tu tanādimhā, ṇe ṇayā ca curādito;
anya-e0804n:3084_0: Hiyyattanī sattamī ca, vattamānā ca pañcamī;
anya-e0804n:3087_0: Aññatra kha cha sādīhi, sahāpi cupalabbhati.
anya-e0804n:3089_0: Ḍeti yāti iti eti, avati koti saṅkati.
anya-e0804n:3090_0: Bhikkhati pivati pāti, vadeti vadati” iti;
anya-e0804n:3096_0: “Suṇoti ca suṇāti ca, vuṇoti ca vuṇāti ca;
anya-e0804n:3098_0: “Kināti ca jināti ca, dhunāti ca munāti ca;
anya-e0804n:3101_0: Kaṇhaṃ taṇhā ca tiṇhuṇha”-miccādi ca gahādinaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3102_0: “Tanoti ca karoti ca, kayirati sanoti ca;
anya-e0804n:3111_0: Ṭhāsādayo akammā ca, upasaggaṃ vinā vade;
anya-e0804n:3115_0: Akammakehi saddhiṃ te, tividhāpi bhavanti hi.
anya-e0804n:3119_0: Niyamo natthi so tasmā, na mayā ettha vuccati.
anya-e0804n:3121_0: Tiṭṭhānā svādayo evaṃ, ṭhānatopi tidhā matā.
anya-e0804n:3123_0: Vaca turādayo na hi, vuddhikā kāritaṃ vinā;
anya-e0804n:3124_0: Khi ji iccādayo dhātū, savuddhāvuddhikā matā;
anya-e0804n:3129_0: Pā bhādayo jiniccādī, kamato itare siyuṃ.
anya-e0804n:3134_0: Puna suddhassarā dhātū, ekassarā ca sattadhā;
anya-e0804n:3140_3: Yā rā lā iccādayo ekassarā ākārantā.
anya-e0804n:3140_6: Khu du ku iccādayo ekassarā ukārantā,
anya-e0804n:3140_8: Khe je se iccādayo ekassarā ekārantā.
anya-e0804n:3141_0: Kara paca saṅgāma iccādayo anekassarā akārantā,
anya-e0804n:3141_6: Gile mile iccādayo anekassarā ekārantāti evaṃ pannarasavidhena dhātusaṅgaho.
anya-e0804n:3143_0: Dhātū suddhassarā ceva, puna cekassarāpi ca;
anya-e0804n:3144_0: Kakārantā khakārantā, gantā ghantā ca dhātavo.
anya-e0804n:3145_0: Cakārantā chakārantā, jantā jhantā ca ñantakā;
anya-e0804n:3146_0: Ṭakārantā ṭhakārantā, ḍantā ḍhantā ca ṇantakā.
anya-e0804n:3147_0: Tantā ceva tathā thantā, dantā dhantā ca nantakā;
anya-e0804n:3148_0: Pantā phantā bakārantā, bhantā mantā ca yantakā.
anya-e0804n:3149_0: Rantā lantā vakārantā, santā hantā ca ḷantakā;
anya-e0804n:3151_0: Mate satthussa ḍhaṇaḷā, padādimhi na dissare;
anya-e0804n:3159_0: Sahanato hananato, sīhoti hi garū vaduṃ.
anya-e0804n:3160_1: “kiṃ me bahūhi ghāṭitehī”ti attano gocaratthāya khuddake pāṇe agaṇhanto,
anya-e0804n:3160_2: “māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesī”ti anuddayavasena sahitabbe khuddakasattepi sahati.
anya-e0804n:3160_3: Hiṃsitabbe pana kāyūpapanne sūkaramahiṃsādayo satte hiṃsati,
anya-e0804n:3160_5: Yathā pana kantanaṭṭhena ādiantavipallāsato takkaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0804n:3160_7: Atha vā sabbiriyāpathesu daḷhavīriyattā suṭṭhu īhatīti sīho.
anya-e0804n:3164_0: Sahanā ca hiṃsanā ca, tathā sīghajavattato;
anya-e0804n:3166_0: Vuttañhi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saharā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho”ti.
anya-e0804n:3167_2: “Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3167_3: “Sīhoti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu tathāgate.
anya-e0804n:3173_4: Bhagavatā panetaṃ vuttaṃ “kiñca bhikkhave rūpaṃ vadetha,
anya-e0804n:3173_5: ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:3176_0: Ettha hi samuddoti aṭṭhahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgatattā samuddati attasannissitānaṃ macchamakarādīnaṃ
anya-e0804n:3176_5: Milindapañhe pana āyasmā nāgaseno “bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:3176_6: kena kāraṇena āpaṃ udakaṃ samuddoti vuccatī”ti milindena raññā puṭṭho āha “yattakaṃ mahārāja udakaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3176_11: Tadā raññā milindena “kallosi bhante nāgasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3176_12: Ettha hi samaṃ udakena loṇaṃ etthāti samuddoti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ “nīloda”ntiādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:3176_13: Tattha bhadantanāgasenamatañca amhākaṃ matañca pakatisamuddaṃ sandhāya vuttattā na virujjhati,
anya-e0804n:3176_14: aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ matampi “taṇhāsamuddo”ti ca “samuddopeso”ti ca āgatāni samuddasarikkhakāni ca taṇhācakkhusotādīni
anya-e0804n:3178_0: Khanito vāpi dhātumhā, dhāto khaṃpubbatopi vā;
anya-e0804n:3180_0: Tattha “saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhāpi dukkhā”ti vacanato sayampi dukkhadhammoyeva samāno jātijarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādīhi
anya-e0804n:3180_4: attena vā attaniyena vā tucchattā khaṃ suññākāraṃ dhāretītipi khandho,
anya-e0804n:3182_0: Koṭṭhāse ceva aṃse ca, vattatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0804n:3183_1: khandhasaddo sambahulesu ṭhānesu nipatati rāsimhi guṇe paṇṇattiyaṃ rūḷhiyanti.
anya-e0804n:3183_2: “Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mahāsamudde na sukaraṃ udakassa pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ “ettakāni udakāḷhakānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni
anya-e0804n:3183_3: udakāḷhakasatānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānī’ti vā,
anya-e0804n:3183_4: atha kho asaṅkhyeyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu hi rāsito khandho nāma.
anya-e0804n:3183_5: Na hi parittakaṃ udakaṃ udakakkhandhoti vuccati,
anya-e0804n:3183_16: “Addasā khā bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”nti ettha paṇṇattito khandho nāma.
anya-e0804n:3183_20: Ayañhi khandhaṭṭho nāma piṇḍaṭṭho pūgaṭṭho ghaṭaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho,
anya-e0804n:3183_23: Lokasmiñhi iṇaṃ gahetvā codiyamānā “dvīhi khandhehi dassāma,
anya-e0804n:3183_27: vedanākkhandhoti vedanārāsi vedanākoṭṭhāso”ti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
anya-e0804n:3186_4: Cakkhu rūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamantīti vā vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0804n:3186_5: Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tananti vitthārentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0804n:3186_6: Idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ atīva āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati,
anya-e0804n:3187_0: Apica nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3187_1: Tathā hi “loke issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:3187_6: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3188_0: Cakkhuādīsu cāpi cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3188_1: Cakkhādīsu te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ ākaro.
anya-e0804n:3188_2: Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ tattha tattha dvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato.
anya-e0804n:3188_3: Cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ sañjātideso tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito,
anya-e0804n:3188_4: cakkhādayo ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesaṃ abhāve abhāvato.
anya-e0804n:3188_5: Iti nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā āyatananti vuccanti,
anya-e0804n:3188_6: tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
anya-e0804n:3188_7: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṃ tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayoti. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0804n:3189_0: Nivāso ākaro ceva, jātideso ca kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0804n:3194_0: Ettha pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma,
anya-e0804n:3194_10: Dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā,
anya-e0804n:3195_0: Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “apica cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthārammaṇapaṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannā naṃ dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3196_2: idamārammaṇa’nti avijjāya ñātuṃ na sakkāti avijjā tappaṭicchādikā vuttā,
anya-e0804n:3196_4: jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannabhāvassa ca chādanato paṭiccasamuppādapaṭiccasamuppannachādanaṃ veditabbanti.
anya-e0804n:3196_5: Tattha duggatigāmikammassa visesappaccayattā avijjā ‘avindiyaṃ vindatī’ti vuttā,
anya-e0804n:3196_6: tathā visesapaccayo vindanīyassa na hotīti ‘vindiyaṃ na vindatī’ti ca,
anya-e0804n:3196_10: vasena tīsupi padesu akāravikārajakāre gahetvā aññesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ lopaṃ katvā jakārassa ca dutiyassa āgamaṃ
anya-e0804n:3201_0: Tathā hi arahanti aggadakkhiṇeyyattā cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañcāti arahaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0804n:3206_0: Tathā so kilesārayo maggena hanīti arahaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0804n:3209_0: Yañcetaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhiṃ puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemiṃ āsavasamudayamayena akkhena
anya-e0804n:3209_2: tassa so bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaparasuṃ gahetvā sabbe are hanītipi arahaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3212_0: Tathā attahitaṃ parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā parihātabbāti rahā,
anya-e0804n:3212_3: “Araho”ti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ akārādesaṃ katvā “arahaṃ”nti vuttaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n:3214_0: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato”ti.
anya-e0804n:3215_0: Atha vā khīṇāsavehi sekkhehi kalyāṇaputhujjanehi ca na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo,
anya-e0804n:3215_1: te ca bhagavāti arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n:3220_0: Rahoti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, natthi etassa raho gamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātīti arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n:3221_0: “Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
anya-e0804n:3223_2: Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
anya-e0804n:3223_3: Iti pāsaṃsattāpi bhagavā arahaṃ. Āha ca –
anya-e0804n:3226_3: rahi gatiya”nti imesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena idha vuttāni kilesehi ārakattā “araha”nti ca pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā
anya-e0804n:3226_4: “araha”nti ca asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti “araha”nti ca sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti “araha”nti ca.
anya-e0804n:3226_5: Nibbacanāni pana dhātusaddanissitāni na hontīti idha na gahitāni.
anya-e0804n:3226_6: Pasaṃsā pana atthato pūjā evāti “araha pūjāya”nti dhātussa attho bhavituṃ yuttoti idha amhehi gahitā,
anya-e0804n:3226_7: aṭṭhakathācariyehi tu arahasaddassa labbhamānavasena sabbepi atthā gahitā dhātunissitā ca adhātunissitā ca. Kathaṃ? –
anya-e0804n:3227_0: Ārakattā hatattā ca, kilesārīna so muni;
anya-e0804n:3229_0: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatīti.
anya-e0804n:3233_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jinoti.
anya-e0804n:3234_0: Yathā pana arahaṃsaddassa, evaṃ arahāsaddassāpi nibbacanāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0804n:3237_0: Ettha hi sugatoti sobhanaṃ gataṃ etassāti sugato,
anya-e0804n:3237_3: sammā ca gadatīti sugatoti dhātunissitaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā saddanipphatti kātabbā.
anya-e0804n:3238_8: tenesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato”tiādi.
anya-e0804n:3241_1: bhagasaṅkhātā lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo vani bhaji sevīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:3241_2: Somanassakumārattabhāvādīsu carimattabhāve ca bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:3241_3: Atha vā nakkhattehi samaṃ pavattattā bhagasaṅkhāte sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanaloke vami,
anya-e0804n:3243_0: Muto tathā majato ca, mayato munato mito.
anya-e0804n:3244_0: Puna mitoti etehi, dhātūhi khalu sattahi;
anya-e0804n:3249_0: Mayato vā munato vā, mito vā punapi mito.
anya-e0804n:3253_5: Atha vā parati pāleti pūreti cāti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_6: dānādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ pālako pūrako ca bodhisatto,
anya-e0804n:3253_11: Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogenāti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_12: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati kilesamalatoti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_13: paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ mayati gacchatīti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_14: paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya munāti paricchindatīti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_15: paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipatīti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3253_16: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ mināti hiṃsatīti paramo,
anya-e0804n:3254_6: Pāre nibbāne satte mavati bandhati yojeīti pāramī,
anya-e0804n:3254_10: tattha vā satte minoti pakkhipatīti pāramī,
anya-e0804n:3254_11: kilesāriṃ vā sattānaṃ pāre nibbāne mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī,
anya-e0804n:3258_0: Tattha karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā.
anya-e0804n:3258_3: taṃ rundhati vibādhati kāruṇikaṃ na sukhāpetītipi karuṇā.
anya-e0804n:3261_0: Tattha vijjāti vindiyaṃ kāyasucaritādiṃ vindati yāthāvato upalabhatīti vijjā.
anya-e0804n:3261_1: Tamokhandhādipadālanaṭṭhena vā attano paṭipakkhaṃ vijjhatīti vijjā.
anya-e0804n:3261_2: Tato eva attano visayaṃ viditaṃ karotītipi vijjā.
anya-e0804n:3264_0: Tattha medhāti sammohaṃ medhati hiṃsatīti medhā.
anya-e0804n:3264_1: Pāpake vā akusale dhamme medhati hiṃsatītipi medhā. Atha vā –
anya-e0804n:3269_0: Vacanato pana medhati sīlena siriyā satañca dhammehi saha gacchati,
anya-e0804n:3269_3: sukhumampi atthaṃ dhammañca khippameva meti ca dhāreti cāti medhā,
anya-e0804n:3269_5: Tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ vuttaṃ “asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā,
anya-e0804n:3272_1: rā saddo tiyyati chijjati etthāti ratti,
anya-e0804n:3273_0: Mā māne iti soanta, kammanīti cubhohi tu;
anya-e0804n:3275_0: Tathā hi sattānaṃ āyuṃ mānanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso,
anya-e0804n:3275_3: Citto visākho jeṭṭho āsāḷho sāvaṇo bhaddo assayujo kattiko māgasiro phusso māgho phagguṇoti.
anya-e0804n:3276_0: Atha vā māsoti aparaṇṇavisesassapi suvaṇṇamāsassapi nāmaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3276_1: Tattha aparaṇṇaviseso yathāparimite kāle asiyati bhakkhiyatīti māso,
anya-e0804n:3276_2: itaro pana “mama ida”nti masiyati āmasiyati gaṇhiyatīti māsoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n:3279_0: Tathā hi taṃ taṃ sattaṃ dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya carati pavattatīti saṃvaccharo.
anya-e0804n:3285_0: Sappurise ca nibbāne, esa saddo pavattati.
anya-e0804n:3286_4: Apica sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti etthāti sabbhi, nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3286_6: Tathā hi saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā nibbānaṃ āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti,
anya-e0804n:3289_0: Klesā bhijjanti taṃ tasmā, sabbhīti amataṃ’bravu”nti.
anya-e0804n:3292_0: Tathā hi bravantā ettha sīdantīti bhisīti bhisisaddassa sambhavaṃ porāṇā kathayiṃsu.
anya-e0804n:3298_5: Atha vā dvidhā sukhaṃ khanatītipi dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3301_4: vā pupphaphalādiṃ “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karonto viya ahosīti attho.
anya-e0804n:3301_5: Atha vā gandhayati chindati manāpagandho sugandhabhāvena duggandhaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3303_0: Avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano”ti
anya-e0804n:3304_2: Kaccāyanasmiñhi “khādāmagamānaṃ khandhandhagandhā”ti khādaamagamiiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathākkamaṃ khandha andhagandhādesā vuttā.
anya-e0804n:3304_3: Atha vā gacchanto dhariyate soti gandho.
anya-e0804n:3304_4: Vuttañhetaṃ bhadantena buddhadattācariyena veyyākaraṇena niruttinayadassinā “dhariyatīti gacchanto,
anya-e0804n:3307_0: Rasoti hi rasanti taṃ assādentīti raso,
anya-e0804n:3307_4: devamanussādayo sattā yasmā ramamānā naṃ dhammajātaṃ asanti bhakkhanti,
anya-e0804n:3307_5: tasmā taṃ dhammajātaṃ raso nāmāti niruttaññūhi paridīpitoti.
anya-e0804n:3308_0: Naṃ asanti na santīti, padacchedo siyā tahiṃ;
anya-e0804n:3312_0: Dhātucintāya ye muttā, anipphannāti te matā;
anya-e0804n:3316_0: Tathā hi “gacchatīti go”, iti vuttapadaṃ puna;
anya-e0804n:3320_2: lohitaṃ” iccevamādīni nāmikapadāni anipphannāni bhavanti. “Nīlaṃ, pītaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3320_4: Ke re ge saddeti dhātuvasena āgatattā nīlatīti nīlaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3320_6: ye vā pana itivacanena bhagavatā kiyate kathiyateti yevāpanakoti nibbacanamarahantīti nipphannānīti vattabbāni.
anya-e0804n:3320_7: Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu nīlati pītatītiādīni kriyāpadāni tepiṭake buddhavacane na dissantī”ti?
anya-e0804n:3320_9: tathāpi etarahi avijjamānā purāṇabhāsā esāti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:3320_10: Yathā hi “nāthatīti nātho”ti ettha kiñcāpi “nāthatī”ti kriyāpadaṃ buddhavacane na dissati,
anya-e0804n:3320_11: tathāpi nātha yācanopatāpissariyāsīsanesūti dhātuno diṭṭhattā aṭṭhakathācariyā gaṇhiṃsuyeva,
anya-e0804n:3321_2: tatrāpi rasatibbayo”ti jātakapāḷiyaṃ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devamanussānaṃ vohārapathe asañcarantaṃ purāṇabhāsābhūtaṃ “byātī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati,
anya-e0804n:3321_7: yasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto cūḷabodhi nāma paribbājako ahosi.
anya-e0804n:3321_8: Yathā pana viḍūḍabhasaddādayo dhātuvasena anipphannā nāma vuccanti,
anya-e0804n:3321_25: visuddhayati” iccevamādayo ca dhātuvasena anipphannāyeva nāma vuccanti.
anya-e0804n:3323_6: pabbatāyāmā”ti iminā nayena aṭṭhannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena sesaṃ sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3323_10: puttiyantaṃ payojayati puttīyati” iccādi padasiddhi bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3325_0: Tatra sabbadhātukanissite suddhakattuppayoge suddhassaradhātuto vā ekassarato vā anekassarato vā apaccayassa
anya-e0804n:3325_2: visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ikārantānekassaradhātuto saha apaccayena niccaṃ niggahītāgamanañca
anya-e0804n:3325_4: Ākyātatte kattari dhātūhi apaccayena saddhiṃniyatavasena niggahītāgamanaṃ rudhādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0804n:3325_5: visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte kattari dhātūhi ivaṇṇekārokārapaccayehi saddhiṃ niyatavasena niggahītāgamanañca
anya-e0804n:3325_7: Kattari dhātūhi ādesalābhālābhino yapaccayassa parabhāvo divādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3325_8: Kattari dhātūhi yathārahaṃ ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayānaṃ parabhāvo svādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3325_10: Kattari dhātūhi ākhyātatte appakatarappayogavasena nāmikatte pacurappayogavasena ppaṇhāpaccayānaṃ parabhāvo gahādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3325_11: Kattari dhātūhi yathāsambhavaṃ oyirappaccayānaṃ parabhāvo tanādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3325_12: Ākhyātatte kattari dhātūhi sabbathā ṇeṇayappaccayānaṃ parabhāvo curādigaṇalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇavasena,
anya-e0804n:3325_13: visesalakkhaṇavasena pana ākhyātatte ikārantadhātuto saha ṇe ṇayapaccayehi niccaṃ niggahītāgamanañca
anya-e0804n:3326_0: Kāritapaccayassa yoge “ṇe ṇayo ṇāpe ṇāpayo cā”ti ime cattāro kāritapaccayā.
anya-e0804n:3331_0: Tatra sāveti, sāvayati. Bhāveti, bhāvayati, obhāseti, obhāsayati. Imāni kārite uvaṇṇantadhāturūpāni.
anya-e0804n:3332_0: Dāpeti, dāpayati. Hāpeti, hāpayati. Nhāpeti, nhāpayati. Nahāpeti, nahāpayati. Ākārantadhāturūpāni.
anya-e0804n:3333_0: Soseti, sosayati. Sosāpeti, sosāpayati. Ghosāpeti, ghosāpayati. Akārantadhāturupāni.
anya-e0804n:3334_2: Imāni hi nipubbāya idhātuyā vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni.
anya-e0804n:3334_3: Tathā hi suddhakattubhāvena maggo sayaṃ ñāyati,
anya-e0804n:3335_3: Imāni hi papubbāya udhātuyā vasena sambhūtāni hetukatturūpāni.
anya-e0804n:3335_4: Tathā hi “yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā”ti suddhakattupadaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ dissati.
anya-e0804n:3339_3: Iminā nayena sesāni avuttānipi rūpāni sakkā viññātuṃ viññunā pāḷinayaññunāti vitthāro na dassito.
anya-e0804n:3341_0: Akammakā ekakammā, dvikammā vāpi honti hi;
anya-e0804n:3343_0: Sayaṃ sodheti so bhūmiṃ, sodhāpeti paremahiṃ;
anya-e0804n:3344_0: Naraṃ kammaṃ kārayati, viññeyyaṃ kamato idaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3350_0: Idāni ūhanīyarūpagaṇaṃ brūma – hoti, bhoti, sambhoti,
anya-e0804n:3350_6: idaṃ rudhādirūpaṃ. Deti, neti, vadeti, anveti,
anya-e0804n:3350_11: idaṃ curādirūpaṃ. Jayati, sayati, palāyati, milāyati, gāyati,
anya-e0804n:3350_38: sabbaṃ vā etaṃ padaṃ anāgatādhivacanantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭateva.
anya-e0804n:3350_39: Iminā nayena aññānipi ūhanīyapadāni nānappakārato yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:3350_40: Imāni padāni dubbiññeyyavisesāni mandabuddhīnaṃ sammohakarāni ācariyapācariye payirupāsitvā vedanīyānīti ūhanīyarūpagaṇo vibhāvito.
anya-e0804n:3351_10: Tathā hi kamme “nidhi nāma nidhīyatī”ti ca “dhīyati dhapiyatīti dheyya”nti ca rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n:3351_17: to satta tvaṃ dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyasī”ti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3352_1: Tattha dhātūti salakkhaṇaṃ dadhāti dhāretīti dhātu.
anya-e0804n:3352_2: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhavidhānato dukkhadhānato ca dhātū”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3352_4: Tattha salakkhaṇadhāraṇatoti yathā titthiyaparikappito pakati attāti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi,
anya-e0804n:3352_6: etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
anya-e0804n:3352_8: Etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā yathā ayalohādidhātuyo ayalohādianekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti.
anya-e0804n:3352_10: taṃ vā dukkhaṃ etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi anuvidhīyati,
anya-e0804n:3352_14: Tathā hi bhagavā “cha dhātuyosaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhanatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0804n:3352_15: Yo pana tattha amhehi bhāvaṭṭhāne “satto dukkhaṃ anuvidhiyyatī”ti tipurisamaṇḍito ekavacanabahuvacaniko paṭhamāvibhattippayogo vutto. So –
anya-e0804n:3355_1: vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyyatī”ti ca “te saṃkilesikā dhammā pahīyissantī”ti ca imāsaṃ pāḷīnaṃ vasena sārato paccetabbo.
anya-e0804n:3355_2: Tattha paṇḍavo nāma asso giridattanāmakassa assagopakassa pakatiṃ anuvidhiyyati anukarotīti attho.
anya-e0804n:3355_3: Ettha ca yadi kattupadaṃ icchitaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n:3355_8: Na kenaci ettha vattuṃ sakkā “divādigaṇe kattari vihitayapaccayassa vasena vuttaṃ idaṃ rūpa”nti,
anya-e0804n:3355_11: Dutiyappayoge pana yadi kattupadaṃ icchitaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n:3355_18: “Dhanu yācane”ti dhātu esā ekantena tanādigaṇeyeva vattati.
anya-e0804n:3355_19: Tatiyappayoge “pahīyissantī”ti yadi bhūvādigaṇe “hā cāge”ti dhātuyā rūpaṃ siyā,
anya-e0804n:3355_23: Yasmā “pahīyissantī”ti idaṃ divādigaṇe “hā parihāniya”nti dhātuyā rūpattā “pahāyissantī”ti kattupadarūpaṃ siyā “ājañño kurute vegaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3355_24: hāyanti tattha vaḷavā”ti akammakassa kattupadarūpassa dassanato,
anya-e0804n:3355_25: tasmā “pahāyissantī”ti avatvā “pahīyissantī”ti vacanena yapaccayo bhāve vattatīti ñāyati.
anya-e0804n:3356_3: Aggijāhi pubbeva bhūyate’tiādīsu yapaccayo kammeyeva vihito, na bhāve.
anya-e0804n:3356_6: sayameva kaṭo kariyateti payogā viyā”ti. Taṃ na,
anya-e0804n:3356_7: evañhi sati “pajahiyissantī”tiādīni sakammakadhāturūpāni vattabbāni “pīyate kariyate”ti rūpāni viya.
anya-e0804n:3356_8: Ettha pana bhāvaṭṭhāne kattuno ṭhitabhāvo heṭṭhā nānappakārena dassitoti na vutto.
anya-e0804n:3356_9: Ye saddasatthe mataṃ gahetvā sāsanikā garū bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva,
anya-e0804n:3356_10: tañca paṭhamapurisasseva “bhūyate devadattena devadattena sampattiṃ anubhavananti attho”ti payogañca tadatthayojanañca vadanti.
anya-e0804n:3357_7: Tattha yena ca jariyyatīti yena tejogatena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo ekāhikādijararogena jariyyati jarati.
anya-e0804n:3357_8: Atha vā yena ca jariyati yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati indriyavekalyataṃ balakkhayaṃ palitavalitādiñca pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0804n:3358_3: Kiñcāpi ayaṃ dhātu “mara pāṇacāge”ti vacanato sakammako viya dissati,
anya-e0804n:3358_5: Kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jiyyati ca miyyati cā”ti evamādīnaṃ kammarahitappayogānaṃ dassanato akammakoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3358_6: Atthayojanānayena pana maratīti pāṇaṃ cajatīti kammaṃ ānetvā kathetuṃ labbhati. “Marati,
anya-e0804n:3358_10: Ettha ca yo amataṃ sattaṃ maraṇaṃ pāpeti,
anya-e0804n:3358_11: so vadhako māreti mārayati mārāpeti mārāpayatīti ca vuccati.
anya-e0804n:3358_12: Satto sattehi māriyati mārāpiyatīti imāni kammapadāni.
anya-e0804n:3358_14: Evamaññatrāpi pasiddhatā ca appasiddhatā ca upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0804n:3359_1: Ayaṃ pana bhūvādigaṇikavasena ekagaṇiko sakammako dhātu. Khādati,
anya-e0804n:3359_4: Puriso purisena purisaṃ vā pūvaṃ khādeti khādayati khādāpeti khādāpayati,
anya-e0804n:3359_6: Ettha ca yo akhādantaṃ khādantaṃ vā khādāhīti payojeti,
anya-e0804n:3359_7: so khādāpako khādeti khādayati khādāpeti khādāpayatīti ca vuccati. Khajjati,
anya-e0804n:3359_11: Atrapanāyaṃ pāḷi “atītaṃ pāhaṃ addhānaṃ rūpena khajjiṃ,
anya-e0804n:3359_13: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3359_16: Bhāvapadaṃ na labbhati sakammakattā imassa dhātussa.
anya-e0804n:3361_7: Ettha ca yo asuddhaṃ ṭhānaṃ suddhaṃ karoti,
anya-e0804n:3361_11: Yo pana asuddhaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ asodhetvā “tvaṃ sodhehī”ti aññaṃ payojeti,
anya-e0804n:3361_16: evaṃ labbhamānanayo ca alabbhamānanayo ca sabbattha upaparikkhitabbo.
anya-e0804n:3363_0: Tassa āgamanaṃ maggaṃ, sodhenti tuṭṭhamānasā”ti ca
anya-e0804n:3364_1: Imā hi pāḷiyo sahatthā sodhanaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0804n:3364_2: “Āyasmā pilindavaccho rājagahe pabbhāraṃ sodhāpeti leṇaṃ kattukāmo”ti pana pāḷi,
anya-e0804n:3364_4: “pabbhāraṃ mahārāja sodhāpemi leṇaṃ kattakāmo”ti ca pāḷi.
anya-e0804n:3365_3: Yo no gāvova sumbhati sumbhoti iccapi dissati.
anya-e0804n:3368_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duveti ca –
anya-e0804n:3369_1: vipākāni na paccatī”ti ca evaṃ pacatipadassa dvigaṇikarūpassa sakammakattaṃ icchanti.
anya-e0804n:3369_2: Evaṃ pana sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā.
anya-e0804n:3369_5: Nirayamhi apacci so”ti evaṃ akammakattaṃyeva dissati.
anya-e0804n:3369_6: Ettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu paca pāke’ti ayaṃ dhātu sakammako,
anya-e0804n:3369_7: tena ‘paccatī’ti padassa divādigaṇikarūpassapi sato sakammakattaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0804n:3369_8: tasmāyeva ‘paccati pākānaṃ pavatte aṭṭhake duve’tiādīsu vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n:3369_11: bhidi vidāraṇe”ti dhātūnaṃ rudhādigaṇe pavattānaṃ “rukkhaṃ chindati,
anya-e0804n:3369_12: bhittiṃ bhindatī”ti rūpapadānaṃ sakammakattepi sati divādigaṇaṃ pattānaṃ tesaṃ dhātūnaṃ “udakaṃ chijjati,
anya-e0804n:3369_14: yathā bhūvādigaṇe pavattassa pacadhātussa “bhattaṃ pacatī”ti rūpapadassa sakammakattepi sati divādigaṇaṃ pattassa “niraye paccati,
anya-e0804n:3370_0: Athāpi vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho yathā ‘āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti ettha “āsavato cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti
anya-e0804n:3370_1: ca ‘āsavehi kattubhūtehi cittāni vimucciṃsū’ti ca evaṃ divādigaṇikassa dhātussa ‘vimucciṃsū’ti rūpapadassa
anya-e0804n:3370_6: asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāravipākāni na paccatī’ti sakammakattenapi bhavitabba”nti.
anya-e0804n:3370_9: “paccati pākāna”ntiādinā vuttappayogānaṃ “āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū”ti payogena asamānattā.
anya-e0804n:3370_10: Tathā hettha “vimucciṃsū”ti padaṃ kammarahitakattuvācakayapaccayantampi bhavati kattusahitakammavācakayapaccayantampi.
anya-e0804n:3370_11: “Vimucciṃsū”ti imassa hi padassa kammarahitayapaccayavantattā “āsavehī”ti karaṇavacanaṃ apādānakārakavācakaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3370_13: Tathā “vimucciṃsū”ti padassa kattusahitakammavācakattā “āsavehī”ti karaṇavacanaṃ kattukārakavācakaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3370_15: Ayaṃ nayo “paccati pākāna”ntiādinā vuttappayogesu na labbhati.
anya-e0804n:3370_16: Tathā hi tattha paccattavacanaṃ kattāraṃ vadati,
anya-e0804n:3370_18: Kārite “puriso purisena purisaṃ vā bhattaṃ pāceti pācayati pācāpeti pācāpayatī”ti ca,
anya-e0804n:3371_11: Bhāvapadaṃ na labbhati sakammakattā imesaṃ dhātūnaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3371_12: Iminā nayena aññānipi tegaṇikarūpāni upaparikkhitvā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n:3376_0: Iccevaṃ saṅkhepato yathārahaṃ ekagaṇikadvigaṇikategaṇikavasena suddhakattuhetukattukammabhāvapadāni ca
anya-e0804n:3376_1: sakāritekakammāni ca sakāritadvikammāni ca sakāritatikammāni ca dassitāni.
anya-e0804n:3377_8: Pari ava iccupasaggavasena hi idaṃ padaṃ akammakaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0804n:3377_12: Ettha pana pariava iccupasaggavasena akammakabhūtassa sodhātussa laddhakāritapaccayattā ekakammameva sakāritapadaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3377_15: Ettha ca pana pari ava iccupasaggavasena akammakabhūtassa sodhātussa laddhakāritapaccayadvayattā dvikammakaṃ sakāritapadaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3377_16: “Pariyosāvāpetī”ti idampi pari ava pubbasmā sodhātumhā ṇāpe ṇāpe iti paccayadvayaṃ katvā avasaddassokārañca
anya-e0804n:3377_17: katvā tato yakārāgamañca anubandhaṇakāralopañca paṭhamapaccaye pakārassa vakārañca dvīsu ca ṭhānesu pubbasaralopaṃ
anya-e0804n:3378_0: Idāni tā pāḷiyo atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ āhaccadesitākārena ekato kathayāma –
anya-e0804n:3378_5: Attanā vippakatanti ettha ca attanāti vippakaraṇakriyāya kattukārakavācakaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3378_7: Attanā pariyosāpetīti ettha pana attanāti abyayapadabhūtena sayaṃsaddena samānatthaṃ vibhatyantapatirūpakaṃ abyayapadaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3378_9: Tathā hi “attanā pariyosāpetī”ti vuttavacanassa “sayaṃ pariyosāpetī”ti attho bhavati “attanā ca pāṇātipātī”tiādīsu viya.
anya-e0804n:3378_10: Parehi pariyosāvāpetīti ettha pana parehīti kammakārakavācakaṃ karaṇavacananti gahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0804n:3378_12: Ettha hi yathā “rājāno coraṃ sunakhe khādāpentī”ti upayogavasena attho bhavati,
anya-e0804n:3378_13: tathā “bhikkhu attanā vippakataṃ pare jane pariyosāvāpetī”ti upayogavasena attho bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3378_14: Evaṃ imasmiṃ acchariyabbhutanayavicitte bhagavato pāvacane dvikāritapaccayavantampi padamatthīti sārato paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3378_15: Ayaṃ nayo sukhumo sāsane ādaraṃ katvā āyasmantehi sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0804n:3378_16: Yassa hi atthāya idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ karimha,
anya-e0804n:3378_18: atha kho pubbācariyānaṃ santikā laddhattā tesaññeva matīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3379_2: tāni ca kho dhātuvasena evaṃ veditabbāni savinicchayāni.
anya-e0804n:3382_0: Rudhi ji cipabhutīti, ye te dvikammakā dhīrā;
anya-e0804n:3386_0: Ete duhādayo dhātū, tikammāpi bhavanti tu;
anya-e0804n:3388_5: Manogaṇikassa hi īdisampi upayogavacanaṃ hoti aññādisampi.
anya-e0804n:3388_8: Gohi payo duhatīti ettha apādānavisayattā dvikammakabhāvo natthi.
anya-e0804n:3388_10: yattha khīraṃ na vindatī”ti ettha pana apādānavisayattepi gavāvayavabhūtassa visāṇassa visuṃ gahitattā
anya-e0804n:3389_4: Ettha ca aṅgāraṃ karotīti pariccattakāraṇavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3389_6: aṅgāre kate kāraṇabhūtassa kaṭṭhassa kaṭṭhabhāvo vigacchati.
anya-e0804n:3389_9: kaṭake katepi kārakabhūtassa suvaṇṇassa suvaṇṇabhāvo na vigacchati,
anya-e0804n:3389_11: Adāsiṃ taṃ karomīti idaṃ pana ṭhānantaradānavasena vuttaṃ “uparājaṃ mahārājaṃ karomī”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0804n:3389_12: Tattha “issaro purisena purisaṃ vā kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ kāreti.
anya-e0804n:3389_13: Tathā suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ kāretī”ti tikammikappayogopi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n:3390_0: Ettheke vadeyyuṃ “nanu ca bho ettha ekameva kammaṃ dissati,
anya-e0804n:3390_3: tathāpi atthato dveyeva kammāni dissantīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3390_4: Tathā hi brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretīti ettha brahmadatto attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena kārayatīti attho.
anya-e0804n:3390_5: Evaṃ pana atthe gahite “rajjaṃ kārehi bhaddante,
anya-e0804n:3390_6: kiṃ araññe karissasī”tiādīsupi tvaṃ attano rājabhāvaṃ amhehi kārāpehi,
anya-e0804n:3390_8: mayaṃ taṃ rajje abhisiñcitukāmāti attho samatthito bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3391_0: Brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti etthāpi brahmadatte attano rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena kārayanteti attho bhavati.
anya-e0804n:3391_2: tasmā atthato dveyeva kammani dissantīti vadāma.
anya-e0804n:3391_4: Tathā hi abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkhudvāre indattaṃ kāretīti cakkhudvārabhāve taṃdvārikehi attano
anya-e0804n:3391_9: evaṃ sante “brahmadatto rajjaṃ kāretī”tiādīsu laddhakāritapaccayattā “kāretī”tiādīhi padehi tikammakehiyeva bhavitabbanti? Na,
anya-e0804n:3392_4: Suvaṇṇena kaṭakaṃ karotīti ettha hi visesanatthe pavattakaraṇavisayattā dvikammikabhāvo na labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3392_5: Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi upaparikkhitvā yathāsambhavaṃ netabbo.
anya-e0804n:3393_0: Vahiādīnaṃ payoge rājapurisā rathaṃ gāmaṃ vahanti.
anya-e0804n:3393_4: Āyasmā upāli āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho.
anya-e0804n:3393_9: Nāgo maṇiṃ yācito brāhmaṇena brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā.
anya-e0804n:3394_4: Esa nayo aññatrāpi upaparikkhitvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n:3394_5: Evameva “brūhi bhagavā”tiādīsu sampadānavisayattā dvikammakabhāvo na labbhati.
anya-e0804n:3394_12: Sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ okkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahanti.
anya-e0804n:3394_13: Bhagavā bhikkhū taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ nāthati.
anya-e0804n:3394_16: Ettha ca “kamanuttaraṃ ratnavaraṃ jināmā”ti puṇṇakajātakapāḷi nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3394_17: Tatthāyamattho “mayaṃ janindā kataraṃ rājānaṃ anuttaraṃ ratnavaraṃ jināmā”ti.
anya-e0804n:3395_2: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretū’ti payogesu kiṃ dvikammakabhāvo labbhatī”ti?
anya-e0804n:3395_4: “gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotī”ti ettha na labbhati guṇaguṇīnaṃ vasena gahitattā.
anya-e0804n:3395_5: “Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti etthāpi na labbhati “saraṇaṃ iti gacchāmī”ti itisaddalopavasena vuttattā.
anya-e0804n:3395_9: aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti iminā adhippāyena “bhajāmi sevāmi bujjhāmī”ti attho.
anya-e0804n:3395_10: “Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretū”ti ettha pana dvikammakabhāvo labbhatīti vattabbo “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0804n:3395_11: upāsakaṃ dhāretū”ti atthasambhavato “sakyā kho pana ambaṭṭha rājānaṃ okkākaṃ pitāmahaṃ dahantī”ti dahadhātuppayogena
anya-e0804n:3395_13: adhippāyatthato pana “maṃ ‘upāsako me aya’nti dhāretū”ti attho sambhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0804n:3396_0: Iccevamamhehi ādito paṭṭhāya bhagavato sāsanatthaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhātuyo ca taṃrūpāni ca tadanurūpehi
anya-e0804n:3396_1: nānāpadehi nānāatthehi nānānayehi ca yojetvā vibhāvitāni,
anya-e0804n:3396_2: evaṃ vibhāventehipi amhehi tāsaṃ sarūpaparicchedo atthaparicchedo vā na sakkā sabbaso vattuṃ.
anya-e0804n:3396_3: Tadubhayañhi ko sabbaso vattuṃ sakkhissati aññatra āgamādhigamasampannehi pabhinnapaṭisambhidehi mahākhīṇāsavehi.
anya-e0804n:3397_0: Atthātisayayuttāpi, dhātū honti yato tato. Payogatonugantabbā, anekatthā hi dhātavo.
anya-e0804n:3398_0: Yenekatthadharā caranti vividhā nāthassa pāṭhe vare,
anya-e0804n:3402_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
